GV05chupsb_u:384: ucyate-atha ya uktalakṣaṇayoḥ prāṇāpānayoḥ sandhistayorantarā vṛttiviśeṣaḥ sa vyānaḥ,
GV05chupsb_u:385: yaḥ sāṅkhyādiśāsraprasiddhiḥ śrutyā viśeṣanirūpaṇānnāsau vyāna ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:397: ChUpBh_1,3.4 tathā vāgviśeṣāmṛcamṛksaṃsthaṃ ca sāma sāmāvayavaṃ codgīthamaprāṇannanapānanvyānenaiva nirvartayatītyabhiprāyaḥ //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:399: ato yāny anyāni vīryavanti karmāṇi yathāgner manthanam ājeḥ saraṇaṃ dṛḍhasya dhanuṣa āyamanam aprāṇann anapānaṃs tāni karoti /
GV05chupsb_u:400: etasya hetor vyānam evodgītham upāsīta // ChUp_1,3.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:401: ChUpBh_1,3.5 na kevalaṃ vāgādyabhivyāharaṇamevāto 'smādanyānyapi yāni vīryavanti
GV05chupsb_u:416: ChUpBh_1,3.6 athādhunā khalūdgīthākṣarāṇyupāsīta bhaktyakṣarāṇi mā bhūvannityato viśinaṣṭi-udgītha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:417: udgīthanāmākṣarāṇītyartho nāmākṣaropāsane 'pi nāmavata evopāsanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavedamukamiśrā iti yadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:419: kathaṃ prāṇasyottvamityāha-prāṇena hyuttiṣṭhati sarvo 'prāṇasyāvasādadarśanādato 'styudaḥ prāṇasya ca sāmānyam /
GV05chupsb_u:422: tathānnaṃ thamanne hīdaṃ sarvaṃ sthitamato 'styannasya thākṣarasya ca sāmānyam //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:433: dugdhe 'smai vāg dohaṃ yo vāco dohaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:435: ya etāny evaṃ vidvān udgīthākṣarāṇy upāsta ud-gī-tha iti // ChUp_1,3.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:436: ChUpBh_1,3.7 trayāṇāṃ śrutyuktāni sāmānyāni tāni tenānurūpeṇa śeṣeṣvapi draṣṭavyāni /
GV05chupsb_u:444: yajurvedo gīryajuṣā prattasya haviṣo devatānāṃ giraṇāt /
GV05chupsb_u:449: ṛgvedādiśabdasādhyaṃ phalamityabhiprāyastadvāco dohastaṃ svayameva vāgdogdhyātmānameva dogdhi /
GV05chupsb_u:451: ya etāni yathoktānyevaṃ yathoktaguṇānyudgīthākṣarāṇi vidvānsannupāsta udgītha iti //7 //
GV05chupsb_u:455: yena sāmnā stoṣyan syāt tat sāmopadhāvet // ChUp_1,3.8 //
GV05chupsb_u:456: ChUpBh_1,3.8 atha khalvidānīmāśīḥsamṛddhirāśiṣaḥ kāmasya samṛddhiryathā bhavettaducyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:460: tadyathā-yena sāmnā yena sāmaviśeṣeṇa stoṣyanstutiṃ kariṣyansyādbhavedudgātā tatsāmopadhāvedupasareccintayedutpattyādibhiḥ //8 //
GV05chupsb_u:464: yāṃ devatām abhiṣṭoṣyan syāt tāṃ devatām upadhāvet // ChUp_1,3.9 //
GV05chupsb_u:469: yena cchandasā stoṣyan syāt tac chanda upadhāvet /
GV05chupsb_u:470: yena stomena stoṣyamāṇaḥ syāt taṃ stomam upadhāvet // ChUp_1,3.10 //
GV05chupsb_u:471: ChUpBh_1,3.10 yena cchandasā gāyatryādinā stoṣyansyāttacchanda upadhāvet /
GV05chupsb_u:476: yāṃ diśam abhiṣṭoṣyan syāt tāṃ diśam upadhāvet // ChUp_1,3.11 //
GV05chupsb_u:479: ātmānam antata upasṛtya stuvīta kāmaṃ dhyāyann apramattaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:480: abhyāśo ha yad asmai sa kāmaḥ smṛdhyeta yatkāmaḥ stuvīteti yatkāmaḥ stuvīteti // ChUp_1,3.12 //
GV05chupsb_u:481: ChUpBh_1,3.12 ātmānamudgātā svaṃ rūpaṃ gotranāmādibhiḥ sāmādīnkrameṇa svaṃ cā'tmānamantato 'nta upasṛtya stuvīta /
GV05chupsb_u:482: kāmaṃ dhyāyannapramattaḥ svaroṣmavyañjanādibhyaḥ pramādamakurvaṃstato 'bhyāśaḥ kṣiprameva ha yadyatrāsmā evaṃvide sa kāmaḥ samṛdhyeta samṛddhiṃ gacchet /
GV05chupsb_u:483: ko 'sau, yatkāmo yaḥ kāmo 'sya so 'yaṃ yatkāmaḥ sanstuvīteti /
GV05chupsb_u:487: om ity etad akṣaram udgītham upāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:494: devā vai mṛtyor bibhyatas trayīṃ vidyāṃ prāviśan /
GV05chupsb_u:496: yad ebhir acchādayaṃs tac chandasāṃ chandastvam // ChUp_1,4.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:497: ChUpBh_1,4.2 devā vai mṛtyormārakādvibhyataḥ kiṃ kṛtavanta ityucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:498: trayīṃ vidyāṃ trayīvihitaṃ karma prāviśanpraviṣṭavanto vaidikaṃ karma prārabdhavanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:503: tān u tatra mṛtyur yathā matsyam udake paripaśyed evaṃ paryapaśyad ṛci sāmni yajuṣi /
GV05chupsb_u:504: te nu vittvordhvā ṛcaḥ sāmno yajuṣaḥ svaram eva prāviśan // ChUp_1,4.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:505: ChUpBh_1,4.3 tāṃstatra devānkarmaparānmṛtyuryathā loke matsyaghātako matsyamudake
GV05chupsb_u:510: te nu devā vaidikena karmaṇā saṃskṛtāḥ śuddhātmānaḥ santo mṛtyościkīrṣitaṃ viditavantaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:511: viditvā ca ta ūrdhvā vyāvṛttāḥ karmabhya ṛcaḥ sāmno yajuṣa ṛgyajuḥsāmasambaddhātkarmaṇo 'bhyutthāyetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:512: tena karmaṇā mṛtyubhayāpagamaṃ prati nirāśāstadapāsyāmṛtābhayaguṇamakṣaraṃ svaraṃ svaraśabditaṃ prāviśanneva praviṣṭavantaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:517: yadā vā ṛcam āpnoty om ity evātisvarati evaṃ sāmaivaṃ yajuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:518: eṣa u svaro yad etad akṣaram etad amṛtam abhayam /
GV05chupsb_u:519: tat praviśya devā amṛtā abhavan // ChUp_1,4.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:520: ChUpBh_1,4.4 kathaṃ punaḥ svaraśabdavācyatvamakṣarasyetyucyate-yadā vā ṛcamāpnotyomityevātisvaratyevaṃ sāmaivaṃ yajuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:524: sa ya etad evaṃ vidvān akṣaraṃ praṇauty etad evākṣaraṃ svaram amṛtam abhayaṃ praviśati /
GV05chupsb_u:525: tat praviśya yad amṛtā devās tad amṛto bhavati // ChUp_1,4.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:529: tatpraviśya ca rājakulaṃ praviṣṭānāmiva rājño 'ntaraṅgabahiraṅgatāvanna viśiṣṭastadamṛto bhavati na nyūnatā nāpyadhikatāmṛtatva ityarthaḥ //5//
GV05chupsb_u:532: atha khalu ya udgīthaḥ sa praṇavo yaḥ praṇavaḥ sa udgītha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:533: asau vā āditya udgītha eṣa praṇavaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:534: om iti hy eṣa svarann eti // ChUp_1,5.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:537: vaktavyamityārabhyate-atha khalu ya udgīthaḥ sa praṇavo bahvṛcānāṃ yaśca praṇavasteṣāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:539: asau vā āditya udgītha eṣa praṇavaśabdavācyo 'pi sa eva bahvṛcānāṃ nānyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:545: etam u evāham abhyagāsiṣaṃ tasmān mama tvam eko 'sīti ha kauṣītakiḥ putram uvāca /
GV05chupsb_u:549: ChUpBh_1,5.2 tametamu evāhamabhyagāsiṣamābhimukhyena gītavānasmyādityaraśmyabhedaṃ kṛtvā dhyānaṃ kṛtavānasmītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:550: tena tasmātkāraṇānmama tvameko 'si putra iti ha kauṣītakiḥ kuṣītakasyāpatyaṃ kauṣītakiḥ putramuvācoktavān /
GV05chupsb_u:551: ato raśmīnādityaṃ ca bhedena tvaṃ paryāvartayātparyāvartayetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:553: evaṃ bahavo vai te tava putrā bhaviṣyantītyadhi daivatam //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:556: ya evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ prāṇas tam udgītham upāsita /
GV05chupsb_u:557: om iti hy eṣa svarann eti // ChUp_1,5.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:560: tathomiti hyeṣa prāṇo 'pi svarannetyomiti hyanujñāṃ kurvanniva vāgādipravṛttyarthametotyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:561: na hi maraṇakāle mumūrṣoḥ samīpasthāḥ prāṇasyoṅkāraṇaṃ śṛṇvantīti /
GV05chupsb_u:564: etam u evāham abhyagāsiṣaṃ tasmān mama tvam eko 'sīti ha kauṣītakiḥ putram uvāca /
GV05chupsb_u:565: prāṇāṃs tvaṃ bhūmānam abhigāyatād bahavo vai me bhaviṣyantīti // ChUp_1,5.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:567: ato vāgādīnmukhyaṃ ca prāṇaṃ bhedaguṇaviśiṣṭagudgīthaṃ paśyanbhūmānaṃ manasābhigāyatāt /
GV05chupsb_u:569: bahavo vai me mama putrā bhaviṣyantītyevamabhiprāyaḥ sannityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:572: atha khalu ya udgīthaḥ sa praṇavo yaḥ praṇavaḥ sa udgītha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:573: hotṛṣadanād dha evāpi durudgītham anusamāharatīty anusamāharatīti // ChUp_1,5.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:574: ChUpBh_1,5.5 atha khalu ya udgītha ityādipraṇavodgīthaikatvadarśanamapaktaṃ tasyaitatphalamāhartuṃ śakyam /
GV05chupsb_u:575: kiṃ taddhaivāpi durudgītaṃ duṣṭamudgītamudgānaṃ kṛtamudgātrā svakarmaṇi kṣataṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:582: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:595: tasmādata eva kāraṇādṛcyadhyūḍhameva sāma gīyata idānīmapi sāmagaiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:596: yathā ca ṛksāmanī nātyantaṃ bhinne anyonyaṃ tathaitau pṛthivyagnidvayaṃ sāmaikaśabdābhidheyatvamāpannaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:603: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:610: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:619: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:626: atha yad etad ādityasya śuklaṃ bhāḥ saivark /
GV05chupsb_u:627: atha yan nīlaṃ paraḥkṛṣṇaṃ tat sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:628: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:629: tasmad ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma gīyate // ChUp_1,6.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:630: ChUpBh_1,6.5 atha yadetadādityasya śuklaṃ bhāḥ śuklā dīptiḥ saivarka /
GV05chupsb_u:631: atha yadāditye nīlaṃ paraḥ kṛṣṇaṃ paro 'tiśayena kārṣṇyaṃ tatsāma /
GV05chupsb_u:634: atha yad evaitad ādityasya śuklaṃ bhāḥ saiva sā /
GV05chupsb_u:635: atha yan nīlaṃ paraḥkṛṣṇaṃ tad amaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:637: atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate hiraṇyaśmaśrur hiraṇyakeśa ā praṇakhāt sarva eva suvarnaḥ // ChUp_1,6.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:638: ChUpBh_1,6.6 te evaite bhāḥ śuklakṛṣṇatve sā cāmaśca sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:639: atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye ādityasyāntarmadhye hiraṇmayo hiraṇmaya iva hiraṇmayaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:642: na hi sauvarṇe 'cetane pāpmādiprāptirasti yena pratiṣidhyeta /
GV05chupsb_u:644: ato luptopama eva hiraṇmayaśabdo jyotirmaya ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:646: puruṣaḥ puri śayanātpūrayati vā svenā'tmanā jagaditi /
GV05chupsb_u:648: tejasvino 'pi śmaśrukeśādayaḥ kṛṣṇāḥ syurityato viśinaṣṭi-hiraṇyaśmaśrurhiraṇyakeśa iti /
GV05chupsb_u:650: āpraṇakhātpraṇakho nakhāgraṃ nakhāgreṇa saha sarvaḥ suvarṇa iva bhārūpa ityarthaḥ //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:652: tasya yathā kapyāsaṃ puṇḍarīkam evam akṣiṇī /
GV05chupsb_u:655: udeti ha vai sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyo ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_1,6.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:664: sa eṣa devaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyaḥ pāpmanā saha tatkāryebhya ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:668: tamevaṅguṇasampannamunnāmānaṃ yathoktena prakāreṇa yo veda so 'pyevamevodetyudgacchati sarvebhyaḥ pāpmabhyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:676: sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmāt parāñco lokās teṣāṃ ceṣṭa devakāmānāṃ ca /
GV05chupsb_u:678: ChUpBh_1,6.8 tasyodgīthatvaṃ devasyā'dityādīnāmiva vivakṣitatvādāha-tasyarkca sāma ca geṣṇau pṛthivyādyuktalakṣaṇe parvaṇī /
GV05chupsb_u:682: yata evamunnāmācāsāvṛksāmageṣṇaśca tasmādṛksāmageṣṇatvaprāptamudgīthatvamucyate parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyatvāddevasya tasmādudgītha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:685: sa eṣa deva unnāmā ye cāmuṣmādādityātparāñcaḥ parāgañcanādūrdhvā lokāsteṣāṃ lokānāṃ ceṣṭe na kevalamīśitṛtvameva caśabdāddhārayati ca /
GV05chupsb_u:687: kiñca devakāmānāmīṣṭa ityetadadhidaivataṃ devatāviṣayaṃ devasyodgīthasya svarūpamuktam //8//
GV05chupsb_u:693: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:706: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:716: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:724: atha yad etad akṣnaḥ śuklaṃ bhāḥ saivark /
GV05chupsb_u:725: atha yan nīlaṃ paraḥkṛṣṇaṃ tat sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:726: tad etad etasyām ṛcy adhyūḍhaṃ sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:728: atha yad evaitad akṣṇaḥ śuklaṃ bhāḥ saiva sā /
GV05chupsb_u:729: atha yan nīlaṃ paraḥkṛṣṇaṃ tad amaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:731: ChUpBh_1,7.4 atha yadetadakṣṇaḥ śuklaṃ bhāḥ saivarka /
GV05chupsb_u:732: atha yannīlaṃ paraḥ kṛṣṇamāditya iva dṛkśaktyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tatsāma //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:734: atha ya eṣo 'ntar akṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate saivark /
GV05chupsb_u:739: tasya etasya tad eva rūpaṃ yad amuṣya rūpam /
GV05chupsb_u:740: yāv amuṣya geṣṇau tau tau goṣṇau /
GV05chupsb_u:742: ChUpBh_1,7.5 atha ya eṣo 'ntarakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate /
GV05chupsb_u:748: ukthādanyat tathā yajuḥ svāhāsvadhāvaṣaḍādi sarvameva vāgyajustatsa eva /
GV05chupsb_u:754: yāvamuṣya geṣṇau parvaṇī tāvevāsyāpi cākṣuṣasya geṣṇau /
GV05chupsb_u:755: yaccāmuṣya nāmodityudgītha iti ca tadevāsya nāma /
GV05chupsb_u:759: vakṣyati hi sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavatītyādi / na /
GV05chupsb_u:765: sa eṣa ye caitasmād arvāñco lokās teṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyakāmānāṃ ceti /
GV05chupsb_u:766: tad ya ime vīṇāyāṃ gāyanty etaṃ te gāyanti /
GV05chupsb_u:768: ChUpBh_1,7.6 sa eṣa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo ye caitasmādādhyātmikādātmanor'vāñcor'vāggatā lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyasambandhināṃ ca kāmānām /
GV05chupsb_u:769: tatsmādya ime vīṇāyāṃ gāyanti gāyakasta etameva gāyanti /
GV05chupsb_u:770: yasmādīśvaraṃ gāyanti tasmātte dhanasanayo dhanalābhayuktā dhanavanta utyarthaḥ //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:772: atha ya etad evaṃ vidvān sāma gāyaty ubhau sa gāyati /
GV05chupsb_u:773: so 'munaiva sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmāt parāñco lokās tāṃś cāpnoti devakāmāṃś ca // ChUp_1,7.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:774: ChUpBh_1,7.7 atha ya etadevaṃ vidvānyathoktaṃ devamudgīthaṃ vidvānsāma gāyatyubhau sa gāyati cākṣuṣamādityaṃ ca /
GV05chupsb_u:775: tasyaivaṃvidaḥ phalamucyateso 'munaivā'dityena sa eṣa ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāstāṃścā'pnoti ādityāntargatadevo bhūtvetyartho devakāmāṃśca //7
GV05chupsb_u:777: athānenaiva ye caitasmād arvāñco lokās tāṃś cāpnoti manuṣyakāmāṃś ca /
GV05chupsb_u:778: tasmād u haivaṃvid udgātā brūyāt // ChUp_1,7.8 //
GV05chupsb_u:780: eṣa hy eva kāmāgānasyeṣṭe ya evaṃ vidvān sāma gāyati sāma gāyati // ChUp_1,7.9 //
GV05chupsb_u:781: ChUpBh_1,7.8 athānenaiva cākṣuṣeṇaiva ye caitasmādarvāñco lokāstāṃścā'pnoti manuṣyakāmāṃśca cākṣuṣo bhūtvetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:782: tasmādu haivaṃvidudgātā brūyādyajamānaṃ kamiṣṭaṃ te tava kāmamāgāyānīti /
GV05chupsb_u:783: eṣa hi yasmādudgātā kāmāgānasyodgānena kāmaṃ sampādayitumīṣṭe samartha ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:784: ko 'sau?ya evaṃ vidvānsāma gāyati sāma gāyati /
GV05chupsb_u:788: trayo hodgīthe kuśalā babhūvuḥ śilakaḥ śālāvatyaś caikitāyano dālbhyaḥ pravāhaṇo jaivalir iti /
GV05chupsb_u:789: te hocur udgīthe vai kuśalāḥ smo hantodgīthe kathāṃ vadāma iti // ChUp_1,8.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:794: udgītha udgīthajñānaṃ prati kuśalā nipuṇā babhūvuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:795: kasmiṃściddeśe kāle ca nimitte vā sametānāmityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:798: ke te traya ityāha-śilako nāmataḥ śalāvato 'patyaṃ śālāvatyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:801: pravāhaṇo nāmato jīvalasyāpatyaṃ jaivalirityete trayaste hocuranyonyamudgīthe vai kuśalā nipuṇā iti prasiddhāḥ smaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:802: ato hanta yadyanumatirbhavatāmudgītha udgīthajñānanimittāṃ kathāṃ vicāraṇāṃ pakṣapratipakṣopanyāsena vadāmo vādaṃ kurma ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:812: tatra rājñaḥ prāgalbhyopapatteḥ sa ha pravāhaṇo jaivaliruvācetarau“bhagavantau pūjāvantāvagre pūrvaṃ vadatām” /
GV05chupsb_u:817: sa ha śilakaḥ śālāvatyaś caikitāyanaṃ dālbhyam uvāca hanta tvā pṛcchānīti /
GV05chupsb_u:819: ChUpBh_1,8.3 uktayoḥ sa ha śilakaḥ śālāvatyaścaikitāyanaṃ dālbhyamuvāca-“hanta yadyanumaṃsyase tvā tvāṃ pṛcchānī“tyukta itaraḥ“pṛcche“ti hovāca
GV05chupsb_u:836: yo yadātmakaḥ sa tadgatistadāśrayaśca bhavatīti yuktaṃ mṛdāśraya iva ghaṭādiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:850: na svargaṃ lokam atinayed iti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:853: ChUpBh_1,8.5 apāṃ kā gatirityasau loka iti /
GV05chupsb_u:855: amuṣya lokasya kā gatiriti pṛṣṭo dālbhya uvāca-svargamamuṃ lokamatītyāśrayāntaraṃ sāma na nayetkaściditi hovācā'ha /
GV05chupsb_u:858: svargasaṃstāvaṃ svargatvena saṃstavanaṃ saṃstāvo yasya tatsāma svargasaṃstāvaṃ hi yasmāt“svargo vai lokaḥ sāmaveda“iti śrutiḥ //5 //
GV05chupsb_u:860: taṃ ha śilakaḥ śālāvatyaś caikitāyanaṃ dālbhyam uvācāpratiṣṭhitaṃ vai kila te dālbhya sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:861: yas tv etarhi brūyān mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti mūrdhā te vipated iti // ChUp_1,8.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:862: ChUpBh_1,8.6 tamitaraḥ śilakaḥ śālāvatyaścaikitāyanaṃ dālbhyamuvāca-apratiṣṭhitamasaṃsthitaṃ parovarīyastvenāsamāptagati sāmetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:865: yastvasahiṣṇuḥ sāmavidetarhyetasminkāle brūyātkaścidviparītavijñānamapratiṣṭhitaṃ sāma pratiṣṭhitamityevaṃvādāparādhinaṃ mūrdhā śiraste vipatiṣyati vispaṣṭaṃ patiṣyatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:866: evamuktasyāparādhinastathaiva tadvipatenna saṃśayo na tvāhaṃ bravīmītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:867: nanu mūrdhapātār'haṃ cedaparādhaṃ kṛtavānataḥ pareṇānuktasyāpi patenmūrdhā;
GV05chupsb_u:879: na pratiṣṭhāṃ lokam atinayed iti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:882: ChUpBh_1,8.7 evamukto dālbhya āha-hantāhametadbhagavatto vedāni yatpratiṣṭhaṃ sāmetyuktaḥ pratyuvāca śālāvatyo viddhīti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:883: amuṣya lokasya kā gatiriti pṛṣṭo dālbhyena śālāvatyo 'yaṃ loka iti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:884: ayaṃ hi loko yāgadānahomādibhiramuṃ lokaṃ puṣyatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:888: asya lokasya kā gatirityukta āha śālāvatyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:895: antavad vai kila te śālāvatya sāma /
GV05chupsb_u:896: yas tv etarhi brūyān mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti mūrdhā te vipated iti /
GV05chupsb_u:899: ChUpBh_1,8.8 tamevamuktavantaṃ ha pravāhaṇo jaivaliruvācāntavadvai kila te śālāvatya sāmetyādi pūrvavat /
GV05chupsb_u:900: tataḥ śālāvatya āha-hantāhametadbhagavatto vedānīti viddhīti hovācetaro 'nujñāta āha //8//
GV05chupsb_u:905: sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāny ākāśād eva samutpadyante /
GV05chupsb_u:911: ākāśa iti ca para ātmā“ākāśo vai nāme“ti śruteḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:916: sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni sthāvarajaṅgamānyākāśādeva samutpadyante tejobannādikrameṇa,
GV05chupsb_u:918: ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti pralayakāle tenaiva viparītakrameṇa hi yasmādākāśa evaibhyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:919: sarvebhyo bhūtebhyo jyāyānmahattaro 'taḥ sa sarveṣāṃ bhṛtānāṃ paramayanaṃ parāyaṇaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:924: parovarīyo hāsya bhavati parovarīyaso ha lokāñ jayati ya etad evaṃ vidvān parovarīyāṃsam udgītham upāste // ChUp_1,9.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:925: ChUpBh_1,9.2 yasmātparaṃ paraṃ varīyo varīyaso 'pyeṣa varaḥ paraśca varīyāśca rapovarīyānudgīthaḥ paramātmā sampanna ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:926: ata eva sa eṣo 'nanto 'vidyāmānāntastametaṃ parovarīyāṃsaṃ paramātmabhūtamanantamevaṃ vidvānparovarīyāṃsamudgīthamupāste /
GV05chupsb_u:927: tasyaitatphalamāha-parovarīyaḥ paraṃ paraṃ varīyo viśiṣṭataraṃ jīvanaṃ hāsya viduṣo
GV05chupsb_u:928: bhavati dṛṣṭaṃ phalamadṛṣṭaṃ ca parovarīyasa uttarottaraviśiṣṭatarāneva brahmākāśāntāṃllokāñjayati
GV05chupsb_u:932: yāvat ta enaṃ prajāyām udgīthaṃ vediṣyante parovarīyo haibhyas tāvad asmiṃl loke jīvanaṃ bhaviṣyati // ChUp_1,9.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:933: ChUpBh_1,9.3 kiṃ ca tametamudgīthaṃ vidvānatidhanvā nāmataḥ śunakasyāpatyaṃ śaunaka udaraśāḍilyāya śiṣyāyaitamudgīthadarśanamuktvovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:935: enamudgīthaṃ tvatsantatijā vediṣyante jñāsyanti tāvantaṃ kālaṃ parovarīyo haibhyaḥ prasiddhebhyo laukikajīvanebhya uttarottaraviśiṣṭataraṃ jīvanaṃ tebhyo bhaviṣyati //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:938: sa ya etam eva vidvān upāste parovarīya eva hāsyāmuṣmiṃl loke jīvanaṃ bhavati tathāmuṣmiṃl loke loka iti loke loka iti // ChUp_1,9.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:940: syādetatphalaṃ pūrveṣāṃ mahābhāgyānāṃ naidaṃyugīnānāmityāśaṅkānivṛttaya āha-sa yaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:941: kaścidetadevaṃ vidvānudgīthametarhyupāste tasyāpyevameva parovarīya eva hāsyāsmiṃlloke
GV05chupsb_u:942: jīvanaṃ bhavati tathāmuṣmiṃlloke loke loka iti //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:945: maṭacīhateṣu kuruṣv āṭikyā saha jāyayoṣastir ha cākrāyaṇa ibhyagrāme pradrāṇaka uvāsa // ChUp_1,10.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:949: tato durbhikṣe jāta āṭikyānupajātapayodharādistrīvyañjanayā saha jāyayoṣastirha nāmataścakrasyāpatyaṃ cākrāyaṇaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:950: ibho hastī tamarhatītībhya īśvaro hastyāroho vā tasya grāma ibhyagrāmastasminpradrāṇako 'nnālābhāt /
GV05chupsb_u:957: neto 'nye vidyante yac ca ye ma ima upanihitā iti // ChUp_1,10.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:958: ChUpBh_1,10.2 so 'nnārthamaṭannibhyaṃ kulmāṣānkutsitānmāṣānkhādantaṃ bhakṣayantaṃ yadṛcchayopalabhya bibhikṣe yācitavān /
GV05chupsb_u:960: neto 'smānmayā bhakṣyamāṇāducchiṣṭarāśeḥ kulmāṣā anye na vidyante /
GV05chupsb_u:961: yacca ye rāśau me mamopanihitāḥ prakṣiptā ime bhājate kiṃ karomītyuktaḥ pratyuvācoṣastiḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:966: ucchiṣṭaṃ vai me pītaṃ syād iti hovāca // ChUp_1,10.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:971: ucchiṣṭaṃ vai me mamedamudakaṃ pītaṃ syādyadi pāsyāmītyuktavantaṃ pratyuvācetaraḥ //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:974: na vā ajīviṣyam imān akhādann iti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:976: ChUpBh_1,10.4 kiṃ na svidete kulmāṣā upyucchiṣṭā ityukta āhoṣastirna vā ajīviṣyaṃ na jīviṣyāmīmānkulmāṣānakhādannabhakṣayanniti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:977: kāma icchāto me mamodakapānaṃ labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:978: ataścaitāmavasyāṃ prāptasya vidyādharmayaśovataḥ svātmaparopakārasamarthasyaitadapi karma kurvato nā'gaḥsparśa ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:979: tasyāpi jāvitaṃ pratyupāyāntare 'jugupsite sati jugupsitametatkarma doṣāya /
GV05chupsb_u:987: sā'ṭikyagra eva kulmāṣaprāpteḥ subhikṣā śobhanabhikṣā labdhānnetyetadbabhūva saṃvṛttā /
GV05chupsb_u:993: sa mā sarvair ārtvijyair vṛṇīteti // ChUp_1,10.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:994: ChUpBh_1,10.6 sa tasyāḥ karma jānanprātaruṣaḥkāle sañjihānaḥ śayanaṃ nidrāṃ vā parityajannuvāca
GV05chupsb_u:995: patnyāḥ śṛṇvatyā yadyadi vateti khidyamāno 'nnasya stokaṃ labhemahi tadbhuktvānnaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:998: dhanalābhe ca kāraṇamāha-rājāsau nātidūre sthāne yakṣyate /
GV05chupsb_u:1000: sa ca rājā mā māṃ pātramupalabhya sarvairārtvijyairṝtvikkarmabhirṝtvikkarmaprayojanāyetyartho vṛṇīteti //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:1003: hanta pata ima eva kulmāṣā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:1004: tān khāditvāmuṃ yajñaṃ vitatam eyāya // ChUp_1,10.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:1005: ChUpBh_1,10.7 evamuktavantaṃ jāyovāca-hanta gṛhāṇa he pata ima eva ye maddhaste vinikṣiptāstvayā kulmāṣā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:1010: ChUpBh_1,10.8 tatra ca gatvodgātṝnudgātṛpuruṣānāgatya stuvantyasminnityāstāvastasminnāstāve stoṣyamāṇānupopaviveśa samīpa upaviṣṭasteṣāmityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:1013: prastotar yā devatā prastāvam anvāyattā tāṃ ced avidvān prastoṣyasi mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti // ChUp_1,10.9 //
GV05chupsb_u:1015: yā devatā prastāvaṃ prastāvabhaktimanugatānvāyattā tāṃ ceddevatāṃ prastāvabhakteravidvānsanprastoṣyasi viduṣo mama samīpe /
GV05chupsb_u:1016: tatparokṣe 'pi cedvipatettasya mūrdhā karmamātravidāmanadhikāra eva karmaṇi syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:1020: na ca smārtakarmanimitta eva dakṣiṇaḥ panthāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1022: tathoktasya mayeti ca viśeṣaṇādvidvatsamakṣameva karmaṇyanadhikāro na sarvatrāgnihotrasmārtakarmādhyayanādiṣu ca /
GV05chupsb_u:1023: anujñāyāstatra tatra darśanāt karmamātravidāmapyadhikāraḥ siddhaḥ karmaṇīti /

GV05chupsb_u:1029: pratihartar yā devatā pratihāram anvāyattā tāṃ ced avidvān pratihariṣyasi mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:1030: te ha samāratās tūṣṇīm āsāṃ cakrire // ChUp_1,10.11 //
GV05chupsb_u:1032: te prastotrādayaḥ karmabhyaḥ samāratā uparatāḥ santo mūrdhapātabhayāttūṣṇīmāsāṃcakrire 'nyaccākurvantaḥ arthitvāt //10-11 //
GV05chupsb_u:1037: uṣastir asmi cākrāyaṇa iti hovāca // ChUp_1,11.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:1039: bhagavantaṃ vai pūjāvarntamahaṃ vividiṣāmi veditumicchāmītyukta uṣastirasmi cākrāyaṇastavāpi śrotrapathamāgato yadīti hovācoktavān //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:1042: bhagavantaṃ vā aham ebhiḥ sarvair ārtvijyaiḥ paryaiṣiṣam /
GV05chupsb_u:1043: bhagavato vā aham avittyānyān avṛṣi // ChUp_1,11.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:1044: ChUpBh_1,11.2 sa ha yajamāna uvāca satyamevamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ bahuguṇamaśrauṣaṃ sarvaiśca ṛcvikkarmabhirārtvijyaiḥ paryaiṣiṣaṃ paryeṣaṇaṃ kṛtavānasmi
GV05chupsb_u:1047: bhagavāṃs tv eva me sarvair ārtvijyair iti /
GV05chupsb_u:1049: atha tarhy eta eva samatisṛṣṭāḥ stuvatām /
GV05chupsb_u:1050: yāvat tv ebhyo dhanaṃ dadyās tāvan mama dadyā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:1052: ChUpBh_1,11.3 adyāpi bhagavāṃstveva me mama sarvairārtvijyairṛtvikkarmārthamastvityuktastathetyāhoṣast iḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1053: kintvathaivaṃ tarhyeta eva tvayā pūrva vṛtā mayā samatisṛṣṭā mayā samyakprasannenānujñātāḥ santaḥ stuvatām /
GV05chupsb_u:1055: yāvattvebhyaḥ prastotrādibhyaḥ sarvebhyo dhanaṃ dadyāḥ prayacchasi tāvanmama dadyā ityuktastatheti ha yajamāna uvāca //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:1058: prastotar yā devatā prastāvam anvāyattā tāṃ ced avidvān prastoṣyasi mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti mā bhagavān avocat /
GV05chupsb_u:1060: ChUpBh_1,11.4 atha hainamauṣastyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā prastotopasasādoṣastiṃ vinayenopajagāma /

GV05chupsb_u:1071: kathaṃ, sarvāṇi sthāvarajaṅgamāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti pralayakāle prāṇamabhi lakṣayitvā prāṇātmanaivojjihate prāṇādevodgacchantītyarthaḥ utpattikāle /
GV05chupsb_u:1072: ataḥ saiṣā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā tāṃ cedavidvāṃstvaṃ prāstoṣyaḥ prastavanaṃ prastāvabhaktiṃ
GV05chupsb_u:1073: kṛtavānasi yadi mūrdhā śiraste vyapatiṣyadvipatitamabhaviṣyattathoktasya mayā tatkāle
GV05chupsb_u:1079: udgātar yā devatodgītham anvāyattā tāṃ ced avidvān udgāsyasi mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti mā bhagavān avocat /
GV05chupsb_u:1081: ChUpBh_1,11.6 tathodgātā papraccha katamā sodgīthabhaktimanugatānvāyattā devateti //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:1084: sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāny ādityam uccaiḥ santaṃ gāyanti /

GV05chupsb_u:1088: sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyādityamuccairūrdhvaṃ santaṃ gāyanti śabdayanti stuvantītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1092: pratihartar yā devatā pratihāram anvāyattā tāṃ ced avidvān pratihariṣyasi mūrdhā te vipatiṣyatīti mā bhagavān avocat /
GV05chupsb_u:1094: ChUpBh_1,11.8 evamevātha hainaṃ pratihartopasāda katamā sā devatā pratihāramanvāyatteti //8 //
GV05chupsb_u:1097: sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtany annam eva pratiharamāṇāni jīvanti /
GV05chupsb_u:1099: tāṃ ced avidvān pratyahariṣyo mūrdhā te vyapatiṣyat tathoktasya mayeti tathoktasya mayeti // ChUp_1,11.9 //

GV05chupsb_u:1111: sā mā bhūdityannalābhāyāthānantaraṃ śauvaḥ śvabhirdṛṣṭa udgītha udgānaṃ sāmātaḥ prastūyate /
GV05chupsb_u:1112: tattatra ha kila bako nāmato dalbhasyāpatyaṃ dālbhyo glāvo vā nāmato mitrāyāścāpatyaṃ maitreyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1128: ChUpBh_1,12.2 svādhyāyena toṣitā devatarṣirvā śvarūpaṃ gṛhītvā śvā śvetaḥ saṃstasmā ṛṣaye tadanugrahārthaṃ prādurbabhūva prāduścakāra /
GV05chupsb_u:1129: tamanye śuklaṃ śvānaṃ kṣullakāḥ śvāna upasametyocuruktavanto 'nnaṃ no 'smabhyaṃ bhagavānāgāyatvāgānena niṣpādayatvityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1130: mukyaprāṇaṃ vāgādayo vā prāṇamanvannabhujaḥ svādhyāyaparitoṣitāḥ santo 'nugṛhṇīyurenaṃ svarūpamādāyeti yuktamevaṃ pratipattum /
GV05chupsb_u:1131: aśanāyāma vai bubhukṣitāḥ smo vā iti //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:1134: tad dha bako dālbhyo glāvo vā maitreyaḥ pratipālayāṃ cakāra // ChUp_1,12.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:1135: ChUpBh_1,12.3 evamukte śvā śveta uvāca tānkṣullākāñśuna ihaivāsminneva deśe mā māṃ prātaḥ prātaḥkāla upasamīyāteti /
GV05chupsb_u:1140: tattatraiva ha bako dālbhyo glāvo vā maitreya ṛṣiḥ pratipālayāñcakāra pratīkṣaṇaṃ kṛtavānityarthaḥ //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:1142: te ha yathaivedaṃ bahiṣpavamānena stoṣyamāṇāḥ saṃrabdhāḥ sarpantīty evam āsasṛpuḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:1144: ChUpBh_1,12.4 te śvānastatraivā'gamya ṛṣeḥ samakṣaṃ yathaiveha karmaṇi bahiṣpavamānena stotreṇa stoṣyamāṇā /
GV05chupsb_u:1145: udgātṛpuruṣāḥ saṃrabdhāḥ saṃlagnā anyonyameva mukhenānyonyasya pucchaṃ gṛhītvā'sasṛpurāsṛptavantaḥ paribhramaṇaṃ kṛtavanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1146: ta evaṃ saṃsṛpya samupaviśyopaviṣṭāḥ santo hiṃ cakrurhiṅkāraṃ kṛtavantaḥ //4 //

GV05chupsb_u:1157: na hi tatpākena vinā prabhūtamannamaṇumātramapi jāyate prāṇinām /
GV05chupsb_u:1171: vāvāyameva loko hāukāraḥ stobho rathantare sāmni prasiddhaḥ-“iyaṃ vai rathantaram” iti /
GV05chupsb_u:1197: ādityadaivatye sāmni stobha ū ityāditya ūkāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1211: aniruktas trayodaśaḥ stobhaḥ saṃcaro huṅkāraḥ // ChUp_1,13.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:1212: ChUpBh_1,13.3 anirukto 'vyaktatvādidaṃ vedaṃ veti nirvaktuṃ na śakyata ityataḥ sañcaro vikalpyamānasvarūpa ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1216: dugdhe 'smai vāg dohaṃ yo vāco dohaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1218: ya etām evaṃ sāmnām upaniṣadaṃ vedopaniṣadaṃ veda // ChUp_1,13.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:1220: ya etāmevaṃ yathoktalakṣaṇāṃ sāmnāṃ sāmāvayavastobhākṣaraviṣayāmupaniṣadaṃ darśanaṃ veda tasyaitadyathoktaṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1228: yat khalu sādhu tat sāmety ācakṣate /
GV05chupsb_u:1232: sarvathāpi sāmaikadeśasambaddhameva tadityathedānīṃ samaste sāmni samastasāmaviṣayāṇyupāsanāni vakṣyāmītyārabhate śrutiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1237: samaste sāmni sādhudṛṣṭividhiparatvānna pūrvoktopāsananindārthatvaṃ sādhuśabdaḥ śobhanavācī /
GV05chupsb_u:1238: kathamavagamyata ityāha-yatkhalu loke sādhu śobhanamanavadyaṃ prasiddhaṃ tatsāmetyācakṣate kuśalāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1242: sāmnainam upāgād iti sādhunainam upāgād ity eva tad āhuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1243: asāmnainam upāgād ity eva tad āhuḥ // ChUp_2,1.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:1244: ChUpBh_2,1.2 tattatraiva sādhvasādhuvivekakaraṇa utāpyāhuḥ-sāmnainaṃ rājānaṃ sāmantaṃ copāgādupagatavān /
GV05chupsb_u:1251: sāma no bateti yat sādhu bhavati sādhu batety eva tad āhuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1252: asāma no bateti yad asādhu bhavaty asādhu batety eva tad āhuḥ // ChUp_2,1.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:1253: ChUpBh_2,1.3 athotāpyāhuḥ svasaṃvedyaṃ sāma no 'smākaṃ batetyanukampayataḥ saṃvṛttamityāhuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1254: etattairuktaṃ bhavati yatsādhu bhavati sādhu vatetyeva tadāhuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1256: yadasādhu bhavatyasādhu batetyeva tadāhuḥ tasmātsāmasādhuśabdayorekārthatvaṃ siddham //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:1258: sa ya etad evaṃ vidvān sādhu sāmety upāste 'bhyāśo ha yad enaṃ sādhavo dharmā ā ca gaccheyur upa ca nameyuḥ // ChUp_2,1.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:1259: ChUpBh_2,1.4 ataḥ sa yaḥ kaścitsādhu sāmeti sādhuguṇavatsāmetyupāste samastaṃ sāma sādhuguṇavadvidvāṃstasyaitatphalamabhyāśo ha kṣipraṃ ha;
GV05chupsb_u:1260: yaditi kriyāviśeṣaṇārthamenamupāsakaṃ sādhavaḥ śobhanā dharmāḥ śrutismṛtyaviruddhā
GV05chupsb_u:1261: ā ca gaccheyurāgaccheyuśca na kevalamāgaccheyurupa ca nameyurupanameyuśca bhogyatvenopatiṣṭheyurityarthaḥ //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:1271: ChUpBh_2,2.1 kāni punastāni sādhudṛṣṭiviśiṣṭāni samastāni sāmānyupāsyānīti /
GV05chupsb_u:1273: nanu lokādidṛṣṭyā tānyupāsyāni sādhudṛṣṭyā ceti viruddham / na /
GV05chupsb_u:1275: sādhuśabdavācyor'tho dharmo brahma vā sarvathāpi lokādikāryeṣvanugatam /
GV05chupsb_u:1280: tathāpi dharma eva sādhuśabdavācya iti yuktaṃ“sādhukārī sādhurbhavatī“ti dharmaviṣaye sādhuśabdaprayogāt /
GV05chupsb_u:1281: nanu lokādikāryeṣu kāraṇasyānugatatvādarthaprāptaiva taddṛṣṭiriti sādhu sāmetyupāsta iti na vaktavyam / na /
GV05chupsb_u:1283: sarvatra hi śāsraprāpitā eva dharmā upāsyā na vidyamānā apyaśāsrīyāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1284: lokeṣu pṛthivyādiṣu pañcavidhaṃ pañcabhaktibhedena pañcaprakāraṃ sādhusamastaṃ sāmopāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:1287: lokeṣviti yā saptamī tāṃ prathamātvena vi
GV05chupsb_u:1297: yathā te tathādṛṣṭyaiva sāmopāsanaṃ vidhīyate yato 'ta āvṛtteṣu lokeṣu /
GV05chupsb_u:1307: kalpante hāsmai lokā ūrdhvāś cāvṛttaś ca ya etad evaṃ vidvāṃl lokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste // ChUp_2,2.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:1308: ChUpBh_2,2.3 upāsanaphalaṃ-kalpante samarthā bhavanti hāsmai lokā ūrdhvāścā'vṛttāśca gatyāgativiśiṣṭā bhogyatvena vyavatiṣṭhanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1309: ya etadevaṃ vidvāṃllokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ samastaṃ sādhu sāmetyupāsta iti sarvatra yojanā pañcavidhe saptavidhe ca //3//
GV05chupsb_u:1325: prāvṛṣi meghajanane vṛṣṭeḥ prastāva iti hi prasiddhiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1330: udgṛhṇāti tan nidhanaṃ varṣayati ha ya etad evaṃ vidvān vṛṣṭau pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste // ChUp_2,3.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:1346: megho yatsaṃplavata ekībhāvenetaretaraṃ ghanībhavati megho yadonnatastadā saṃplavata ityucyate meghastadāpāmārambhaḥ sa hiṅkāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1349: yāḥ prācyaḥ syandante sa udgīthaḥ śraiṣṭhyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:1354: na hāpsu praity apsumān bhavati ya etad evaṃ vidvān sarvāsv apsu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste // ChUp_2,4.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:1378: kalpante hāsmā ṛtava ṛtumān bhavati ya etad evaṃ vidvān ṛtuṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste // ChUp_2,5.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:1379: ChUpBh_2,5.2 phalaṃ-kalpante ha ṛtuvyavasthānurūpaṃ bhogyatvenāsmā upāsakāyartavaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1403: bhavanti hāsya paśavaḥ paśumān bhavati ya etad evaṃ vidvān paśuṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste // ChUp_2,6.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:1425: vāco bahutaraviṣayaṃ prakāśayati cakṣurato varīyo vācaḥ, udgīthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1434: parovarīyo hāsya bhavati parovarīyaso ha lokāñ jayati ya etad evaṃ vidvān prāṇeṣu pañcavidhaṃ parovarīyaḥ sāmopāste /
GV05chupsb_u:1436: ChUpBh_2,7.2 etaddṛṣṭyā viśiṣṭaṃ yaḥ parovarīyaḥ sāmopāste parovarīyo hāsya jīvanaṃ bhavatītyuktārtham /
GV05chupsb_u:1437: iti tu pañcavidhasya sāmna upāsanamuktamiti saptavidhe vakṣyamāṇaviṣaye buddhisamādhānārtham /
GV05chupsb_u:1444: yat kiṃca vāco hum iti sa hiṅkāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1447: ChUpBh_2,8.1 athānantaraṃ saptavidhasya samastasya sāmna upāsanaṃ sādhvidamārabhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:1450: yatkiñca vācaḥ śabdasya humiti yo viśeṣaḥ sa hiṅkāro hakārasāmānyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:1469: dugdhe 'smai vāg dohaṃ yo vāco dohaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1471: ya etad evaṃ vidvān vāci saptavidhaṃ sāmopāste // ChUp_2,8.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:1475: atha khalv amum ādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:1477: māṃ prati māṃ pratīti sarveṇa samas tena sāma // ChUp_2,9.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:1478: ChUpBh_2,9.1 avayavamātre sāmnyādityadṛṣṭiḥ pañcavidheṣūktā prathame cādhyāye /
GV05chupsb_u:1479: athedānīṃ khalvamumādityaṃ samaste sāmnyavayavavibhāgaśo 'dhyasya saptavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:1483: ko 'sau, sarvadā samo vṛddhikṣayābhāvāttena hetunā sāmā'dityo māṃ prati māṃ pratīti tulyāṃ buddhimutpādayati /
GV05chupsb_u:1485: udgīthabhaktisāmānyavacanādeva lokādiṣūktasāmānyāddhiṅkārāditvaṃ gamyata iti hiṅkārāditve kāraṇaṃ noktam /
GV05chupsb_u:1486: sāmatve punaḥ savituranuktaṃ kāraṇaṃ na subodhamiti samatvamuktam //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:1488: tasminn imāni sarvāṇi bhūtāny anvāyattānīti vidyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:1493: ChUpBh_2,9.2 tasminnāditye 'vayavavibhāgaśa imāni vakṣyamāṇāni sarvāmi bhūtānyanvāyattānyanugatānyādityamupajīvyatveneti vidyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:1494: kathaṃ, tasyā'dityasya yatpurodayāddharmarūpaṃ sa hiṅkāro bhaktistatredaṃ sāmānyaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:1495: yattasya hiṅkārabhaktirūpaṃ tadasyā'dityasya sāmnaḥ paśavo gavādayo 'nvāyattā anugatāstadbhaktirūpamupajīvantītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1497: tasmāddhiṅkārabhājino hyetasyā'dityākhyasya sāmnaḥ tadbhaktibhajanaśīlatvāddhi ta evaṃ vartante //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:1503: ChUpBh_2,9.3 atha yatprathamodite savitṛrūpaṃ tadasyā'dityākhyāsya sāmnaḥ sa prastāvastadasya manuṣyā anvāyattāḥ pūrvavat /
GV05chupsb_u:1511: ChUpBh_2,9.4 atha yatsaṅgavavelāyāṃ gavāṃ raśmīnāṃ saṅgamanaṃ saṅgamo yasyāṃ velāyāṃ,
GV05chupsb_u:1512: gavāṃ vā vatsaiḥ sā saṅgavavelā tasminkāle yatsāvitraṃ rūpaṃ sa ādirbhaktiviśeṣa oṅkārastadasya vayāṃsi pakṣiṇo 'nvāyattāni /
GV05chupsb_u:1514: gṛhītvā paripatanti gacchantyata ākārasāmānyādādibhaktibhājīni hyetasya sāmnaḥ //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:1516: atha yat saṃprati madhyaṃdine sa udgīthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1520: ChUpBh_2,9.5 atha yatsamprati madhyandina ṛjumadhyandina ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1526: atha yad ūrdhvaṃ madhyaṃdināt prāg aparāhṇāt sa pratihāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1530: ChUpBh_2,9.6 atha yadūrdhvaṃ madhyandinātprāgaparāhnādyadrūpaṃ savituḥ sa pratihārastadasya garbhā anvāyattāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1531: ataste savituḥ pratihārabhaktirūpeṇordhvaṃ pratihṛtāḥ santo nāvapadyante nādhaḥ patanti taddvāre satyapītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1534: atha yad ūrdhvam aparāhṇāt prāg astam ayāt sa upadravaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1536: tasmāt te puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā kakṣaṃ śvabhram ity upadravanti /
GV05chupsb_u:1539: tasmātte puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ kakṣamaraṇyaṃ śvabhraṃ bhayaśūnyamityupadravantyupagacchanti dṛṣṭvopadravaṇādupadravabhājino hyetasya sāmnaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:1545: evaṃ khalv amum ādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ sāmopāste // ChUp_2,9.8 //
GV05chupsb_u:1546: ChUpBh_2,9.8 atha yatprathamāstamite 'darśanaṃ jigamiṣati savitari tannidhanaṃ tadasya
GV05chupsb_u:1550: evamavayavaśaḥ saptadhā vibhaktaṃ khalvamumādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ sāmopāste yastasya tadāpattiḥ phalamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ //8//
GV05chupsb_u:1553: atha khalv ātmasaṃmitam atimṛtyu saptavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:1560: ātmasaṃmitaṃ svāvayavatulyatayā mitaṃ paramātmatulyatayā vā saṃmitamatimṛtyu mṛtyujayahetutvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:1562: tatheha sāmnaḥ saptavidhabhaktināmākṣarāṇi samāhṛtya tribhisribhiḥ samatayā sāmatvaṃ parikalpyopāsyatvenocyante /
GV05chupsb_u:1563: tadupāsanena mṛtyugocarākṣarasamakhyāsāmānyena taṃ mṛtyuṃ prāpya tadatiriktākṣareṇa tasyā'dityasya mṛtyoratikramaṇāyaiva saṃkramamaṃ kalpayati
GV05chupsb_u:1565: tasya prathamabhaktināmākṣarāṇi biṅkāra ityetattryakṣaraṃ bhaktimāna prastāva iti ca bhaktestryakṣarameva māna tatpūrveṇa samam //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:1577: udgītha iti tryakṣaram upadrava iti caturakṣaraṃ tribhis tribhiḥ samaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:1580: ChUpBh_2,10.3 udgītha iti tryakṣaramupadrava iti caturakṣaraṃ tribhisribhiḥ samaṃ bhavatyakṣaramatiśiṣ.yate 'tiricyate /
GV05chupsb_u:1581: tena vaiṣamye prāpte sāmnaḥ samatvakaraṇāyā'ha-tadekamapi sadakṣaramiti tryakṣarameva bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:1586: tāni ha vā etāni dvāviṃśatir akṣarāṇi // ChUp_2,10.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:1588: evaṃ tryakṣarasamatayā sāmatvaṃ sampādya yathāprāptānyevākṣarāṇi saṃkhyāyante - tāni ha vā etāni saptabhaktināmākṣarāṇi dvāviṃśatiḥ //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:1597: “dvādaśa māsāḥ pañcartavasraya ime lokā asāvāditya ekaviṃśa“iti śruteratiśiṣṭena dvāviṃśenākṣareṇa paraṃ mṛtyorādityājjayatyāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1599: nākaṃ kamiti sukhaṃ tasya pratiṣedho 'kaṃ tanna bhavatīti nākaṃ kamevetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1604: paro hāsyādityajayāj jayo bhavati ya etad evaṃ vidvān ātmasaṃmitam atimṛtyu saptavidhaṃ sāmopāste sāmopāste // ChUp_2,10.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:1605: ChUpBh_2,10.6 uktasyaiva piṇḍitārthamāha-ekaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā'dityasya jayamāpnoti paro hāsyaivaṃvida ādityajayānmṛtyugocarātparo jayo bhavati dvāviṃśatyakṣarasaṃkhyayetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1616: ChUpBh_2,11.1 vinā nāmagrahaṇaṃ pañcavidhasya saptavidhasya ca sāmna upāsanamuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:1617: athedānīṃ gāyatrādināmagrahaṇapūrvakaṃ viśiṣṭaphalāni sāmopāsanāntarāṇyucyante yathākramaṃ gāyatrādīnāṃ karmaṇi prayogastathaiva /
GV05chupsb_u:1625: sa ya evam etad gāyatraṃ prāṇeṣu protaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1633: ChUpBh_2,11.2 sa ya evametadgāyatraṃ prāṇeṣu protaṃ veda prāṇī bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:1651: jvalati sa udgītho haviḥ sambandhācchraiṣṭhyaṃ jvalanasya /
GV05chupsb_u:1657: sa ya evam etad rathaṃtaram agnau protaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1664: na pratyaṅṅ agnim ācāmen na niṣṭhīvet /
GV05chupsb_u:1670: na pratyaṅṅagnerabhimukho nā'cāmenna bhakṣayetkiñcinna niṣṭhīvecchleṣmanirasanaṃ ca na kuryāttadvratam //2//
GV05chupsb_u:1676: prati strīṃ saha śete sa pratihāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1680: ChUpBh_2,13.1 upamantrayate saṅketaṃ karoti prāthamyātsa hiṅkāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1683: prati srīṃ śayanaṃ sriyā abhimukhībhāvaḥ sa pratihāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1684: kālaṃ gacchati maithunena pāraṃ samāptiṃ gacchati tannidhanametadvāmadevyaṃ mithune protam /
GV05chupsb_u:1687: sa ya evam etad vāmadevyaṃ mithune protaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1699: na kāñcana kāñcidapi sriyaṃ svātmatalpaprāptāṃ na pariharetsamāgamārthinīm /
GV05chupsb_u:1700: vāmadevyasāmopāsanāṅgatvena vidhānāt etasmādanyatra pratiṣedhasmṛtayaḥ vacanaprāmāṇyācca dharmāvagaterna pratiṣedhaśāsreṇāsya virodhaḥ //2//
GV05chupsb_u:1716: sa ya evam etad bṛhad āditye protaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1740: sa ya evam etad vairūpaṃ parjanye protaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1741: virūpāṃś ca surūpaṃś ca paśūn avarundhe /
GV05chupsb_u:1761: sa ya evam etad vairājam ṛtuṣu protaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1770: ChUpBh_2,16.2 etadvairājamṛtuṣu protaṃ veda virājati ṛtuvadyathartava ārtavairdharmairvirājanta evaṃ prajādibhirvidvānityuktamanyat /
GV05chupsb_u:1781: śakvarya iti nityaṃ bahuvacanaṃ revatya iva /
GV05chupsb_u:1784: sa ya evam etāḥ śakvaryo lokeṣu protā veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1791: ChUpBh_2,17.2 lokī bhavati lokaphalena yujyata ityartaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1804: sa ya evam etā revatyaḥ paśuṣu protā veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1828: sa ya evam etad yajñāyajñīyam aṅgeṣu protaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1839: nāṅgena hastapādādinā vihūrchati na kuṭilī bhavati paṅguḥ kuṇī vetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1840: saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsaramātraṃ majjño māṃsāni nāśnīyānna bhakṣayet /
GV05chupsb_u:1858: sa ya evam etad rājanaṃ devatāsu protaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:1859: etāsām eva devatānāṃ salokatāṃ sarṣṭitāṃ sāyujyaṃ gacchati /
GV05chupsb_u:1866: ChUpBh_2,20.2 vidvatphalam-etāsāmevāgnyādīnāṃ devatānāṃ salokatāṃ samānalokatāṃ sārṣṭitāṃ samānarddhitvaṃ sāyujyaṃ samugbhāvamekadehadehitvamityetat
GV05chupsb_u:1872: “ete vai devāḥ pratyakṣaṃ yadbrāhmaṇā“iti śruterbrāhmaṇanindā devatānindaiveti //2//
GV05chupsb_u:1889: atīteṣvapi sāmopāsaneṣu yeṣu yeṣu protaṃ yadyatsāma taddṛṣṭyā tadupāsyamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:1892: sa ya evam etat sāma sarvasmin protaṃ veda sarvaṃ ha bhavati // ChUp_2,21.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:1893: ChUpBh_2,21.2 sarvaviṣayasāmavidaḥ phalaṃ-sarvaṃ ha bhavati sarveśvaro bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:1898: tebhyo na jyāyaḥ param anyad asti // ChUp_2,21.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:1900: yāni pañcadhā pañcaprakāreṇa hiṅkārādivibhāgaiḥ proktāni trīṇi trīṇi trayīvidyādīni
GV05chupsb_u:1901: tebhyaḥ pañcatrikebhyo jyāyo mahattaraṃ paraṃ ca vyatiriktamanyadvastvantaraṃ nāsti

GV05chupsb_u:2265: annādyamannaṃ ca tadādyaṃ ca yenopayujyamānenāhanyahani devānāṃ sthitiḥ syāttadannādyameṣa raso 'jāyata yāgādilakṣaṇātkarmaṇaḥ //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2269: tad vā etad yad etad ādityasya rohitaṃ rūpam // ChUp_3,1.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:2271: gatvā ca tadādityamabhitaḥ pārśvataḥ pūrvabhāgaṃ savituraśrayadāśritavadityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2272: amuṣminnāditye sañcitaṃ karmaphalākhyaṃ madhu bhokṣyāmaha ityevaṃ hi yaśa-ādilakṣaṇaphalaprāptaye karmāṇi kriyante manuṣyaiḥ kedāraniṣpādanamiva karṣakaiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2277: atha ye 'sya dakṣiṇā raśmayas tā evāsya dakṣiṇā madhunāḍyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2281: ChUpBh_3,2.1 atha ye 'sya dakṣiṇā raśmaya ityādi samānam /
GV05chupsb_u:2287: tāni vā etāni yajūṃṣy etaṃ yajurvedam abhyatapan /
GV05chupsb_u:2288: tasya abhitaptasya yaśas teja indriyaṃ vīryam annādyaṃ raso 'jāyata // ChUp_3,2.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2291: tad vā etad yad etad ādityasya śuklaṃ rūpam // ChUp_3,2.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2292: ChUpBh_3,2.2,3 tāni vā etāni yajūṃṣyetaṃ yajurvedamabhyatapannityevamādi sarvaṃ samānam /
GV05chupsb_u:2296: atha ye 'sya pratyañco raśmāyas tā evāsya pratīcyo madhunāḍyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2300: tāni vā etāni sāmāny etaṃ sāmavedam abhyatapan /
GV05chupsb_u:2301: tasyābhitaptasya yaśas teja indriyaṃ vīryam annādyaṃ raso 'jāyata // ChUp_3,3.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2304: tad vā etad yad etad ādityasya kṛṣṇaṃ rūpam // ChUp_3,3.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2305: ChUpBh_3.3.1-3 atha ye 'sya pratyaśco raśmaya ityādi samānam /
GV05chupsb_u:2310: atha ye 'syodañco raśmayas tā evāsyodīcyo madhunāḍyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2314: te vā ete 'tharvāṅgirasa etad itihāsapūrāṇam abhyatapan /
GV05chupsb_u:2315: tasyābhitaptasya yaśas teja indriyāṃ vīryam annādyaṃ raso 'jāyata // ChUp_3,4.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2318: tad vā etad yad etad ādityasya paraḥkṛṣṇaṃ rūpam // ChUp_3,4.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2319: ChUpBh_3,4.1-3 atha ye 'syodañco raśmaya ityādi samānam /
GV05chupsb_u:2320: atharvāṅgiraso 'tharvaṇāṅgirasā ca dṛṣṭā mantrā atharvāṅgirasaḥ karmaṇi prayuktā madhukṛtaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2322: tayoścetihāsapurāṇayoraśvamedhe pāriplavāsu rātriṣu karmāṅgatvena viniyogaḥ siddhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2326: atha ye 'syordhvā raśmayas tā evāsyordhvā madhunāḍyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2330: te vā ete guhyā ādeśā etad brahmābhyatapan /
GV05chupsb_u:2331: tasyābhitaptasya yaśas teja indriyaṃ vīryam annādyaṃ raso 'jāyata // ChUp_3,5.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2334: tad vā etad yad etad ādityasya madhye kṣobhata iva // ChUp_3,5.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2336: guhyā gopyā rahasyā evā'deśā lokadvārīyādividhaya upāsanāni ca karmāṅgaviṣayāṇi madhukṛto brahmaiva śabdādhikārātprāṇavākhyaṃ puṣpam /
GV05chupsb_u:2338: madhvetadādityasya madhye kṣobhata iva samāhitadṛṣṭerdṛśyate sañcalatīva //1-3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2346: ChUpBh_3,5.4 te vā ete yathoktā rohitādirūpaviśeṣā rasānāṃ rasāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2347: keṣāṃ rasānāmityāha-vedā hi yasmāllokaniṣyandatvātsārā iti rasāsteṣāṃ rasānāṃ karmabhāvamāpannānāmapyete rohitādiviśeṣā rasā ityantasārabhūtā ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2348: tathāmṛtānāmamṛtāni vedā hyamṛtā nityatvāteṣāmetāni rohitādīni rūpāṇyamṛtāni /
GV05chupsb_u:2353: tad yat prathamam amṛtaṃ tad vasava upajīvanty agninā mukhena /
GV05chupsb_u:2354: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti /
GV05chupsb_u:2362: annādyaṃ pratyahamupajīvyamānaṃ śarīrasthitikaraṃ yadbhavati raso hyevamātmakaḥ sarvaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2369: ChUpBh_3,6.2 kiṃ te nirudyamā amṛtamupajīvanti / na /
GV05chupsb_u:2376: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ veda vasūnām evaiko bhūtvāgninaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati /
GV05chupsb_u:2380: cā'dityasaṃśrayaṇaṃ rohita rūpatvaṃ cāmṛtasya prācīdiggataraśmināḍīsaṃsthatāṃ vasudevabhogyatāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:2381: tadvidaśca vasubhiḥ sahaikatāṃ gatvāgninā mukenopajīvanaṃ darśanamātreṇa tṛptiṃ svabhogāvasara
GV05chupsb_u:2382: udyamanaṃ tatkālāpāye ca saṃveśanaṃ veda so 'pi vasuvatsarvaṃ tathaivānubhavati //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2384: sa yāvad ādityaḥ purastād udetā paścād astam etā vasūnām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā // ChUp_3,6.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:2385: ChUpBh_3,6.4 kiyantaṃ kālaṃ vidvāṃstadamṛtamupajīvatītyucyate - sa vidvānyāvadādityaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:2387: kālaṃ vasūnāmādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryatā parito gantā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2388: na yathā candramaṇḍalasthaḥ kevalakarmī paratantro devānāmannabhūtaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2392: atha yad dvitīyam amṛtaṃ tad rudrā upajīvantīndreṇa mukhena /
GV05chupsb_u:2393: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti /
GV05chupsb_u:2397: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ veda rudrāṇām evaiko bhūtvendreṇaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati /
GV05chupsb_u:2400: ChUpBh_3,7.1-3 athā yaddvitīyamamṛtaṃ tadrudrā upajīvantītyādi samānam //1-2-3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2402: sa yāvad ādityaḥ purastād udetā paścād astam etā dvis tāvad dakṣiṇata udetottarato 'stam etā rudrāṇām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā
GV05chupsb_u:2403: ChUpBh_3,7.4 sa yāvadādityaḥ purastādudetā paścādastametā dvistāvattato dviguṇaṃ kālaṃ dakṣiṇata udetottarato 'stametā rudrāṇāṃ tāvadbhogakālaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:2406: atha yat tṛtīyam amṛtaṃ tad ādityā upajīvanti varuṇena mukhena /
GV05chupsb_u:2407: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti /
GV05chupsb_u:2411: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ vedādityānām evaiko bhūtvā varuṇenaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati /
GV05chupsb_u:2414: sa yāvad ādityo dakṣiṇata udetottarato 'stam etā dvis tāvat paścād udetā purastād astam etādityānām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā //
GV05chupsb_u:2417: atha yac caturtham amṛtaṃ tan maruta upajīvanti somena mukhena /
GV05chupsb_u:2418: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti /
GV05chupsb_u:2422: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ veda marutām evaiko bhūtvā somenaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati /
GV05chupsb_u:2425: sa yāvad ādityaḥ paścād udetā purastād astam etā dvis tāvad uttarata udetā dakṣiṇato 'stam etā marutām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā
GV05chupsb_u:2428: atha yat pañcamam amṛtaṃ tat sādhyā upajīvanti brahmaṇā mukhena /
GV05chupsb_u:2429: na vai devā aśnanti na pibanti /
GV05chupsb_u:2433: sa ya etad evam amṛtaṃ veda sādhyānām evaiko bhūtvā brahmaṇaiva mukhenaitad evāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛpyati /
GV05chupsb_u:2436: sa yāvad āditya uttarata udetā dakṣiṇato 'stam etā dvis tāvad ūrdhvam udetārvāg astam etā sādhyānām eva tāvad ādhipatyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryetā //
GV05chupsb_u:2444: udayaśca nāma savitustannivāsināṃ prāṇināṃ cakṣugocarāpattistadatyayaṣcastamanaṃ na paramārthata udayāstamane staḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2445: tannivāsināṃ ca prāṇināmabhāve tānprati tenaiva mārgeṇa gacchannapi naivodetā nāstameteti cakṣurgocarāpattestadatyayasya cābhāvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2446: tathāmarāvatyāḥ sakāśāddviguṇaṃ kālaṃ saṃyamanī purī vasatyatastannivāsinaḥ prāṇinaḥ prati dakṣiṇata ivodetyuttarato 'stametītyucyate 'smadbuddhiṃ cāpekṣya /
GV05chupsb_u:2449: yadāmarāvatyāṃ madhyāhnagataḥ savitā tadā saṃyamanyāmudyandṛśyate tatra madhyāhnagato vāruṇyāmudyandṛśyate,
GV05chupsb_u:2452: ilāvṛtavāsināṃ sarvataḥ parvataprākāranivāritādityaraśmīnāṃ savitordhva ivodetāvagistametā dṛśyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2458: atha tata ūrdhva udetya naivodetā nāstam etaikala eva madhye sthātā /
GV05chupsb_u:2464: tatra kaścidvidvānvasvādisamānacaraṇo rohitādyamṛtabhogabhāgī yathoktakrameṇa svātmānaṃ savitāramātmatvenopetya samāhitaḥ sannetaṃ mantraṃ dṛṣṭvotthito 'nyasmai pṛṣṭavate jagāda /
GV05chupsb_u:2465: yatastvamāgato brahmalokātkiṃ tatrāpyahorātrābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ savitā prāṇināmāyuḥ kṣapayati yathehāsmākamityevaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:2466: tattatra yathā pṛṣṭe yathokte cārtha eṣa śloko bhavati tanokto yogineti śrutervacanamidam //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:2472: ChUpBh_3,11.2 na vai tatra yato 'haṃ brahmalokādāgatastasminna vai tatraitadasti yatpṛcchasi /
GV05chupsb_u:2473: na hi tatra nimloco 'stamagamatsavitā na codiyāyodgataḥ kutaścitkadācana kasmiṃścidapi kāla iti /
GV05chupsb_u:2475: he devāḥ sākṣiṇo yūyaṃ śṛṇuta yathā mayoktaṃ satyaṃ vacastena steyanāhaṃ brahmaṇā brahmasvarūpeṇa mā virādhiṣi mā virudhyeyamaprāptirbrahmaṇā mama mā bhūdityarthaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2477: na ha vā asmā udeti na nimlocati /
GV05chupsb_u:2479: ya etām evaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ veda // ChUp_3,11.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2480: ChUpBh_3,11.3 satyaṃ tenoktamityāha śrutiḥ-na ha vā asmai yathoktabrahmavide nodeti
GV05chupsb_u:2481: na nimlocati nāstameti kiṃ tu brahmavide 'smai sakṛddivā haiva sadaivāharbhavati
GV05chupsb_u:2482: svayañjyotiṣṭvādya etāṃ yathoktāṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ vedaguhyaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:2483: evaṃ tantreṇa vaṃśāditrayaṃ pratyamṛtasambandhaṃ ca yaccānyadavocāmaivaṃ jānātītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2489: tad dhaitad uddālakāyāruṇaye jyeṣṭhāya putrāya pitā brahma provāca // ChUp_3,11.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:2490: ChUpBh_3,11.4 taddhaitanmadhujñānaṃ brahmā hiraṇyagarbho virāje prajāpataya uvāca /
GV05chupsb_u:2492: manurikṣvākvādyābhyaḥ prajābhyaḥ provāceti vidyāṃ stauti brahmādiviśiṣṭakramāgateti /
GV05chupsb_u:2495: idaṃ vāva taj jyeṣṭhāya putrāya pitā brahma prabrūyāt praṇāyyāya vāntevāsine // ChUp_3,11.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:2496: ChUpBh_3,11.5 idaṃ vāva tadyathoktamanyo 'pi jyeṣṭhāya putrāya sarvapriyārhāya brahma prabrūyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2500: yady apy asmā imām adbhiḥ parigṛhītāṃ dhanasya pūrṇāṃ dadyād etad eva tato bhūya iti // ChUp_3,11.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:2501: ChUpBh_3,11.6 nānyasmai kasmaicana prabrūyāttīrthadvayamanujñātamanekeṣāṃ prāptānāṃ tīrthānāmācāryādīnām /
GV05chupsb_u:2502: kasmātpunastīrthasaṅkocanaṃ vidyāyā niṣkrayārthamācāryāya dhanasya pūrṇāṃ sampannāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:2508: gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yad idam kiñca /
GV05chupsb_u:2510: vāg vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca // ChUp_3,12.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:2511: ChUpBh_3,12.1 yata evamatiśayaphalaiṣā brahmavidyātaḥ sā prakārāntareṇāpi vaktavyeti gāyatrī vā ityādyārabhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2514: satsvanekeṣu cchandaḥsu gāyatryā eva brahmajñānadvāratayopādānaṃ prādhānyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2515: somāharaṇāt itaracchandokṣarāharaṇenetaracchandovyāptyā ca sarvasavanavyāpakatvācca yajñe prādhānyaṃ gāyatryāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2516: gāyatrīsāratvācca brāhmaṇasya mātaramiva hitvā gurutarāṃ gāyatrīṃ tato 'nyadgurutaraṃ na pratipadyate yathoktaṃ brahmāpīti /
GV05chupsb_u:2520: idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ prāmijātaṃ yatkiñca sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ gāyatryeva /
GV05chupsb_u:2522: gaurasāvaśva iti ca trāyate ca rakṣatyamuṣmānmā bhaiṣīḥ kiṃ te bhayamutthitamityādinā
GV05chupsb_u:2524: yadvāgbhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca gāyatryeva tadgāyati ca trāyate ca vāco 'nanyatvādgāyatryāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2527: yā vai sā gāyatrīyaṃ vāva sā yeyaṃ pṛthivī /
GV05chupsb_u:2530: ChUpBh_3,12.2 yā vai saivaṃlakṣaṇā sarvabhūtarūpā gāyatrī,
GV05chupsb_u:2535: asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hi yasmātsarvaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca bhūtaṃ pratiṣṭhitametāmeva pṛthivīṃ nātiśīyate nātivartata ityetat /
GV05chupsb_u:2536: yathā gānatrāṇābhyāṃ bhūtasambandho gāyatryā evaṃ bhūtapratiṣṭhānādubhūtasambaddhā pṛthivyato gāyatrī pṛthivī //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2538: yā vai sā pṛthivīyaṃ vāva sā yad idam asmin puruṣe śarīram /
GV05chupsb_u:2541: ChUpBh_3,12.3 yā vai sā pṛthivī gāyatrīyaṃ vāva sedameva /
GV05chupsb_u:2542: tatkiṃ, yadidamasminpuruṣe kāryakāraṇasaṅghāte jīvati śarīraṃ pārthivatvāccharīrasya /
GV05chupsb_u:2548: yad vai tat puruṣe śarīram idaṃ vāva tad yad idam asminn antaḥ puruṣe hṛdayam /
GV05chupsb_u:2551: ChUpBh_3,12.4 yadva tatpuruṣe śarīraṃ gāyatrīdaṃ vāva tat /
GV05chupsb_u:2553: kathamityāha-asminhīme prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitā ataḥ śarīravadgāyatrī hṛdayam /
GV05chupsb_u:2561: ChUpBh_3,12.5 saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍakṣarapadā chandorūpā satī bhavati gāyatrī ṣaḍvidhā vāgbhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayaprāṇarūpā satī ṣaḍvidhā bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:2564: tadetasminnartha etadgīyatryākhyaṃ brahma gāyatryanugataṃ gāyatrīmukhenoktamṛcāpi mantreṇābhyanūktaṃ prakāśitam //5 //
GV05chupsb_u:2566: tāvān asya mahimā tato jyāyāṃś ca puruṣaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2567: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripād asyāmṛtaṃ divīti // ChUp_3,12.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:2568: ChUpBh_3,12.6 tāvānasya gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ samastasya mahimā vibhūtivistāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2569: yāvāṃścatuṣpātṣaḍvidhaśca brahmaṇo vikāraḥ pādo gāyatrīti vyākhyātaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2570: atastasmādvikāralakṣaṇādgāyatryākhyādvācārambhaṇamātrāttato jyāyānmahattaraśca paramārthasatyarūpo 'vikāraḥ pūruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvapūraṇātpuri śayanācca /
GV05chupsb_u:2571: tasyāsya pādaḥ sarvā sarvāṇi bhūtāni tejobannādīni sasthāvarajaṅgamāni /
GV05chupsb_u:2573: tripādamṛtaṃ puruṣākhyaṃ samastasya gāyatryātmano divi dyotanavati svātmanyavasthitamityartha iti //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:2575: yad vai tad brahmetīdaṃ vāva tad yo 'yaṃ bahirdhā puruṣād ākāśaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2576: yo vai sa bahirdhā puruṣād ākāśaḥ // ChUp_3,12.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:2577: ChUpBh_3,12.7 yadvai tat tripādamṛtaṃ gāyatrīmukhenoktaṃ brahmetīdaṃ vāva tadidameva /
GV05chupsb_u:2578: tadyo 'yaṃ prasiddho bahirdhā bahiḥ puruṣādākāśo bhautiko yo vai sa bahirdhā puruṣādākāśa uktaḥ //7 //
GV05chupsb_u:2580: ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2581: yo vai so 'ntaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ // ChUp_3,12.8 //
GV05chupsb_u:2582: ChUpBh_3,12.8 ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣe śarīra ākāśo yo vai so 'ntaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ //8 //
GV05chupsb_u:2584: ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yam antarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2586: pūrṇam apravartinīṃ śriyaṃ labhate ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,12.9 //
GV05chupsb_u:2587: ChUpBh_3,12.9 ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantarhṛdaye hṛdayapuṇḍarīka ākāśaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2588: kathamekasya sata ākāśasya tridhā bheda iti /
GV05chupsb_u:2590: tato 'ntaḥśarīre svapnasthānabhūte mandataraṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati svapnānpaśyataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2591: hṛdayasthe punarnabhasi na kañcana kāmaṃ kāmayate na kañcana svapnaṃ paśyati /
GV05chupsb_u:2597: tadetaddhārdākāśākhyaṃ brahma pūrṇaṃ sarvagataṃ na hṛdayamātraparicchinnamiti mantavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:2598: yadyapi hṛdayākāśe cetaḥ samādhīyate 'pravarti na kutaścitkvacitpravartituṃ śīlamasyetyapravarti tadanucchittidharmakam /
GV05chupsb_u:2599: yathānyāni bhūtāni paricchinnānyucchittidharmakāṇi na tathā hārdaṃ nabhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2600: pūrṇāmapravartinīmanucchedātmikāṃ śriyaṃ vibhūtiṃ guṇaphalaṃ labhate dṛṣṭaṃ ya evaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:2601: yathoktaṃ pūrṇāpravartiguṇaṃ brahma veda jānātīhaiva jīvaṃstadbhāvaṃ pratipadyata ityarthaḥ //9 //
GV05chupsb_u:2604: tasya ha vā etasya hṛdayasya pañca devasuṣayaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2605: sa yo 'sya prāṅ suṣiḥ sa prāṇaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2609: tejasvy annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,13.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:2610: ChUpBh_3,13.1 tasya ha vā ityādinā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇa upāsanāṅgatvena dvārapālādiguṇavidhānārthamārabhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2611: yathā loke dvārapālā rājña upāsanena vaśīkṛtā rājaprāptyarthā bhavanti tathehāpīti /
GV05chupsb_u:2613: etasyānantaranirdiṣṭasya pañca pañcasaṃkhyākā devānāṃ suṣayo devasuṣayaḥ svargalokaprāptidvāracchidrāṇi
GV05chupsb_u:2614: deveḥ prāṇādityādibhī rakṣyamāṇānītyato devasuṣayastasya svargalokabhavanasya hṛdayasyāsya
GV05chupsb_u:2615: yaḥ prāṅsuṣiḥ pūrvābhimukhasya prāggataṃ yacchidraṃ dvāraṃ sa prāṇastatsthastena
GV05chupsb_u:2616: dvāreṇa yaḥ sañcarati vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa prāganitīti prāṇaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2617: tenaiva sambaddhamavyatiriktaṃ taccakṣustathaiva sa ādityaḥ“ādityo ha vai bāhyaḥ prāṇaḥ“iti śruteścakṣūrūpapratiṣṭhākrameṇa hṛdi sthitaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2618: “sa ādityaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhita iti cakṣuṣi“ityādi hi vājasaneyake /
GV05chupsb_u:2620: vakṣyati ca-prāṇāya svāheti hatuṃ haviḥ sarvametattarpayatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:2624: tatastejasvyannādaścā'mayāvitvarahito bhavati ya evaṃ veda tasyaitadguṇaphalam /
GV05chupsb_u:2625: upāsanena vaśīkṛto dvārapaḥ svargalokaprāpti heturbhavatīti mukhyaṃ ca phalam //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:2627: atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣiḥ sa vyānaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2630: tad etac chrīś ca yaśaś cety upāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:2631: śrīmān yaśasvī bhavati ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,13.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2632: ChUpBh_3,13.2 atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa vīryavatkarma kurvanvigṛhya vā prāṇāpānau,
GV05chupsb_u:2633: nānā vānitīti vyānastatsambaddhameva ca tacchrotramindriyaṃ tathā sa candramāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2636: jñānānnavataśca yaśaḥ khyātirbhavatīti yaśohetutvādyaśastvamatastābhyāṃ guṇābhyāmupāsītetyādi samānam //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2641: tad etad brahmavarcasam annādyam ity upāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:2642: brahmavarcasy annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,13.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2643: ChUpBh_3,13.3 atha yo 'sya pratyaṅsuṣiḥ paścimastatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa mūtrapurīṣādyapanayannadho 'nitītyapānaḥ sā tathā vāk /
GV05chupsb_u:2653: tad etat kīrtiś ca vyuṣṭiś cetyupāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:2654: kīrtimān vyuṣṭimān bhavati ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,13.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:2655: ChUpBh_3,13.4 atha yo 'syodaṅsuṣirudaggataḥ suṣistatsyo vāyuviśeṣaḥ so 'śitapīte samaṃ nayatīti samānaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2656: tatsambaddhaṃ mano 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ sa parjanyo vṛṣṭyātmako devaḥ parjanyanimittāścā'pa iti /
GV05chupsb_u:2669: tad etad ojaś ca mahaś cety upāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:2670: ojasvī mahasvān bhavati ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,13.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:2671: ChUpBh_3,13.5 atha yo 'syordhvaḥ suṣiḥ sa udāna ā pādalādārabhyordhvamutkramaṇādutkarṣārthaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:2676: te vā ete pañca brahmapuruṣāḥ svargasya lokasya dvārapāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2677: sa ya etān evaṃ pañca brahmapuruṣān svargasya lokasya dvārapān vedāsya kule vīro jāyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2678: pratipadyate svargaṃ lokaṃ ya etān evaṃ pañca brahmapuruṣān svargasya lokasya dvārapān veda // ChUp_3,13.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:2679: ChUpBh_3,13.6 te vā ete yathoktāḥ pañcasuṣisambandhātpañca brahmaṇo hārdasya puraṣā rājapuruṣā iva dvārasthāḥ svargasya hārdasya lokasya dvārapā dvārapālāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2681: pratyakṣaṃ hyetadajitakaraṇatayā bāhyaviṣayāsaṅgānṛtaprarūḍhatvānna hārde brahmaṇi manastiṣṭhati /
GV05chupsb_u:2682: tasmātsatyamuktamete pañca brahmapuruṣāḥ svargasya dvārapā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:2683: ataḥ sa ya etānevaṃ yathoktaguṇaviśiṣṭānsvargasya lokasya dvārapānvedopāsta upāsanayā
GV05chupsb_u:2684: vaśīkaroti sa rājadvārapālānivopāsanena vaśīkṛtya tairanivāritaḥ pratipadyate svargaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:2686: kiñcāsya viduṣaḥ kule vīraḥ putro jāyate vīrapuruṣasevanāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2688: tataśca svargalokapratipattaye pāramparyeṇa bhavatīti svargalokapratipattirevaikaṃ phalama //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:2690: atha yad ataḥ paro divo jyotir dīpyate viśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥpṛṣṭheṣv anuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣv idaṃ vāva tad yad idam asminn antaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2691: tasyaiṣā dṛṣṭir yatraitad asmiñ charīre saṃsparśenoṣṇimānaṃ vijānāti /
GV05chupsb_u:2692: tasyaiṣā śrutir yatraitat karṇāv apigṛhya ninadam iva nadathur ivāgner iva jvalata upaśṛnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:2693: tad etad dṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cety upāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:2694: cakṣuṣyaḥ śruto bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,13.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:2695: ChUpBh_3,13.7 atha yadasau vidvānsvargaṃ lokaṃ vīrapuruṣasevanātpratipadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2698: tathā hyevamevedamiti yathokte 'tha dṛḍha pratītiḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2708: anuttameṣu tatpuruṣasamāsāśaṅkānivṛttaya āhottameṣu lokeṣviti satyalokādiṣu hiraṇyagarbhādikāryasthaparasyeśvarasyā'sannatvāducyata uttameṣu lokeṣviti /
GV05chupsb_u:2709: idaṃ vāvedameva tadyadidamasminpuruṣe 'ntarmadhye jyotiścakṣuḥ - śrotragrāhyeṇa liṅgenoṣṇimnā śabdena cāvagamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2713: kathaṃ punastasya jyotiṣo liṅgaṃ tvagdṛṣṭigocaratvamāpadyata iti,
GV05chupsb_u:2717: sa hyūṣṇimā nāmarūpavyākaraṇāya dehamanupraviṣṭasya caitanyātmajyotiṣo liṅgamavyabhicārāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2718: na hi jīvantamātmānamūṣṇimā vyabhicarati“uṣṇa eva jīviṣyañśīto mariṣyann” iti hi vijñāyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2719: maraṇakāle ca tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāmiti pareṇāvibhāgatvopagamāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2721: atastasya parasyaiṣā dṛṣṭiḥ sākṣādiva darśanaṃ darśanopāya ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2722: tathā tasya jyotiṣa eṣā śrutiḥ śravaṇaṃśravaṇopāyo 'pyucyamānaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2723: yatra yadā puruṣo jyotiṣo liṅgaṃ śuśrūṣati śrotamicchati tadaitatkarṇāvapigṛhyaitacchabdaḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇam /
GV05chupsb_u:2724: apigṛhyāpidhāyetyartho 'ṅgulibhyāṃ prorṇutya ninadamiva rathasyeva ghoṣo ninadastamiva
GV05chupsb_u:2725: śṛṇoti nadathuriva ṛṣabhakūjitamiva śabdo yathā cāgnerbahirjvalata evaṃ śabdamantaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:2726: śarīra upaśṛṇoti tadetajjyotirdṛṣṭaśrutaliṅgatvāddṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cetyupāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:2728: yatsparśaguṇopāsananimittaṃ phalaṃ tadrūpe sampādayati cakṣuṣya iti /
GV05chupsb_u:2731: evaṃ ca vidyāyāḥ phalamupapannaṃ syānna tu mṛdutvādisparśavattve /
GV05chupsb_u:2737: sarvaṃ khalv idaṃ brahma tajjalān iti śānta upāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:2738: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākratur asmiṃl loke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:2740: ChUpBh_3,14.1 punastasyaiva tripādamṛtasya brahmaṇo 'nantaguṇavato 'nantaśakteranekabhedopāsyasya viśiṣṭaguṇaśaktimatvenopāsanaṃ vidhitsannāha-sarvaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:2746: tathā tenaiva jananakrameṇa pratilomatayā tasminneva brahmaṇi līyate tadātmatayā śliṣyata iti tallam /
GV05chupsb_u:2747: tathā tasminneva sthitikāle 'niti prāṇiti ceṣṭata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:2750: yathā cedaṃ tadevaikamadvitīyaṃ tathā ṣaṣṭhe vistareṇa vakṣyāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2752: ataḥ śānto rāgadveṣādidoṣarahitaḥ saṃyataḥ sanyattatsarvaṃ brahma tadvakṣyamāṇairguṇairupāsīta /
GV05chupsb_u:2754: kratuṃ kurvīta kraturniścayo 'dhyavasāya evameva nānyathetyavicalaḥ pratyayastaṃ kratuṃ kurvītopāsītetyanena vyavahitena sambandhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2756: kathaṃ vā kratuḥ kartavyaḥ kratukaraṇaṃ cābhipretārthasiddhisādhanaṃ kathamityasyārthasya pratipādanārthamathetyādigranthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2759: yathākraturyādṛśaḥ kraturasya so 'yaṃ yathākraturyathādhyavasāyo yādṛṅniścayo 'smiṃlloke jīvanniha puruṣo bhavati tatheto 'smāddehātpretya mṛtvā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:2763: yata evaṃ vyavasthā śāsradṛṣṭātaḥ sa evaṃ jānankatuṃ kurvīta yādṛśaṃ kratuṃ vakṣyāmastam /
GV05chupsb_u:2764: yata evaṃ śāsraprāmāṇyādupapadyate kratvanurūpaṃ phalamataḥ sa kartavyaḥ kratuḥ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:2766: manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bhārūpaḥ satyasaṃkalpa ākāśātmā sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ sarvam idam abhyatto 'vāky anādaraḥ // ChUp_3,14.2
GV05chupsb_u:2769: manute 'neneti manastatsvavṛttyā viṣayeṣu pravṛttaṃ bhavati tena manasā tanmayaḥ,
GV05chupsb_u:2770: tathā pravṛtta iva tatprāyo nivṛtta iva ca /
GV05chupsb_u:2771: ata eva prāṇaśarīraḥ prāṇo liṅgātmā vijñānakriyāśaktidvayasaṃmīrchitaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2772: “yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vā prajñā sa prāṇaḥ“iti śruteḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2776: bhā dīptiścaitanyalakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ yasya sa bhārūpaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2778: satyā avitathāḥ saṅkalpā yasya so 'yaṃ satyasaṅkalpaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2779: na yathā saṃsāriṇa ivānaikāntikaphalaḥ saṅkalpa īśvarasyetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2783: ākāśa ivā'tmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa ākāśātmā /
GV05chupsb_u:2786: sarvaṃ viśvaṃ teneśvareṇa kriyata iti jagatsarvaṃ karmāsya sa sarvakarmā /
GV05chupsb_u:2791: nanu kāmo 'smīti vacanādiha bahuvrīhistathā kāmo 'smītismṛtyartho vācyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2793: sarve gandhāḥ sukhakarā asya so 'yaṃ sarvagandhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2795: tathā rasā api vijñeyāḥ. apuṇyagandharasagrahaṇasya pāpmasambandhanimittatvaśravaṇāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2804: sa yasya vidyate sa vākī na vākyavākī /
GV05chupsb_u:2813: eṣa ma ātmā antarhṛdaye 'ṇīyān vrīher vā yavād vā sarṣapād vā śyāmākād vā śyāmākataṇḍulād vā /
GV05chupsb_u:2814: eṣa ma ātmā antarhṛdaye jyāyān pṛthivyā jyāyān antarikṣāj jyāyān divo jyāyān ebhyo lokebhyaḥ // ChUp_3,14.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2815: ChUpBh_3,14.3 eṣa yathoktaguṇo me mamā'tmāntarhṛdaye hṛdayapuṇḍarīkasyāntarmadhye 'ṇīyānaṇutaro vrīhervā yavādvetyādyatyantasūkṣmatvapradarśanārtham
GV05chupsb_u:2816: śyāmākādvā śyāmākataṇḍulādveti paricchinnaparimāṇādaṇīyānityukte 'ṇuparimāṇatvaṃ prāptamāśaṅkyātastatpratiṣedhāyā'rabhate - eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye jyāyānpṛthivyā ityādinā /
GV05chupsb_u:2819: sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ sarvam idam abhyatto 'vākyanādaraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2822: etam itaḥ pretyābhisaṃbhavitā asmīti yasya syād addhā na vicikitsā asti /
GV05chupsb_u:2823: iti ha smāha śāṇḍilyaḥ śāṇḍilyaḥ // ChUp_3,14.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:2824: ChUpBh_3,14.4 manomaya ityādinā jyāyānebhyo lokebhya ityantena yathoktaguṇalakṣaṇa
GV05chupsb_u:2825: īśvaro dhyeyo na tu tadguṇaviśiṣṭa eva yathā rājapuruṣamānaya citraguṃ vetyukte na
GV05chupsb_u:2826: viśeṣaṇaśyāpyānayane vyāpriyate tadvadihāpīti prāptamatastannivṛttyartha sarvakarmetyādi punarvacanam /
GV05chupsb_u:2828: ata eva ṣaṣṭhasaptamayoriva tattvamasyātmaivedaṃ sarvamiti neha svārājye 'bhiṣiñcati /
GV05chupsb_u:2829: eṣa ma ātmaitadbrahmaitamitaḥ pratyābhisambhavitāsmīti liṅgānna tvātmaśabdena pratyagātmaivocyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2831: nanu ṣaṣṭhe 'pyatha sampatsya iti satsampatteḥ kālāntaritatvaṃ darśayati /
GV05chupsb_u:2834: yadyapyātmaśabdasya pratyagarthatvaṃ sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahmeti ca prakṛtameṣa ma
GV05chupsb_u:2838: syāmahaṃ pretya evaṃ na syāmiti na ca vicikitsāstītyetasminnarthe kratuphalasambandhe
GV05chupsb_u:2839: sa tathaiveśvarabhāvaṃ pratipadyate vidvānityetadāha smoktavānkila śāṇḍalyo nāmarṣiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2844: diśo hy asya sraktayo dyaur asyottaraṃ bilam /
GV05chupsb_u:2845: sa eṣa kośo vasudhānas tasmin viśvam idaṃ śritam // ChUp_3,15.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:2846: ChUpBh_3,15.1 asya kule vīro jāyata ityuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:2850: abhyarhitavijñānavyāsaṅgādanantarameva noktaṃ tadidānīmevā'rabhyate-antarikṣamudaramantaḥsuṣiraṃ yasya so 'yamantarikṣodaraḥ kośaḥ kośa ivānekadharmasādṛśyātkośaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:2851: sa ca bhūmibudhno bhūmirbudhno mūlaṃ yasya sa bhūmibudhno na jīryati na vinaśyati trailokyātmakatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2854: dyaurasya kośasyottaramūrdhvaṃ bilaṃ sa eṣa yathoktaguṇaḥ kośo vasudhāno vasu dhīyate 'sminprāṇināṃ karmaphalākhyamato vasudhānaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2855: yasminnantarviśvaṃ samastaṃ prāṇikarmaphalaṃ saha tatsādhanairidaṃ yadgṛhyate pratyakṣādipramāṇaiḥ śritamāśritaṃ sthitamityarthaḥ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:2862: sa ya etam evaṃ vāyuṃ diśāṃ vatsaṃ veda na putrarodaṃ roditi /
GV05chupsb_u:2863: so 'ham etam evaṃ vāyuṃ diśāṃ vatsaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:2865: ChUpBh_3,15.2 tasyāsya prācī digprāggato bhāgo juhūrnāma juhvatyasyāṃ diśi karmiṇaḥ prāṅmukhāḥ santa iti juhūnami /
GV05chupsb_u:2866: sahamānā māna sahante 'syāṃ pāpakarmaphalāni yamapuryāṃ prāṇina iti sahamānā nāma dakṣiṇādik /
GV05chupsb_u:2867: tathā rājñī nāma pratīcī paścimā digrājñī rājñā varuṇenādhiṣṭhitā sandhyārāgayogādvā /
GV05chupsb_u:2871: sa yaḥ kaścitputradīrghajīvitarthyevaṃ yathoktaguṇaṃ vāyuṃ diśāṃ vatsamamṛtaṃ veda sa na putrarodaṃ putranimittaṃ rodanaṃ na roditi putro na mriyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2872: yata evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ kośadigvatsaviṣayaṃ vijñānamataḥ so 'haṃ putrajīvitārthyevametaṃ vāyuṃ diśāṃ vatsaṃ veda jāne /
GV05chupsb_u:2873: ato mā putrarodaṃ rudaṃ mā rudaṃ putramaraṇanimittam /
GV05chupsb_u:2881: ChUpBh_3,15.3 ariṣṭamavināśinaṃ kośaṃ yathoktaṃ prapadye prapanno 'smi putrāyuṣe /
GV05chupsb_u:2884: bhūḥ prapadye 'munāmunāmunā bhuvaḥ prapadye 'munāmunāmunā svaḥ prapadye 'munāmunāmunā,
GV05chupsb_u:2885: sarvatra prapadya iti trinami gṛhṇāti punaḥ punaḥ //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2887: sa yad avocaṃ prāṇaṃ prapadya iti /
GV05chupsb_u:2888: prāno vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yad idaṃ kiṃca /
GV05chupsb_u:2890: ChUpBh_3,15.4 sa yadavocaṃ prāṇaṃ prapadya iti vyākhyānārthamupanyāsaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2891: prāṇo vā idaṃsarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ jagat /
GV05chupsb_u:2893: atastameva sarvaṃ tattena prāṇaprapadanena prāpatsi prapanno 'bhavam //4//
GV05chupsb_u:2894: 3.15.5 atha yadavīcaṃ bhūḥ prapadya iti pṛthivīṃ prapadye 'ntarikṣaṃ prapadye divaṃ prapadya ityeva tadavocam //5//
GV05chupsb_u:2895: tathā bhūḥ prapadya iti trīṃllokānbhūrādīnprapadya iti tadavocam //5 //
GV05chupsb_u:2897: atha yad avocaṃ bhuvaḥ prapadya ity agniṃ prapadye vāyuṃ prapadya ādityaṃ prapadya ity eva tad avocam // ChUp_3,15.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:2898: ChUpBh_3,15.6 atha yadavocaṃ bhuvaḥ prapadya ityagnyādīnprapadya iti tadavocam //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:2900: atha yad avocaṃ svaḥ prapadya ity ṛgvedaṃ prapadye yajurvedaṃ prapadye sāmavedaṃ prapadya ity eva tad avocam // ChUp_3,15.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:2901: ChUpBh_3,15.7 atha yadavocaṃ svaḥ prapadya ityṛgvedādīnprapadya ityeva tadavocamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:2902: upariṣṭānmantrāñjapettataḥ pūrvoktamajaraṃ kośaṃ sadigvatsaṃ yathāvaddhyātvā dvirvacanamādarārtham //7//
GV05chupsb_u:2914: jīvanhi svayaṃ putrādiphalena yujyate nānyathā ityata ātmānaṃ yajñaṃ sampādayati-puraṣaḥ puruṣo jīvanaviśiṣṭaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṅghāto yathāprasiddha eva /
GV05chupsb_u:2920: kena sāmānyenetyāha-caturviṃśatyakṣarā gāyatro chando gāyatraṃ gāyatrīchandaskaṃ hi vidhiyajñasya prātaḥsavanam /
GV05chupsb_u:2924: kiñca tadasya puruṣayajñasya prātaḥsavanaṃ vidhiyajñasyeva vasavo devā anvāyattā anugatāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2926: puruṣayajñe 'pi vidhiyajña ivāgnyādayo vasavo devāḥ prāptā ityato viśinaṣṭi-prāṇā vāva vasavo vāgādayo vāyavaśca /
GV05chupsb_u:2928: prāṇeṣu hi dehe vatsatu sarvamida vasati nānyathā /
GV05chupsb_u:2931: taṃ ced etasmin vayasi kiṃcid upatapet sa brūyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2932: prāṇā vasava idaṃ me prātaḥsavanaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanam anusaṃtanuteti māhaṃ prāṇānāṃ vasūnāṃ madhye yajño vilopsīyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:2933: ud dhaiva tata ety agado ha bhavati // ChUp_3,16.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2934: ChUpBh_3,16.2 taṃ cedyajñasampāditametasminprātaḥ savanasampanne vayasi kiñcidvyādhyādi
GV05chupsb_u:2936: manyamāno brūyājjapedityarthaḥ imaṃ mantraṃ he prāṇā vasava adaṃ me prātaḥ savanaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:2937: mama yajñasya vartate tanmādhyandinaṃ savanamanusantanuteti mādhyandinena savanenā'yuṣā
GV05chupsb_u:2939: māhaṃ yajño yuṣmākaṃ prāṇānāṃ vasūnāṃ prātaḥsavaneśānāṃ madhye vilopsīya vilupyeya vicchidyeyetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2941: sa tena japena dhyānena ca tatastasmādupatāpādudetyudgacchati /
GV05chupsb_u:2944: atha yāni catuścatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi tan mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanam /
GV05chupsb_u:2954: taṃ ced etasmin vayasi kiṃcid upatapet sa brūyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2955: prāṇā rudrā idaṃ me mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ tṛtīyasavanam anusaṃtanuteti māhaṃ prāṇānāṃ rudrāṇāṃ madhye yajño vilopsīyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:2956: ud dhaiva tata ety agado ha bhavati // ChUp_3,16.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:2957: atha yāny aṣṭācatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi tat tṛtīyasavanam /
GV05chupsb_u:2963: taṃ ced etasmin vayasi kiṃcid upatapet sa brūyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:2964: prāṇā ādityā idaṃ me tṛtīyasavanam āyur anusaṃtanuteti māhaṃ prāṇānām ādityānāṃ madhye yajño vilopsīyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:2965: ud dhaiva tata ety agado haiva bhavati // ChUp_3,16.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:2967: te hīdaṃ śabdādijātamādadate 'ta ādityāstṛtīyasavanamāyuḥ ṣoḍaśottaravarṣaśataṃ samāpayatānusantanuta yajñaṃ samāpayatetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2970: etad dha sma vai tad vidvān āha mahidāsa aitareyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2971: sa kiṃ ma etad upatapasi yo 'ham anena na preṣyām iti /
GV05chupsb_u:2973: pra ha ṣoḍaśaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvati ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,16.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:2974: ChUpBh_3,16.7 niścitā hi vidyā phalāyetyetaddarśayannudāharati-etadyajñadarśanaṃ ha sma vai kila tadvidvānāha mahidāso nāmataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2976: kiṃ kasmānme mamaitadupatapanamupatapasi sa tvaṃ he roga yo 'haṃ yajño 'nena tvatkṛtenopatāpena na preṣyāmi na mariṣyāmyato vṛthā tava śrama ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2979: anyo 'pyevaṃniścaḥ ṣoḍaśaṃ varṣaśataṃ prajīvati ya evaṃ yathoktaṃ yajñasampādanaṃ veda jānāti sa ityarthaḥ //7//
GV05chupsb_u:2982: sa yad aśiśiṣati yat pipāsati yan na ramate tā asya dīkṣāḥ // ChUp_3,17.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:2983: ChUpBh_3,17.1 sa yadaśiśiṣatotyādiyajñasāmānyanirdeśaḥ puruṣasya pūrveṇaiva sambadhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:2986: yanna ramata iṣṭādyaprāptinimittaṃ yadaivañjātīyakaṃ duḥkhamanubhavati tā asya dīkṣāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:2989: atha yad aśnāti yat pibati yad ramate tad upasadair eti // ChUp_3,17.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:2990: ChUpBh_3,17.2 atha yadaśnāti yatpibati yadramate ratiṃ cānubhavatīṣṭādisaṃyogāttadupasadaiḥ samānatāmeti /
GV05chupsb_u:2994: atha yad dhasati yaj jakṣati yan maithunaṃ carati stutaśastrair eva tad eti // ChUp_3,17.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:2995: ChUpBh_3,17.3 atha yaddhasati yajjakṣati bhakṣayati yanmaithunaṃ carati stutaśasraireva tatsamānatāmeti /
GV05chupsb_u:2998: atha yat tapo dānam ārjavam ahiṃsā satyavacanam iti tā asya dakṣiṇāḥ // ChUp_3,17.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:2999: ChUpBh_3,17.4 atha yattapo dānamārjavamahiṃsā satyavacanamiti tā asya dakṣiṇāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3005: ChUpBh_3,17.5 yasmācca yajñaḥ puraṣastasmāttaṃ janayiṣyati mātā yadā tadā'huranye
GV05chupsb_u:3006: soṣyatīti tasya mātaraṃ yadā ca prasūtā bhavati tadāsoṣṭa pūrṇiketi vidhiyajña iva
GV05chupsb_u:3007: soṣyati somaṃ devadatto 'soṣṭa somaṃ yajñadatta iti,
GV05chupsb_u:3009: punarutpādanamevāsya tatpuruṣākhyasya yajñasya yatsoṣyatyasoṣṭeti śabdasambandhitvaṃ vidhiyajñasyeva /
GV05chupsb_u:3012: tad dhaitad ghora āṅgirasaḥ kṛṣṇāya devakīputrāyoktvovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:3014: so 'ntavelāyām etat trayaṃ pratipadyetākṣitam asy acyutam asi prāṇasaṃśitam asīti /
GV05chupsb_u:3016: ChUpBh_3,17.6 taddhaitadyajñadarśanaṃ ghoro nāmata āṅgiraso gotrataḥ kṛṣṇāya devakīputrāya śiṣyāyokatvovāca tadetattrayamityādivyavahitena sambandhaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3017: sa caitaddarśanaṃ śrutvāpipāsa evāmyābhyo vidyābhyo babhūva /
GV05chupsb_u:3018: itthaṃ ca viśiṣṭeyaṃ vidyā yatkṛṣṇasya devakīputrasyānyāṃ vidyāṃ prati tṛḍvicchedakarīti puruṣayajñavidyāṃ stauti /
GV05chupsb_u:3019: ghora āṅgirasaḥ kṛṣṇāyoktvemāṃ vidyāṃ kimuvāceti tadāha-sa evaṃ yathoktayajñavidantavelāyāṃ maraṇakāla etanmantratrayaṃ pratipadyeta japedityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3020: kiṃ tadakṣitamakṣīṇamakṣataṃ vāsītyekaṃ yajuḥ sāmarthyādādityasthaṃ prāṇaṃ caikīkṛtyā'ha /
GV05chupsb_u:3022: prāṇasaṃśitaṃ prāṇaśca sa saṃśitaṃ samyaktanūkṛtaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ tattvamasīti tṛtīyaṃ yajuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3023: tatraitasminnarthe vidyāstutipare dve ṛcau mantrau bhavato na japārthe /
GV05chupsb_u:3031: devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam iti jyotir uttamam iti // ChUp_3,17.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:3034: retasaḥ kāraṇasya bījabhūtasya jagataḥ sadākhyasya jyotiḥ prakāśaṃ paśyanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3038: nivṛttacakṣuṣo brahmavido brahmacaryādinivṛttisādhanaiḥ śuddhāntaḥkaraṇā ā samantato jyotiḥ paśyantītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3041: yadidhyate dīpyate divi dyotanavati pasminbrahmaṇi vartamānam /
GV05chupsb_u:3042: yena jyotiṣeddhaḥ savitā tapati candramā bhāti vidyudvidyotate grahatārāgaṇā vibhāsante /
GV05chupsb_u:3045: tamaso vāpanetṛ yajjayotiruttaramādityasthaṃ paripaśyanto vayamudaganmeti vyavahitena sambandhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3048: yaduttaramutkṛṣṭataramūrdhvataraṃ vāparaṃ jyotirapekṣya paśyanta udaganma vayam /
GV05chupsb_u:3050: devaṃ dyotanavantaṃ devatrā deveṣu sarveṣu sūryaṃ rasānāṃ raśmīnāṃ prāṇānāṃ ca jagata
GV05chupsb_u:3051: īraṇātsūryastamudaganma gatavanto jyotiruttamaṃ sarvajyotirbhya utkṛṣṭatamamaho prāptā vayamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3060: ity ubhayam ādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty adhyātmaṃ cādhidaivataṃ ca // ChUp_3,18.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3061: ChUpBh_3,18.1 manomaya īśvara ukta ākāśātmeti ca brahmaṇo guṇaikadeśatvena /
GV05chupsb_u:3062: athedānīṃ mana ākāśayoḥ samastabrahmadṛṣṭividhānārtha ārambho mano brahmetyādi /
GV05chupsb_u:3063: mano manute 'nenetyantaḥkaraṇaṃ tadbrahma paramityupāsīteti etadātmaviṣayaṃ darśanamadhyātmam /
GV05chupsb_u:3072: vāk pādaḥ prāṇaḥ pādaś cakṣuḥ pādaḥ śrotraṃ pādaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3075: agniḥ pādo vāyuḥ pāda ādityaḥ pādo diśaḥ pādaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3076: ity ubhayam evādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty adhyātmaṃ cādhidaivataṃ ca // ChUp_3,18.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3079: kathaṃ catuṣpāttvaṃ manaso brahmaṇa ityāha-vākprāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotramityete pādā ityadhyātmam /
GV05chupsb_u:3084: so 'gninā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3085: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3086: ChUpBh_3,18.3 tatra vāgeva manaso brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pāda itarapādatrayāpekṣayā /
GV05chupsb_u:3087: vācā hi pādeneva gavādi vaktavyaviṣayaṃ prati pratiṣṭhati /
GV05chupsb_u:3091: tathā cakṣuḥ pādaḥ śrotraṃ pāda ityevamadhyātmaṃ catuṣpāttavaṃ manaso brahmaṇaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3092: athādhidaivatamagnivāyvādityadiśa ākāśasya brahmaṇa udāra iva goḥ pādā vilagnā upalabhyante /
GV05chupsb_u:3096: so 'gninādhidaivatena jyotiṣā bhāti ca dīpyate tapati ca santāpaṃ cauṣṇyaṃ karoti /
GV05chupsb_u:3097: athavā tailaghṛtādyāgneyāśaneneddhā vāgbhāti ca tapati ca vadanāyotsāhavatī syādityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3098: vidvatphalaṃ bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ yathoktaṃ vedaḥ //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3101: sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3102: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3104: sa ādityena jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3105: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3107: sa digbhir jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3108: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_3,18.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:3110: sa vāyunā gandhāya bhāti ca tapati ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3111: tatā cakṣurādityena rūpagrahaṇāya śrotraṃ digbhiḥ śabdagrahaṇāya /
GV05chupsb_u:3112: vidyāphalaṃ samānaṃ sarvatra brahmasampattiradṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ ya evaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:3124: te āṇḍakapāle rajataṃ ca suvarṇaṃ cābhavatām // ChUp_3,19.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3125: ChUpBh_3,19.1 ādityo brahmaṇaḥ pāda ukta iti tasminsakalabrahmadṛṣṭyarthamidamārabhyate-ādityo brahmetyādeśa upadeśastasyopavyākhyānaṃ kriyate stutyartham /
GV05chupsb_u:3136: tacca nāmarūpavyākaraṇamādityāyattaṃ prāyaśo jagataḥ tadabhāve hyandhaṃ tama idaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3137: na prajñāyeta kiñcanetyatastatstutipare vākye sadapīdaṃ rājñaḥ kulaṃ sarvaguṇasampanne
GV05chupsb_u:3139: na ca sattvamasattvaṃ veha jagataḥ pratipipādayiṣitamādityo brahmetyādeśaparatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3143: tato 'pi krameṇa sthūlībhavattadadbhya āṇḍaṃ samavartata saṃvṛttam /
GV05chupsb_u:3145: tadaṇḍaṃ saṃvatsarasya kālasya prasiddhasya mātrāṃ parimāṇamabhinnasvarūpamevāśayata sthitaṃ babhūva /
GV05chupsb_u:3147: tasya nirbhinnasyāṇḍasya kapāle dve rajataṃ ca suvarṇaṃ cābhavatāṃ saṃvṛtte //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3155: yad vāsteyam udakaṃ sa samudraḥ // ChUp_3,19.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3156: ChUpBh_3,19.2 tattayoḥ kapālayoryadrajataṃ kapālamāsītseyaṃ pṛthivī pṛthivyupalakṣitamadho 'ṇḍakapālamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3158: yajjarāyu garbhapariveṣṭanaṃ sthūlamaṇḍasya dviśakalībhāvakāla āsītte parvatā babhūvuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3159: yadulvaṃ sūkṣmaṃ garbhapariveṣṭanaṃ tatsaha medyaiḥ samegho nīhāro 'vaśyāyo babhūvetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3160: yā garbhasya jātasya dehe dhamanayaḥ śirāstā nadyo babhūvuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3161: yattasya bastau bhavaṃ vāsteyamudakaṃ sa samudraḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3163: atha yat tad ajāyata so 'sāv ādityaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3164: taṃ jāyamānaṃ ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūdatiṣṭhant sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3165: tasmāt tasyodayaṃ prati pratyāyanaṃ prati ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūttiṣṭhanti sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ // ChUp_3,19.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3166: ChUpBh_3,19.3 atha yattadajāyata garbharūpaṃ tasminnaṇḍe so 'sāvādityastamādityaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3167: jāyamānaṃ ghoṣāḥ śabdā ulūlava urūravo vistīrṇaravā udatiṣṭhannutthitavanta īśvarasyeveha
GV05chupsb_u:3168: prathamaputrajanmani sarvāṇi ca sthāvarajaṅgamāni bhūtāni sarve ca teṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3171: pratyāyanaṃ pratyastagamanaṃ ca pratyathavā punaḥ punaḥ pratyāgamanaṃ pratyāyanaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3173: sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmā ghoṣā ulūlavaścānūttiṣṭhanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3176: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān ādityaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:3177: abhyāśo ha yad enaṃ sādhavo ghoṣā ā ca gaccheyur upa ca nimreḍeran nimreḍeran // ChUp_3,19.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3178: ChUpBh_3,19.4 sa yaḥ kaścidetamevaṃ yathoktamahimānaṃ vidvānsannādityaṃ brahmetyupāste sa tadbhāvaṃ pratipadyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3179: kiñca dṛṣṭaṃ phalamabhyāśaḥ kṣipraṃ tadvido yaditi kriyāviśeṣaṇamenamevaṃvidaṃ sādhavaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3182: ā ca gaccheyurāgaccheyuścopa ca nimreḍerannupanimreḍeraṃśca na kevalamāgamanamātraṃ ghoṣāṇāmupasukhayeyuścopasukhaṃ ca kuryarityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3189: jānaśrutir ha pautrāyaṇaḥ śraddhādeyo bahudāyī bahupākya āsa /
GV05chupsb_u:3190: sa ha sarvata āvasathān māpayāṃ cakre sarvata eva me 'nnam atsyantīti // ChUp_4,1.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3194: vidyādānagrahaṇavidhipradarśanārthā ca śraddhānnadānānuddhatatvādīnāṃ ca vidyāprāpti sādhanatvaṃ pradarśyata ākhyāyikayā /
GV05chupsb_u:3197: putrasya pautraḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ sa eva śraddhādeyaḥ śraddhāpuraḥsarameva brāhmaṇādibhyo deyamasyeti śraddhādeyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3201: evaṅguṇasampanno 'sau jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇo viśiṣṭe deśe kāle ca kasmiṃścidāsa babhūva /
GV05chupsb_u:3202: sa ha sarvataḥ sarvāsu dikṣu grāmeṣu nagareṣu cā'vasathānetya vasanti yeṣvityāvasathāstānmāpayāñcakre kāritavānityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3203: sarvata eva me mamānnaṃ teṣvāvasatheṣu vasanto 'tsyanti bhokṣyanta ityevamabhiprāyaḥ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3207: ho ho 'yi bhallākṣa bhallākṣa jānaśruteḥ pautrāyaṇasya samaṃ divā jyotir ātataṃ tan mā prasāṅkṣīs tat tvāṃ mā pradhākṣīr iti // ChUp_4,1.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3208: ChUpBh_4,1.2 tatraivaṃ sati rājani tasmindharmakāle harmyatalasthe 'tha ha haṃsā niśāyāṃ rātrāvatipetuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3209: ṛṣayo devatā vā rājño 'nnadānaguṇaistoṣitāḥ santo haṃsārūpā bhūtvā rājño darśanagocare 'tipetuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3210: tattasminkāle teṣāṃ patatāṃ haṃsānāmekaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ patannagrataḥ patantaṃ haṃsamabhyuvādābhyuktavānho
GV05chupsb_u:3211: ho 'yīti bho bho iti sambodhya bhallākṣa bhallākṣetyādaraṃ darśayan yathā paśya paśyā'ścaryamiti tadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:3214: jānaśruteḥ pautrāyaṇasya samaṃ tulyaṃ divā dyulokena jyotiḥ prabhāsvaramannadānādijanitaprabhāvajamātataṃ vyāptaṃ dyulokaspṛgityarthaḥ /
