GV05chupsb_u:3216: tanmā prasāṅkṣīḥ sañjanaṃ saktiṃ tena jyotiṣā sambandhaṃ mā kārṣīrityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3217: tatprasañjanena tajjyotistvā tvāṃ mā pradhākṣīrmā dahatvityarthaḥ puruṣavyatyanena mā pradhākṣīditi //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3219: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvāca kam v ara enam etat santaṃ sayugvānam iva raikvam āttha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3220: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti // ChUp_4,1.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3221: ChUpBh_4,1.3 tamevamuktavantaṃ para itaro 'gragāmī pratyuvācāre nikṛṣṭo 'yaṃ rājā
GV05chupsb_u:3222: varākastaṃ kamu enaṃ santaṃ kena māhātmyena yuktaṃ santamiti kutsayatyenamevaṃ sabahumānametadvacanamāttha raikvamiva,
GV05chupsb_u:3223: sayugvānaṃ saha yugvanā gantryā vartata iti sayugvā raikvaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3226: itaraścā'ha-yo nu kathaṃ tvayocyate sayugvā raikva ityuktavantaṃ bhallākṣa āha śṛṇu yathā sa raikvaḥ //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3228: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3229: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti // ChUp_4,1.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3230: ChUpBh_4,1.4 yathā loke kṛtāyaḥ kṛto nāmāyo dyūtasamaye prasiddhaścaturaṅkaḥ sa yadā
GV05chupsb_u:3231: jayati dyūte pravṛttānāṃ tasmai vijitāya tadarthamitare tridvyekāṅkā adhare 'yāstretādvāparakalināmānaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3234: yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta evamenaṃ raikvaṃ kṛtāyasthānīyaṃ tretādyāyasthānīyaṃ sarvaṃ tadabhisametyantarbhavati raikve /
GV05chupsb_u:3235: kiṃ tadyatkiñca loke sarvāḥ prajāḥ sādhu śobhanaṃ dharmajātaṃ kurvanti tatsarvaṃ raikvasya dharme 'ntarbhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:3239: tadvedyamanyo 'pi yo veda tamapi sarvaprāṇidharmajātaṃ tatphalaṃ ca raikvamivābhisametītyanuvartate /
GV05chupsb_u:3240: sa evaṃbhūto mayā vidvānetadikta evamukto raikvavatsa eva kṛtāyasthānīyo bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3242: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇa upaśuśrāva /
GV05chupsb_u:3243: sa ha saṃjihāna eva kṣattāram uvācāṅgāre ha sayugvānam iva raikvam āttheti /
GV05chupsb_u:3244: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti // ChUp_4,1.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3245: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3246: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti // ChUp_4,1.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:3247: ChUpBh_4,1.5,6 tadu ha tadetadīdṛśaṃ haṃsavākyamātmanaḥ kutsārūpamanyasya viduṣo raikvādeḥ praśaṃsārūpamupaśuśrāva śrutavānharmyatalastho rājā jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3248: tacca haṃsavākyaṃ smaranneva paunaḥ punyena rātriśeṣamativāhayāmāsa /
GV05chupsb_u:3249: tataḥ sa bandibhī rājā stutiyuktābhirvāgbhiḥ pratibodhyamāna uvāca kṣattāraṃ saṃjihāna eva śayanaṃ nidrāṃ vā parityajanneva he 'ṅga vatsāre sa sayugvānamiva raikvamāttha kiṃ mām /
GV05chupsb_u:3251: athavā sayugvānaṃ raikvamāttha gatvā mama taddidṛkṣā;
GV05chupsb_u:3253: sa ca kṣattā pratyuvāca raikvānayanakāmo rājño 'bhiprāyajño yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti,
GV05chupsb_u:3254: rājñaivaṃ cokta ānetuṃ taccihnaṃ jñatumicchanyo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva ityavocat /
GV05chupsb_u:3257: sa ha kṣattānviṣya nāvidam iti pratyeyāya /
GV05chupsb_u:3258: taṃ hovāca yatrāre brāhmaṇasyānveṣaṇā tad enam arccheti // ChUp_4,1.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:3259: ChUpBh_4,1.7 tasya smaransa ha kṣattā nagaraṃ grāmaṃ vā gatvānviṣya raikvaṃ nāvidaṃ na vyajñāsiṣamiti pratyeyāya pratyāgatavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3260: taṃ hovāca kṣattaramare yatra brāhmaṇasya brahmavida ekānte 'raṇye nadīpulinādau
GV05chupsb_u:3261: vivikte deśe 'nveṣaṇānumārgaṇaṃ bhavati tattatrainaṃ raikvamarcha ṛccha gaccha tatra
GV05chupsb_u:3265: taṃ hābhyuvāda tvaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sayugvā raikva iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3266: ahaṃ hy arā 3 iti ha pratijajñe /
GV05chupsb_u:3267: sa ha kṣattāvidam iti pratyeyāya // ChUp_4,1.8 //
GV05chupsb_u:3268: ChUpBh_4,1.8 ityuktaḥ kṣattānviṣya taṃ vijane deśe 'dhastācchakaṭasya gantryāḥ pāmānaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3269: kharjūṃ kaṣamāṇaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvāyaṃ nūnaṃ sayugvā raikva ityupa samīpa upaviveśa
GV05chupsb_u:3272: tvamasi he bhagavo bhagavansayugvā raikva iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3273: evaṃ pṛṣṭo 'hamasmi hyarā 3 ara iti hānādara eva pratijajñe 'bhyupagatavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3274: sa taṃ vijñāyāvidaṃ vijñātavānasmīti pratyeyāya pratyāgata ityarthaḥ //8//
GV05chupsb_u:3277: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ tad ādāya praticakrame /
GV05chupsb_u:3279: ChUpBh_4,2.1 tattatra ṛṣergārhasthyaṃ pratyabhiprayaṃ buddhvā dhanārthitāṃ co ha,
GV05chupsb_u:3280: eva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ ṣaṭśatāni gavāṃ niṣkaṃ kaṇṭhahāramaśvatarīrathamaśvatarībhyāṃ yuktaṃ rathaṃ tadādāya dhanaṃ gṛhītvā praticakrame raikvaṃ prati gatavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3283: raikvemāni ṣaṭ śatāni gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīrathaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3284: anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatām upāssa iti // ChUp_4,2.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3285: ChUpBh_4,2.2 he raikva gavāṃ ṣaṭśatānīmāni tubhyaṃ mayā'nītānyayaṃ niṣko 'śvatarīrathaścāyametaddhanamādatsva
GV05chupsb_u:3286: bhagavo 'nuśādhi ca me māmetāṃ yāṃ ca devatāṃ tvamupāḥse taddevatopadeśena māmanuśādhītyarthaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3288: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvācāha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhir astv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3289: tad u ha punar eva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ sahasraṃ gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ duhitaraṃ tad ādāya praticakrame // ChUp_4,2.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3290: ChUpBh_4,2.3 tamevamuktavantaṃ rājānaṃ pratyuvāca paro raikvaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3293: hāretvā hāreṇa yuktetvā gantrī seyaṃ hāretvā gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu tiṣṭhatu na mamāparyāptena karmārthamanena prayojanamityabhiprāyo he śūdreti
GV05chupsb_u:3295: vidyāgrahaṇāya ca brāhmaṇasamīpopagamācchūdrasya cānadhikārātkathamidamananurūpaṃ raikveṇocyate he śūdreti /
GV05chupsb_u:3297: tenāsau śucā śrutvā raikvasya mahimānaṃ vā ādravatīti ṛṣirātmanaḥ parokṣajñatāṃ darśayañśūdretyāheti /
GV05chupsb_u:3298: śūdravadvā dhanenaivainaṃ vidyāgrahaṇāyopajagāma na ca śuśrūṣayā /
GV05chupsb_u:3302: taduharṣermataṃ jñātvā punareva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇo gavāṃ sahasramadhikaṃ jāyāṃ carṣerabhimatāṃ duhitaramātmanastadādāya praticakrame krāntavān
GV05chupsb_u:3305: raikvedaṃ sahasraṃ gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīratha iyaṃ jāyāyaṃ grāmo yasminn āsse 'nv eva mā bhagavaḥ śādhīti // ChUp_4,2.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3306: tasyā ha mukham upodgṛhṇann uvācājahāremāḥ śūdrānenaiva mukhenālāpayiṣyathā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3307: te haite raikvaparṇā nāma mahāvṛṣeṣu yatrāsmā uvāsa /
GV05chupsb_u:3309: ChUpBh_4,2.4,5 raikvedaṃ gavāṃ sahasramayaṃ niṣko 'yamaśvatarīratha iyaṃ jāyārthaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3310: mama duhitā'nītāyaṃ ca grāmo yasminnāḥse tiṣṭhasi sa ca tvadarthe mayā kalpitaḥ tadetatsarvamādāyānuśādhyeva
GV05chupsb_u:3311: mā māṃ he bhagava ityuktastasyā jāyārthamānītāyā rājño duhiturhaiva mukhaṃ dvāraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3314: vidyayā vā vidyā prāha tāni tīrthāni ṣaṇmama //
GV05chupsb_u:3318: śūdreti pūrvoktānukṛtimātraṃ na tu kāraṇāntarāpekṣayā pūrvavat /
GV05chupsb_u:3319: anenaiva mukhena vidyāgrahaṇatīrthenā'lāpayiṣyathā ālāpayasīti māṃ bhāṣayasītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3320: te haite grāmā raikvaparṇā nāma vikhyātā mahāvṛṣeṣu deśeṣu yatra yeṣu grāmeṣūvāsoṣitavān raikvastānasau grāmānadādasmai raikvāya rājā /
GV05chupsb_u:3321: tasmai rājñe dhanaṃ dattavate ha kilovāca vidyāṃ sa raikvaḥ //4-5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3325: yadā vā agnir udvāyati vāyum evāpyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:3327: yadā candro 'stam eti vāyum evāpyeti // ChUp_4,3.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3334: yadā yasminkāle vā agnirudvāyatyudvāsanaṃ prāpnotyupaśāmyati tadāsāvagnirvāyumevāpyeti vāyusvābhāvyamapigacchati /
GV05chupsb_u:3340: vāyunā hyastaṃ nīyate sūryaḥ calanasya vāyukāryatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3341: athavā pralaye sūryācandramasoḥ svarūpabhraṃśe tejorūpayorvāyāvevāpigamanaṃ syāt //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3346: ChUpBh_4,3.2 tathā yadā'pa ucchuṣyantyucchoṣamāpnuvanti tadā vāyumevāpiyanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3353: sa yadā svapiti prāṇam eva vāg apy eti /
GV05chupsb_u:3357: prāṇo hy evaitān sarvān saṃvṛṅkta iti // ChUp_4,3.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3360: sa puruṣo yadā yasminkāle svapiti prāṇameva vāgapyeti vāyumivāgniḥ prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ śrotraṃ prāṇaṃ manaḥ prāṇo hi yasmādevaitānvāgādīnsarvānsaṃvṛṅkta iti //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3363: vāyur eva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu // ChUp_4,3.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3364: ChUpBh_4,3.4 tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau saṃvarjanaguṇo vāyureva deveṣu saṃvargaḥ prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu vāgādiṣu mukhyaḥ //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3366: atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyam abhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe /
GV05chupsb_u:3367: tasmā u ha na dadatuḥ // ChUp_4,3.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3370: śaunakaṃ ca śunakasyāpatyaṃ śonakaṃ kāpeyaṃ kapigotramabhipratāriṇaṃ ca nāmataḥ kakṣasenasyāpatyaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3373: brahmacāriṇo brahmavinmānitāṃ buddhvā taṃ jijñāsamānau tasmā u bhikṣāṃ na jajaturna dattavantau ha kimayaṃ bakṣyatīti //5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3376: mahātmanaś caturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jagāra bhuvanasya gopāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3377: taṃ kāpeya nābhipaśyanti martyā abhipratārin bahudhā vasantam /
GV05chupsb_u:3378: yasmai vā etad annaṃ tasmā etan na dattam iti // ChUp_4,3.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:3379: ChUpBh_4,3.6 sa hovāca brahmacārī mahātmanaścatura iti dvitīyābahuvacanam /
GV05chupsb_u:3383: bhuvanasya bhavantyasminbhūtānīti bhuvanaṃ bhūrādiḥ sarvo lokastasya gopā gopāyitā rakṣitā goptetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3384: taṃ kaṃ prajāpatiṃ he kāpeya nābhipaśyanti na jānanti martyā maraṇadharmāṇo 'vivekino vā he 'bhipratārinbahudhādhyātmādhidaivatādhibhūtaprakārairvasantam
GV05chupsb_u:3385: yasmai vā etadahanyahanyannamadanāyā'hriyate saṃskriyate ca tasmai prajāpataya etadannaṃ na dattamiti //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:3387: tad u ha śaunakaḥ kāpeyaḥ pratimanvānaḥ pratyeyāya /
GV05chupsb_u:3388: ātmā devānāṃ janitā prajānāṃ hiraṅyadaṃṣṭro babhaso 'nasūriḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3389: mahāntam asya mahimānam āhur anadyamāno yad anannam atti /
GV05chupsb_u:3390: iti vai vayam brahmacārin nedam upāsmahe dattāsmai bhikṣām iti // ChUp_4,3.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:3391: ChUpBh_4,3.7 tadu ha brahmacāriṇo vacanaṃ śaunakaḥ kāpeyaḥ pratimanvāno manasā'locayanbrahmacāriṇaṃ pratyeyāyā'jagāma /
GV05chupsb_u:3392: gatvā cā'ha-yaṃ tvamavoco na paśyanti martyā iti taṃ vayaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3394: kiñca devānāmagnyādīnāmātmani saṃhṛtya grasitvā punarjanitotpādayitā vāyurūpeṇādhidaivatamagnyādīnām /
GV05chupsb_u:3395: adhyātmaṃ ca prāṇarūpeṇa vāgādīnāṃ prajānāṃ ca danitā /
GV05chupsb_u:3396: atha vā'tmā devānāmagnivāgādīnāṃ janitā prajānāṃ sthāvarajaṅgamānām /
GV05chupsb_u:3407: kiṃ tarhi parameva brahmopāsmaha iti varṇayanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3411: te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santas tat kṛtam /
GV05chupsb_u:3412: tasmāt sarvāsu dikṣv annam eva daśa kṛtam /
GV05chupsb_u:3415: sarvam asya idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavaty annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,3.8 //
GV05chupsb_u:3416: tasmā u ha daduste hi bhikṣām /
GV05chupsb_u:3417: te vai ye grasyante 'gnyādayo yaśca teṣāṃ grasitā vāyuḥ pañcānye vāgādibhyaḥ,
GV05chupsb_u:3420: te caturaṅka ekāya evaṃ catvāraḥ tryaṅkāyaḥ evaṃ trayo 'pare dvyaṅkāyaḥ evaṃ dvāvanyāvekāṅkāya evameko 'nya,
GV05chupsb_u:3422: yata evaṃ tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu daśasvapyagnyādyā vāgādyāśca daśasaṃkhyāsāmānyādannameva“daśākṣarā virāḍ virāḍannam” iti hi śrutiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3425: saiṣā virāḍdaśasaṃkhyā satyannaṃ cānnādyannādinī ca kṛtatvena daśasaṃkhyayānnaṃ kṛtasaṃkhyayānnādī
GV05chupsb_u:3426: tayā annānnādinyā idaṃ sarvaṃ jagaddaśadiksaṃsthaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kṛtasaṃkhyābhūtayopalabdham /
GV05chupsb_u:3427: evaṃvido 'sya sarvaṃ kṛtasaṃkhyābhūtasya daśadiksaṃbaddhaṃ dṛṣṭamupalabdhaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:3428: kiñcānnādaśca bhavati ya evaṃ veda yathoktadarśī /
GV05chupsb_u:3432: satyakāmo ha jābālo jabālāṃ mātaram āmantrayāṃ cakre /
GV05chupsb_u:3433: brahmacaryaṃ bhavati vivatsyāmi kiṃgotro nv aham asmīti // ChUp_4,4.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3434: ChUpBh_4,4.1 sarvaṃ vāgādyagnyādi cānnānnādatvasaṃstutaṃ jagadekīkṛtya ṣoḍaśadhā pravibhajya tasminbrahmadṛṣṭirvidhātavyetyārabhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:3436: satyakāmo ha nāmato haśabda aitihyārtho jabālāyā apatyaṃ jābālo jabalāṃ svāṃ mātaramāmantrayāñcakra āmantritavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3438: kiṅgotro 'haṃ kimasya mama gotraṃ so 'haṃ nvahamasmīti //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3441: nāham etad veda tāta yadgotras tvam asi /
GV05chupsb_u:3442: bahv aham carantī paricāriṇī yauvane tvām alabhe /
GV05chupsb_u:3443: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi /
GV05chupsb_u:3446: sa satyakāma eva jābālo bruvīthā iti // ChUp_4,4.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3447: ChUpBh_4,4.2 evaṃ pṛṣṭā jabālā sā hainaṃ putramuvāca-nāhametattava gotraṃ veda he tāta yadgotrastvamasi /
GV05chupsb_u:3449: paricāriṇī paricarantīti paricaraṇaśīlaivāhaṃ paricaraṇacittatayā gotrādismaraṇe mama mano nābhūt /
GV05chupsb_u:3453: jabālā tu nāmāhamasmi satyakāmo nāma tvamasi sa tvaṃ satyakāma evāhaṃ jābālo 'smītyācāryāya bruvīthāḥ yadyācāryeṇa pṛṣṭa ityabhiprāyaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3460: nāham etad veda bho yadgotro 'ham asmi /
GV05chupsb_u:3462: sā mā pratyabravīd bahv aham carantī paricariṇī yauvane tvām alabhe /
GV05chupsb_u:3463: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi /
GV05chupsb_u:3466: so 'haṃ satyakāmo jābālo 'smi bho iti // ChUp_4,4.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3467: ChUpBh_4,4.4 sa ha satyakāmo hāridrumataṃ haridrumato 'patyaṃ hāridrumataṃ gautamaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3468: gotrata etya gatvovāca brahmacaryaṃ bhagavati pūjāvati tvayi vatsyāmyata upeyāmupagaccheyaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3470: kiṅgotro nu somyāsīti vijñātakulagotraḥ śiṣya upanetavya iti pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha satyakāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3475: tasyā ahaṃ vacaḥ smarāmi so 'haṃ satyakāmo jābālo 'smi bho iti //3-4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3480: upa tvā neṣye na satyād agā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3481: tam upanīya kṛśānām abalānāṃ catuḥśatā gā nirākṛtya uvācemāḥ somyānusaṃvrajeti /
GV05chupsb_u:3486: ChUpBh_4,4.5 taṃ hovāca gautamo naitadvaco 'brāhmaṇo viśeṣeṇa vaktumarhatyārjavārthasaṃyuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:3489: ato brāhmaṇaṃ tvāmupaneṣye 'taḥ saṃskārārthaṃ homāya samidhaṃ somyā'haretyuktvā tamupanīya
GV05chupsb_u:3490: kṛśānāmabalānāṃ goyūthānnirākṛtyāpakṛṣya catuḥśatā catvāri śatāni gavāmuvācemā gāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3492: ityuktastā araṇyaṃ pratyabhiprasthāpayannuvāca-nāsahasreṇāpūrṇena sahasreṇa nā'varteya na pratyāgaccheyam /
GV05chupsb_u:3493: sa evamuktvā gā araṇyaṃ tṛṇodakabahulaṃ dvandvaṃrahitaṃ praveśya sa ha varṣagaṇaṃ dīrghaṃ provāsa proṣitavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3494: tāḥ samyaggāvo rakṣitā yadā yasminkāle sahasraṃ saṃpeduḥ saṃpannā babhūvuḥ //5//
GV05chupsb_u:3501: ChUpBh_4,5.1 tametaṃ śraddhātapobhyāṃ siddhaṃ vāyudevatā diksaṃbandhinī tuṣṭā satyṛṣabhamanupraviśyarṣabhāpannānugrahāyātha
GV05chupsb_u:3503: tamasau satyakāmo bhagava iti ha pratiśuśrāva prativacanaṃ dadau /
GV05chupsb_u:3504: praptāḥ somya sahasraṃ smaḥ pūrṇā tava pratijñātaḥ prāpaya no 'smānācāryakulam //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3506: brahmaṇaś ca te pādaṃ bravāṇi iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3513: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān nāma // ChUp_4,5.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3514: ChUpBh_4,5.2 kiñcāhaṃ braṅmaṇaḥ parasya te tubhyaṃ pādaṃ bravāṇi kathayāni /
GV05chupsb_u:3515: ityuktaḥ pratyuvāca-bravītu kathayatu me mahyaṃ bhagavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3517: prācī dikkalā brahmaṇaḥ pādasya caturtho bhāgaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3518: tathā pratīcī dikkalā dakṣiṇā dikkalodīcī dikkalaiṣa vai saimya brahmaṇaḥ pādaścatuśaṣkalaścatasraḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3519: kalā avayavā yasya so 'yaṃ catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavānnāma prakāśavānityavaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3523: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste prakāśavān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:3524: prakāśavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste // ChUp_4,5.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3525: ChUpBh_4,5.3 sa yaḥ kaścidevaṃ yathoktametaṃ brahmaṇaścatuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ vidvānprakāśavānityanena
GV05chupsb_u:3526: guṇena viśiṣṭamupāste tasyedaṃ phalaṃ prakāśavānasmin loke bhavati prakhyāto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3527: tathādṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prakāśavato ha lokāndevādisaṃbandhino mṛtaḥ sañjayati prāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:3528: ya etameva vidvāṃścatuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavānityupāste //3//
GV05chupsb_u:3532: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra /
GV05chupsb_u:3533: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa // ChUp_4,6.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3535: sa satyākāmo ha śvobhūte paredyurnaityakaṃ nityaṃ karma kṛtvā gā abhiprasthāpayāñcakārā'cāryakulaṃ prati /
GV05chupsb_u:3536: tāḥ śanaiścarantya ācāryakulābhimukhyaḥ prasthitā yatra yasminkāle deśe 'bhi sāyaṃ niśāyāmabhisaṃbabhūvurekatrābhimukhyaḥ saṃbhūtāḥ,
GV05chupsb_u:3537: tatrāgnimupasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidhamādhāya paścādagneḥ praṅupopaviveśa ṛṣabhavaco dhyāyan //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3542: tamasau satyakāmo bhagava iti ha pratiśuśrāva prativacanaṃ dadau //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3551: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo 'nantavān nāma // ChUp_4,6.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3552: ChUpBh_4,6.3 brahmaṇaḥ somya te pādaṃ bravāṇīti bravītu me bhagavānīti tasmai hovāca pṛthivī kalāntarikṣaṃ kalā dyauḥ kalā samudraḥ kaletyātmagocarameva darśanamagnirabravīt /
GV05chupsb_u:3553: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo 'nantavānnāma //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3555: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste 'nantavān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:3556: anantavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste // ChUp_4,6.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3557: ChUpBh_4,6.4 sa yaḥ kaścidyathoktaṃ pādamanantavattvena guṇenopāste sa tathaiva tadguṇo bhavatyasmiṃlloke /
GV05chupsb_u:3558: mṛtaścānantavato ha lokānsa jayati ya etamevamityādi pūrvavat //4//
GV05chupsb_u:3560: haṃsaste pādaṃ vakteti sa ha śvobhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāñcakāra tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvustatrāgnimupasamādhāyā gā uparudhya samidhamādhāya paścādagneḥ prāṅupopaviveśa //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3561: taṃ haṃsa upanipatyābhyuvāda satyakāma 3 iti bhagava iti ha pratiśuśrāva //2//
GV05chupsb_u:3574: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān nāma // ChUp_4,7.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3575: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste jyotiṣmān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:3576: jyotiṣmato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste // ChUp_4,7.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3577: ChUpBh_4,7.3,4 agniḥkalā sūryaḥ kalā candraḥ kalā vidyutkalaiṣa vai somyeti jyotirviṣayameva ca darśanaṃ provācāto haṃsasyā'dityatvaṃ pratīyate
GV05chupsb_u:3579: candrādityādīnāṃ jyotiṣmata eva ca mṛtvā lokāñjayati /
GV05chupsb_u:3584: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra /
GV05chupsb_u:3585: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa // ChUp_4,8.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3587: madgurudakacaraḥ pakṣī sa cāpsambandhātprāṇaḥ sa ha śvobhūta ityādi pūrvavat //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3598: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇa āyatanavān nāma // ChUp_4,8.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3599: ChUpBh_4,8.2,3 sa ca madguḥ prāṇaḥ svaviṣayameva ca darśanamuvāca prāṇaḥ kaletyādi,
GV05chupsb_u:3601: āyatanaṃ nāma manaḥ sarvakaraṇopahṛtānāṃ bhogānāṃ tadyasminpāde vidyata ityāyatanavānnāma pādaḥ //2-3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3603: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāsta āyatanavān asmiṃl loke bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:3604: āyatanavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāste // ChUp_4,8.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3605: ChUpBh_4,8.4 taṃ pādaṃ tathaivopāste yaḥ sa āyatanavānāśrayavānasmiṃlloke bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:3613: ChUpBh_4,9.1 sa evaṃ brahmavitsanprāpa ha prāptavānācāryakulam /
GV05chupsb_u:3620: bhagavāṃs tv eva me kāme brūyāt // ChUp_4,9.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3628: ato 'nye manuṣyebhya iti ha pratijajñe pratijñātavān /
GV05chupsb_u:3629: bhagavāṃstveva me kāme mamecchāyāṃ brūyātkimanyairuktena nāhaṃ tadgaṇayāmītyabhiprāyaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3631: śrutaṃ hy eva me bhagavaddṛśebhya ācāryād dhaiva vidyā viditā sādhiṣṭhaṃ prāpatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:3633: atra ha na kiṃcana vīyāyeti vīyāyeti // ChUp_4,9.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3634: ChUpBh_4,9.3 kiñca śrutaṃ hi yasmānmama vidyata evāsminnarthe bhagavatsamebhya ṝṣibhyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3635: ācāryāddhaiva vidyā viditā sādhiṣṭhaṃ sādhutamatvaṃ prāpaditi prāpnotītyato bhagavāneba brūyādityukta ācāryo 'bravīttasmai tāmeva daivatairuktāṃ vidyām /
GV05chupsb_u:3636: atra ha na kiñcana ṣoḍaśakalavidyāyāḥ kiñcidekadeśamātramapi na vīyāya na vigatamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3640: upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacāryam uvāsa /
GV05chupsb_u:3641: tasya ha dvādaśa vārṣāny agnīn paricacāra /
GV05chupsb_u:3642: sa ha smānyān antevāsinaḥ samāvartayaṃs taṃ ha smaiva na samāvartayati // ChUp_4,10.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3643: ChUpBh_4,10.1 punarbrahmavidyāṃ prakārāntareṇa vakṣyāmītyārabheta gatiṃ ca tadvido 'gnividyāṃ ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3644: ākhyāyikā pūrvavacchraddhātapasorbrahmavidyāsādhanatvapradaśranārthā-upakosalo ha vai nāmataḥ kamalasyāpatyaṃ kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa
GV05chupsb_u:3647: sa ha smā'cāryo 'nyānbrahmacāriṇaḥ svādhyāyaṃ grāhayitvā samāvartayaṃstamevopakosalamekaṃ na samāvartayati sma ha //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3649: taṃ jāyovāca tapto brahmacārī kuśalam agnīn paricacārīt /
GV05chupsb_u:3655: ato 'smadbhaktaṃ na samāvartayatīti jñātvā tvāmagnayo mā paripravocangarhāṃ tava mā kuryuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3657: tasmā evaṃ jāyayokto 'pi hāprocyaivānuktvaiva kiñcitpravāsāṃcakre pravasitavān //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3662: sa ha uvāca bahava ime 'smin puruṣe kāmā nānātyāyāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3665: ChUpBh_4,10.3 sa hopakosalo vyādhinā mānasena duḥkhenānaśitumanaśanaṃ kartuṃ dadhre dhṛtavānmanaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3666: taṃ tūṣṇīmagnyagāre 'vasthitamācāryajāyovāca he brahmacārinnaśāna bhuṅkṣva kiṃ nu kasmānnu kāraṇānnāśnāsīti /
GV05chupsb_u:3667: sa hovāca bahavo 'neke 'sminpuruṣe 'kṛtārthe prākṛte kāmā icchāḥ kartavyaṃ prati
GV05chupsb_u:3668: nānātyayo 'tigamanaṃ yeṣāṃ vyādhīnāṃ kartavyacintānāṃ te nānātyayā vyādhayaḥ kartavyatāprāptinimittāni
GV05chupsb_u:3676: prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti // ChUp_4,10.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3677: ChUpBh_4,10.4 uktvā tūṣṇīṃbhūte brahmacāriṇyatha hāgnayaḥ śuśrūṣayā'varjitāḥ kāruṇyāviṣṭāḥ santasrayo 'pi samūdire saṃbhūyoktavantaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3678: hantedānīmasmai brahmacāriṇe 'smadbhaktāya duḥkhitāya tapasvine śraddadhānāya sarve 'nuśāsmo 'nuprabravāma brahmavidyāmiti /
GV05chupsb_u:3679: evaṃ saṃpradhārya tasmai hocuruktavantaḥ prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3683: kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:3685: yad vāva kaṃ tad eva kham /
GV05chupsb_u:3686: yad eva khaṃ tad eva kam iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3687: prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai tad ākāśaṃ cocuḥ // ChUp_4,10.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3688: ChUpBh_4,10.5 sa hovāca brahmacārī vijānāmyahaṃ yadbhavadbhiruktaṃ prasiddhapadārthakatvātprāṇo brahmeti /
GV05chupsb_u:3689: yasminsati jīvanaṃ yadapagame ca na bhavatīti tasminvāyuviśeṣe loke rūḍho 'to yuktaṃ brahmatvaṃ tasya /
GV05chupsb_u:3691: kaṃ ca tu khaṃ na vijānāmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:3694: nṛnaṃ sukhasya kaṃśabdavācyasya kṣaṇapradhvaṃsitvātkhaṃśabdavācyasya cā'kāśasyācetanasya kathaṃ brahmatvamiti manyate /
GV05chupsb_u:3697: tamevamuktantaṃ brahmacāriṇaṃ te hāgnayaḥ ūcuḥ yadvāva yadeva vayaṃ kamavocāma tadeva
GV05chupsb_u:3698: khamākāśamityevaṃ khena viśeṣyamāṇaṃ kaṃ viṣayendrisaṃyogajātsukhānnivartitaṃ syānnīleneva
GV05chupsb_u:3700: yadeva khamityākāśamavocāma tadeva ca kaṃ sukhamiti jānīhi /
GV05chupsb_u:3701: evaṃ ca sukhena viśeṣyamāṇaṃ khaṃ bhautikādacetanātkhānnivartitaṃ syānnīlotpalavadeva /
GV05chupsb_u:3704: nanvākāśaṃ cetsukhena viśeṣayitumiṣṭamastvanyataradeva viśeṣaṇaṃ yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khamityatiriktamitarat /
GV05chupsb_u:3705: yadeva khaṃ tadeva kamiti pūrvaviśeṣeṇaṃ vā /
GV05chupsb_u:3707: sukhenā'kāśe viśeṣite vyāvṛttirubhayorarthaprāptaiveti cetsatyamevaṃ kintu sukhena
GV05chupsb_u:3708: viśeṣitasyaivā'kāśasya dhyeyatvaṃ vihitaṃ na tvākāśaguṇasya viśeṣaṇasya sukhasya
GV05chupsb_u:3714: yadi hi sukhaguṇaviśiṣṭasya khasya dhyeyatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ syātkaṃ khaṃ brahmeti brūyuragnayaḥ prathamam /
GV05chupsb_u:3716: kiṃ tarhi kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti /
GV05chupsb_u:3717: ato brahmacāriṇo mohāpanayanāya kaṅkhaṃśabdayoritaretaraviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatva nirdeśo yukta eva yadvāva kamityādiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3718: tadetadagnibhiruktaṃ vākyārthamasmadbodhāya śrutirāha-prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai brahmacāriṇe /
GV05chupsb_u:3721: sukhaguṇavattvanirdeśāttaṃ cā'kāśaṃ sukhaguṇaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma tatsthaṃ ca prāṇaṃ brahmasamparkādeva brahmetyubhayaṃ prāṇaṃ cā'kāśaṃ ca samuccitya brahmaṇī ūcuragnaya iti //5//
GV05chupsb_u:3724: atha hainaṃ gārhapatyo 'nuśaśāsa pṛthivy agnir annam āditya iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3725: ya eṣa āditye puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti // ChUp_4,11.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3730: tatra ya āditya eṣa puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmi gārhapatyo 'gniryaśca gārhapatyo 'gniḥ sa evāhamādityo puruṣo 'smīti /
GV05chupsb_u:3736: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:3742: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3743: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste // ChUp_4,11.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3744: ChUpBh_4,11.2 sa yaḥ kaścidevaṃ yathoktaṃ gārhapatyamagnimannānnādatvena caturdhā pravibhaktamupāste so 'pahate vināśayati pāpakṛtyāṃ pāpaṃ karma /
GV05chupsb_u:3745: lokī lokavāṃścāsmadāyena lokenā'gneyena tadvānbhavati yathā vayamiha ca loke /
GV05chupsb_u:3746: sarvaṃ varṣaśatamāyureti prāpnoti jyogujjavalaṃ jīvati nāprakhyāta ityetat /
GV05chupsb_u:3747: na cāsyāvarāśca te puruṣāścāsya viduṣaḥ santatijā ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3749: kiṃ ca taṃ vayamupabhuñjāmaḥ pālayāmo 'smiṃśca loke jīvantamamuṣmiṃśca paraloke /
GV05chupsb_u:3753: atha ha enam anvāhāryapacano 'nuśaśāsa āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3754: ya eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛṣyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti // ChUp_4,12.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3755: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:3761: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3762: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste // ChUp_4,12.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3763: ChUpBh_4,12.1,2 atha hainamanvāhāryapacano 'nuśaśāsa dakṣiṇāgnirāpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi
GV05chupsb_u:3764: candramā ityetā mama catasrastanavaścaturdhāhamanvāhāryapacana ātmānaṃ pravibhajyāvasthitaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3765: tatra ya eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmi sa evāhamasmīti pūrvavat /
GV05chupsb_u:3774: atha hainam āhavanīyo 'nuśaśāsa prāṇa ākāśo dyaur vidyud iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3775: ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa evāham asmīti // ChUp_4,13.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3776: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:3782: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3783: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste // ChUp_4,13.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3784: ChUpBh_4,13.1,2 atha hainamāhavanīyo 'nuśaśāsa prāṇa ākāśo dyaurvidyuditi mamāpyetāścatasrastanavaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3785: ya eva vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'hamasmītyādi pūrvavatsāmānyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3795: ChUpBh_4,14.1 te punaḥ sambhūyocurhepakosalaiṣā somya te tavāsmadvidyāgnividyetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3796: ātmavidyā pūrvoktā prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti ca /
GV05chupsb_u:3797: ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā vidyāphalaprāptaya ityuktvoparemuragnayaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3804: ko nu mānuśiśyād bho itīhāpeva nihnute /
GV05chupsb_u:3805: ime nūnam īdṛśā anyādṛśā itīhāgnīn abhyūde /
GV05chupsb_u:3806: kiṃ nu somya kila te 'vocann iti // ChUp_4,14.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3809: ahaṃ tu te tad vakṣyāmi yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evam evaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:3813: brahmavida iva somya te mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhāti ko nu tvānuśaśāsetyuktaḥ pratyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:3814: ko nu mānuśiṣyādanuśāsanaṃ kuryādbho bhagavaṃstvayi proṣita itīhāpeva nihnute 'panihnuta iveti vyavahitena sambandho na cāpanihnute na ca yatāvadagnibhiruktaṃ bravītītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3815: kathamime 'gnayo mayā paricaritā uktavanto nūnaṃ yatastvāṃ dṛṣṭvā vepamānā ivedṛśā dṛśyante pūrvamanyādṛśāḥ santa itīhāgnīnabhyūde 'bhyuktavānkākvāgnīndarśayan
GV05chupsb_u:3816: kiṃ nu somya kila te tubhyamavocannagnaya iti pṛṣṭa ityevamidamuktavanta ityevaṃ ha pratijajñe pratijñātavānpratīkamātraṃ kiñcinna sarvaṃ yathoktamagnibhiruktamavocat
GV05chupsb_u:3817: yata āhā'cāryo lokānvāva pṛthivyādīnhe somya kila te 'vocanna brahma sākalyena /
GV05chupsb_u:3818: ahaṃ tu te tubhyaṃ tadbrahma yadicchasi tvaṃ śrotuṃ vakṣyāmi,
GV05chupsb_u:3819: śṛṇu tasya mayocyamānasya brahmaṇo jñānamāhātmyaṃ yathā puṣkarapalāśe padmapatra
GV05chupsb_u:3820: āpo na śilaṣyanta evaṃ yatā vakṣyāmi brahmaivaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śilaṣyate na sambadhyata
GV05chupsb_u:3821: ityevamuktavatyācārya āhopakosalo bravītu me bhagavāniti tasmai hovācā'cāryaḥ //2-3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3824: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:3826: tad yady apy asmin sarpir vodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati // ChUp_4,15.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3828: nanvagnibhiruktaṃ vitathaṃ yata ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakteti gatimātrasya vaktetyavocanbhaviṣyadviṣayāparijñānaṃ cāgnīnam /
GV05chupsb_u:3832: etadamṛtamamaraṇadharmyavināśyata evābhayaṃ yasya hi vināśāśaṅkā tasya bhayopapattistadabhāvādabhayamata evaitadbrahma bṛhadanantamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:3833: kiñcāsya brahmaṇo 'kṣipuruṣasya māhātmyaṃ tattatra puruṣasya sthāne 'kṣiṇi yadyapyasminyarpirvodakaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3834: vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati pakṣmāveva gacchati na cakṣuṣā sambandhyate padmapatreṇevodakam /
GV05chupsb_u:3835: sthānasyāpyetanmāhātmyaṃ kiṃ punaḥ sthānino 'kṣipuruṣasya nirañjanatvaṃ vaktavyamityabhiprāyaḥ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3839: sarvāṇy enaṃ vāmāny abhisaṃyanti ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,15.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3840: ChUpBh_4,15.2 etaṃ yathoktaṃ puruṣaṃ saṃyadvāma ityācakṣate /
GV05chupsb_u:3842: yasmādetaṃ sarvāṇi vāmāni vananīyāni saṃbhajanīyāni śobhanānyabhisaṃyantyabhisaṅgacchantītyataḥ saṃyadvāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3843: tathaivaṃvidamenaṃ sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti ya evaṃ veda //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3847: sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,15.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3848: ChUpBh_4,15.3 eṣa u eva vāmanīryasmādeṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni puṇyakarmaphalāni puṇyānurūpaṃ prāṇibhyo nayati prāpayati vahati cā'tmadharmatvena
GV05chupsb_u:3849: viduṣaḥ phalaṃ-sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati ya evaṃ veda //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3853: sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_4,15.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3854: ChUpBh_4,15.4 eṣa u eva bhāmanīreṣa hi yasmātsarveṣu lokeṣvādityacandrāgnyādirūpairbhāti dīpyate /
GV05chupsb_u:3855: “tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti“iti śruterato bhāmāni nayatīti bhāmanīḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3856: ya evaṃ vedāsāvapi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3858: atha yad u caivāsmiñ chavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣam evābhisaṃbhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3861: āpūryamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaḍ udaṅṅ eti māsāṃs tān /
GV05chupsb_u:3869: etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante nāvartante // ChUp_4,15.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3871: yadyadi u caivāsminnevaṃvidi śavyaṃ śavakarma mṛte kurvanti yadi ca na kurvanti ṛtvijaḥ sarvathāpyevaṃvittena śavakarmaṇākṛtenāpi pratibaddho na brahma[dmaṭaprāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:3872: na ca kṛtena śavakarmaṇāsya kaścanābhyadhiko lokaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3874: śavakarmaṇyanādaraṃ darśayanvidyāṃ stauti na punaḥ śavakarmaivaṃvido na kartavyamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:3875: akriyamāṇe hi śavakarmaṇi karmaṇā phalārambhe pratibandhaḥ kaścidanumīyate 'nyatra /
GV05chupsb_u:3876: yata iha vidyāphalārambhakāle śavakarma syādvā na veti vidyāvato 'pratibandhena phalārambhaṃ darśayati /
GV05chupsb_u:3878: ca teṣāmanyatkarma bhavatu mā vā bhūtsarvathāpi te 'rciṣamevābhisambhavantyarcirabhimāninīṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3881: diśameti savitā tānmāsānuttarāyaṇadevatāṃ tebhyo māsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ saṃvatsaradevatāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3883: kaścidbrahmalokādetyāmānavo mānavyāṃ sṛṣṭau bhavo mānavo na mānavo 'mānavaḥ sa puruṣa
GV05chupsb_u:3886: brahmaiva sanbrahmāpyetīti hi tatra vaktuṃ nyāyyam /
GV05chupsb_u:3890: eṣa devapathaḥ devairarcirādibhiḥ gamayitṛtvenādhikṛtaiḥ upalakṣitaḥ panthā devapatha ucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:3891: brahma gantavyaṃ tena copalakṣita iti brahmapathaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3892: etena pratipadyamānā gacchanto brahmemaṃ mānavaṃ manusambandhinaṃ manoḥ sṛṣṭilakṣaṇamāvata
GV05chupsb_u:3893: nā'vartanta āvartante 'smiñjananamaraṇaprabandhacakrārūḍhā ghaṭīyantravatpunaḥ punarityārvatastaṃ na pratipadyante /
GV05chupsb_u:3894: nāvartante nā'vartante iti dviruktiḥ saphalāyā vidyāyāḥ parisamāptipradarśanārthā //5//
GV05chupsb_u:3897: eṣa ha vai yajño yo 'yaṃ pavate /
GV05chupsb_u:3898: eṣa ha yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti /
GV05chupsb_u:3899: yad eṣa yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti /
GV05chupsb_u:3901: tasya manaś ca vāk ca vartanī // ChUp_4,16.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:3902: ChUpBh_4,16.1 rahasyaprakaraṇe prasaṅgādāraṇyakatvasāmānyācca yajñe kṣata utpanne
GV05chupsb_u:3903: vyāhṛtayaḥ prāyaścittārthā vidhātavyāstadabhijñasya cartvijo brahmaṇo maunamityata
GV05chupsb_u:3904: idamārabhyate-eṣa ha vā eṣa vāyuryo 'yaṃ pavate 'yaṃ yajñaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3910: “vāta eva yajñasyā'rambhako vātaḥ pratiṣṭhā“iti ca śravaṇāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3911: eṣa ha yangacchaṃścalannidaṃ sarvaṃ jagatpunāti pāvayati śodhayati /
GV05chupsb_u:3913: doṣanirasanaṃ calato hi dṛṣṭaṃ na sthirasya /
GV05chupsb_u:3914: yadyasmācca yannaṣa idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti tasmādeṣa eva yajño yatpunātīti /
GV05chupsb_u:3915: tasyāsyaivaṃ viśiṣṭasya yajñasya vākca mantroccāraṇe vyāpṛtā /
GV05chupsb_u:3917: te ete vāṅmanase vartanī mārgau yābhyāṃ yajñastāyamānaḥ pravartate te vartanī /
GV05chupsb_u:3918: prāṇāpānaparicalanavatyā hi“vācaścittasya cottarottarakramo yadyajñaḥ“iti hi śrutyantaram /
GV05chupsb_u:3919: ato vāṅmanasābhyāṃ yajño vartata iti vāṅmanase vartanī ucyete yajñasya //1//
GV05chupsb_u:3923: sa yatropākṛte prātaranuvāke purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadati // ChUp_4,16.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:3926: sa yathaikapād vrajan ratho vaikena cakreṇa vartamāno riṣyaty evam asya yajño riṣyati /
GV05chupsb_u:3929: ChUpBh_4,16.3 tayorvartanyoranyatarāṃ vartanīṃ manasā vivekajñānavatā saṃskaroti
GV05chupsb_u:3932: tatraivaṃ sati vāṅmanase vartanī saṃskārye yajñe /
GV05chupsb_u:3933: atha sa brahmā yatra yasminkāla upākṛte prārabdhe prātaranuvāke śasre purā pūrvaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:3934: paridhānīyāyā ṛco brahmaitasminnantare kāle vyavavadati maunaṃ parityajati yadi tadānyatarāmeva
GV05chupsb_u:3935: vāagvartanīṃ saṃskaroti brahmaṇāsaṃskriyamāṇā manovartanī hīyate vinaśyati cchidrībhavatyanyatarā /
GV05chupsb_u:3939: ratho vaikena cakreṇa vartamāno gacchanriṣyatyevamasya yajamānasya kubrahmaṇā yajño riṣyati vinaśyati /
GV05chupsb_u:3943: sa taṃ yajñamiṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ pāpīyānpāpataro bhavati //2-3 //
GV05chupsb_u:3945: atha yatra upākṛte prātaranuvāke na purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadaty ubhe eva vartanī saṃskurvanti /
GV05chupsb_u:3947: sa yathobhayapād vrajan ratho vobhābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ vartamānaḥ pratitiṣṭhaty evam asya yajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati yajñaṃ pratitiṣṭhantaṃ yajamāno 'nu pratitiṣṭhati /
GV05chupsb_u:3949: ChUpBh_4,16.4,5 atha punaryatra brahmā vidvānmaunaṃ parigṛhya vāgvisargamakurvanvartate
GV05chupsb_u:3950: yāvatparidhānīyāyā na vyavavadati tathaiva sarvartvija ubhe eva vartanī saṃskurvanti
GV05chupsb_u:3954: evamasya yajamānasya yajñaḥ svavartanībhyāṃ vartamānaḥ pratitiṣṭhati svenā'tmanāvinaśyanvartata ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:3955: yajñaṃ pratitiṣṭhantaṃ yajamāno 'nupratitiṣṭhati sa yajamāna evaṃ maunavijñānavadbrahmopetaṃ yajñamiṣṭvā śreyānbhavati śreṣṭho bhavatītyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:3963: ChUpBh_4,17.1 atra brahmaṇo maunaṃ vihitaṃ tadreṣe brahmatvakarmaṇi cānyasmiṃśca
GV05chupsb_u:3964: hotrādikarmareṣe vyāhṛtihomaḥ prāyaścittamiti tadarthaṃ vyāhṛtayo vidhātavyā ityāha-prajāpatirlokānabhyatapallokānuddiśya
GV05chupsb_u:3977: ChUpBh_4,17.2 punarapyevamevamagnyādyāḥ sa etāstisro devatā uddiśyābhyatapat /
GV05chupsb_u:3985: tad yady ṛkto riṣyed bhūḥ svāheti gārhapatye juhuyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3986: ṛcām eva tadrasenarcāṃ vīryeṇarcāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti // ChUp_4,17.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3992: atastattatra yajñe yadyṛkta ṛksambandhādṛṅnimittaṃ riṣyedyajñaḥ kṣataṃ prāpnuyādbhūḥ svāheti gārhapatye juhuyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3995: rasenarcāṃ vīryeṇaujasarcāṃ yajñasya ṛksambandhino yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ vicchinnaṃ kṣatarūpamutpannaṃ sandadhāti pratisandhatte //3-4 //
GV05chupsb_u:3997: atha yadi yajuṣṭo riṣyed bhuvaḥ svāheti dakṣiṇāgnau juhuyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:3998: yajuṣām eva tadrasena yajuṣāṃ vīryeṇa yajuṣāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti // ChUp_4,17.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:3999: atha yadi sāmato riṣyet svaḥ svāhety āhavanīye juhuyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4000: sāmnām eva tadrasena sāmnāṃ vīryeṇa sāmnāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti // ChUp_4,17.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:4001: ChUpBh_4,17.5,6 atha yadi yajuṣṭo yajurnimittaṃ riṣyedbhuvaḥ svāheti dakṣiṇāgnau juhuyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4002: tathā sāmanimitte reṣe svaḥ svāhetyāhavanīye juhuyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4011: suvarṇena rajataṃ rajatena trapu trapuṇā sīsaṃ sīsena lohaṃ lohena dāru dāru carmaṇā // ChUp_4,17.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:4012: evam eṣāṃ lokānām āsāṃ devatānām asyās trayyā vidyāyā vīryeṇa yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti /
GV05chupsb_u:4013: bheṣajakṛto ha vā eṣa yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati // ChUp_4,17.8 //
GV05chupsb_u:4018: rajatena tathā trapu trapuṇā sīsaṃ sīsena loha lohena dāru dāru carmaṇā carmabandhanena /
GV05chupsb_u:4019: evameṣāṃ lokānāmāsāṃ devatānāmasyāsrayyā vidyāyā vīryeṇa rasākhyenaujasā yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ sandadhāti /
GV05chupsb_u:4021: rogārta iva pumāṃścikitsakena suśikṣitenaiṣa yajño bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4025: eṣa ha vā udakpravaṇo yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4026: evaṃvidaṃ ha vā eṣā brahmāṇam anu gāthā /
GV05chupsb_u:4027: yato yata āvartate tat tad gacchati // ChUp_4,17.9 //
GV05chupsb_u:4028: ChUpBh_4,17.9 kiñcaiṣa ha vā udakpravaṇa udaṅnimno dakṣiṇocchrāyo yajño bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4030: yatraivaṃvidbrahmā bhavatyevaṃvidaṃ ha vai brahmāṇamṛtvijaṃ pratyeṣānugāthā brahmaṇaḥ stutiparā /
GV05chupsb_u:4031: yato yata āvartate karma pradeśādṛtvijāṃ yajñaḥ kṣatībhavaṃstattadyajñasya kṣatarūpaṃ pratisandadhatprāyaścittena gacchati paripālayatītyetat
GV05chupsb_u:4033: mānavo brahmaivaika ṛtvikkurūnaśvābhirakṣatyevaṃviddha vai brahmā yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4034: sarvāṃś cartvijo 'bhirakṣati tasmādevaṃvidameva brahmāṇaṃ kurvīta nānevaṃvidaṃ nānevaṃvidam //10 //
GV05chupsb_u:4037: evaṃvid dha vai brahmā yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ sarvāṃś cartvijo 'bhirakṣati /
GV05chupsb_u:4038: tasmād evaṃvidam eva brahmāṇaṃ kurvīta nānevaṃvidaṃ nānevaṃvidam // ChUp_4,17.10 //
GV05chupsb_u:4039: ChUpBh_4,17.10 mānavo bhrahmā maunācaraṇānmananādvā jñāvanattvāttato brahmaivaikartvikkurūnkartṝn /
GV05chupsb_u:4040: yoddhṝnārūḍhānaśvā vaḍavā yathābhirakṣatyevaṃviddha vai brahmā yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ sarvāṃścartvijo 'bhirakṣati tatkṛtadoṣāpanayanāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4041: yata evaṃviśiṣṭo brahmā vidvāṃstasmādevaṃvidameva yathoktavyāhṛtyādividaṃ brahmāṇaṃ kurvīta nānevaṃvidaṃ kadācaneti /
GV05chupsb_u:4047: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca ha vai śreṣṭhaś ca bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4048: prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca // ChUp_5,1.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:4050: athedānīṃ pañcame 'dhyāye pañcāgnivido gṛhasthasyordhvaretasāṃ ca śraddhālūnāṃ vidyāntaraśīlināṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4051: tāmeva gatimanūdyānyā dakṣiṇadiksambandhinī kevalakarmiṇāṃ dhūmādilakṣaṇā punarāvṛttirūpā
GV05chupsb_u:4053: prāṇaḥ śreṣṭho vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇo vāva saṃvarga ityādi ca bahuśo 'tīte granthe prāṇagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GV05chupsb_u:4054: sa kathaṃ śreṣṭho vāgādiṣu sarvaiḥ saṃhatyakāritvāviśeṣe?
GV05chupsb_u:4055: kathaṃ ca tasyopāsanamiti tasya śreṣṭhatvādiguṇavidhitsayedamanantaramārabhyate-yo ha vai kaścijjyeṣṭhaṃ ca prathamaṃ vayasā vāva jyeṣṭhaśca vayasā vāgādibhyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4056: garbhasthe hi puruṣe prāṇasya vṛttirvāgādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ labdhātmikā bhavati yayā garbho
GV05chupsb_u:4057: vivardhate cakṣurādisthānāvayavaniṣpattau satyāṃ paścādvāgādīnāṃ vṛttilābha iti prāṇo
GV05chupsb_u:4062: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhaṃ veda vasiṣṭho ha svānāṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4064: ChUpBh_5,1.2 yo ha vai vasiṣṭhaṃ vasitṛtamamācchādayitṛtamaṃ vasumattamaṃ vā yo veda sa tathaiva vasiṣṭho ha bhavati svānāṃ jñātīnām /
GV05chupsb_u:4066: vāgvāva vasiṣṭho vāgmino hi puruṣā vasantyabhibhavantyanyānvasumattamāścāto vāgvasiṣṭhaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:4068: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhaty asmiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca /
GV05chupsb_u:4070: ChUpBh_5,1.3 yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda sa cāsmiṃlloke 'muṣmiṃśca pare pratitiṣṭhati ha /

GV05chupsb_u:4341: vettha pathormārgayoḥ sahaprayāṇayordevayānasya pitṛyāṇasya ca vyāvartanamitaretaraviyogasthānaṃ saha gacchatāmityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4344: vettha yathāsau loko na saṃpūryata 3 iti /
GV05chupsb_u:4346: vettha yathā pañcamyām āhutāv āpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantīti /
GV05chupsb_u:4348: ChUpBh_5,3.3 vetthā yathāsau lokaḥ pitṛsambandhī yaṃ prāpya punarāvartante bahubhiḥ prayadbhirapi yena kāramena na sampūryata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:4350: vettha yathā yena krameṇa pañcamyāṃ pañcasaṃkhyākāyāmāhutau hutāyāmāhutinirvṛttā
GV05chupsb_u:4351: āhutisādhanāścā'paḥ puruṣavacasaḥ puruṣa ityevaṃ vaco 'bhidhānaṃ yāsāṃ hūyamānānāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4352: krameṇa ṣaṣṭhāhutibhūtānāṃ tāḥ puruṣavacasaḥ puruṣaśabdavācyā bhavanti puruṣākhyāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4357: athānu kim anu śiṣṭho 'vocathā yo hīmāni na vidyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4360: taṃ hovācānanuśiṣya vāva kila mā bhagavān abravīd anu tvāśiṣam iti // ChUp_5,3.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:4362: yo hīmāni mayā pṛṣṭānyarthajātāni na vidyānna vijānītyātkathaṃ sa vidvatsvanuśiṣṭo 'smīti bruvīta /
GV05chupsb_u:4363: ityevaṃ sa śvetaketuḥ rājñā'yasta āyāsitaḥ sanpiturardhaṃ sthānameyāyā'gatavāṃstaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4364: ca pituramuvācānanuśiṣyānuśāsanamakṛtvaiva mā māṃ kila bhagavānsamāvartanakāle 'bravīduktavānanu
GV05chupsb_u:4369: sa hovāca yathā mā tvaṃ tadaitān avado yathāham eṣāṃ naikaṃcana veda /
GV05chupsb_u:4370: yady aham imān avediṣyaṃ kathaṃ te nāvakṣyam iti // ChUp_5,3.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:4375: mānuṣasya bhagavan gautama vittasya varaṃ vṛṇīthā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:4378: yām eva kumārasyānte vācam abhāṣathās tām eva me brūhīti /
GV05chupsb_u:4380: ChUpBh_5,3.5,6 yataḥ pañca pañcasaṃkhyākānpraśnānrājanyabandhū rājānyā bandhavo 'syeti rājanyabandhuḥ svayaṃ durvṛtta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4381: aprākṣītpṛṣṭavāṃsteṣāṃ praśnānāṃ naikañcanaikamapi nāśakaṃ na śaktavānahaṃ vivaktuṃ viśeṣeṇārthato nirṇetumityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4382: sa hovāca pitā yathā mā māṃ vatsa tvaṃ tadā'gatamātra evaitānpraśnānavada uktavānasi teṣāṃ naikañcanāśakaṃ vivaktumiti tathā māṃ jānīhi,
GV05chupsb_u:4384: kathaṃ, yathāhameṣāṃ praśnānāmekañcanaikamapi na veda na jāna iti yathā tvamevāṅgaitānpraśnānna jānīṣe tathāhamapyetānna jāna ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4386: kuta etadevaṃ yato na jāne yadyahamimānpraśnānavediṣyaṃ viditavānasmi kathaṃ te tubhyaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4387: priyāya putrāya samāvartanakāle purā nāvakṣyaṃ noktavānasmītyuktvā sa ha gotrato
GV05chupsb_u:4389: tasmai ha gautamāya prāptāyārhāmarhūṇāṃ cakāra kṛtavān /
GV05chupsb_u:4390: sa ca gautamaḥ kṛtātithya uṣitvā paredyuḥ prātaḥkāle sabhāge sabhāṃ gate rājñyudeyāya /
GV05chupsb_u:4391: bhajanaṃ bhāgaḥ pūjā sevā saha bhāgena vartamāno vā sabhāgaḥ pūjyamāno 'nyaiḥ svayaṃ gautama udeyāya rājānamudgatavān /
GV05chupsb_u:4392: taṃ hovāca gautamaṃ rājā mānuṣasya bhagavangautama manuṣyasambandhino vittasya grāmādervaraṃ varaṇīyaṃ kāmaṃ vṛṇīthāḥ prārthayethāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4393: sa hovāca gautamastavaiva tiṣṭhatu rājanmānuṣaṃ vittam /
GV05chupsb_u:4394: yāmeva kumārasya mama putrasyānte samīpe vācaṃ pañcapraśnalakṣaṇāmabhāṣathā uktavānasi tāmeva vācaṃ me mahyaṃ brūhi kathayetyukto gautamena rājā sa ha kṛcchrī duḥkhī babhūva /
GV05chupsb_u:4397: taṃ ha ciraṃ vasety ājñāpayāṃ cakāra /
GV05chupsb_u:4400: yatheyaṃ na prāk tvattaḥ purā vidyā brāhmaṇān gacchati /
GV05chupsb_u:4401: tasmād u sarveṣu lokeṣu kṣatrasyaiva praśāsanam abhūd iti /
GV05chupsb_u:4403: ChUpBh_5,3.7 sa ha kṛcchrībhūto 'pratyākhyeyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manvāno nyāyena vidyā vaktavyeti matvā taṃ ha gautamaṃ ciraṃ dīrghakālaṃ vasetyevamājñāpayāñcakārā'jñaptavān
GV05chupsb_u:4404: yatpūrvaṃ pratyākhyātavānrājā vidyāṃ yacca paścācciraṃ vasetyājñaptavān,
GV05chupsb_u:4405: tannimittaṃ brāhmamaṃ kṣamāpayati hetuvacanoktyā-taṃ hovāca rājā sarvavidyo brahmaṇo
GV05chupsb_u:4406: 'pi sanyathā yena prakāreṇa mā māṃ he gautamāvadastvaṃ tāmeva vidyālakṣaṇāṃ vācaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4408: tatrāsti vaktavyaṃ yathā yena prakāreṇeyaṃ vidyā prāktvatto brāhmaṇānna gacchati na gatavatī,
GV05chupsb_u:4410: tathaitatprasiddhaṃ loke yatastasmādu purā pūrvaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kṣattrasyaiva kṣattrajāterevānayā vidyayā praśāsanaṃ praśāstṛtvaṃ śiṣyāmāmabhūdbabhūva
GV05chupsb_u:4413: ato mayā yaduktaṃ tatkṣantumarhasītyuktvā tasmai hovāca vidyāṃ rājā //7//
GV05chupsb_u:4424: agnihotrāhutyoḥ kāryārambho yaḥ sa ukto vājasaneyake /
GV05chupsb_u:4425: taṃ prati prasnāḥ-utkrāntirāhutyorgatiḥ pratiṣṭhā tṛptiḥ punarāvṛttirlokaṃ pratyutthāyī iti /
GV05chupsb_u:4426: teṣāṃ cāpākaraṇamuktaṃ tatraiva-“te vā ete āhutī hute utkrāmataste antarikṣamāviśataste
GV05chupsb_u:4427: antarikṣamevā'havanīyaṃ kurvāte vāyuṃ samidhaṃ marīcīreva śuklāmāhutiṃ te antarikṣaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4428: tarpayataste tata utkrāmata ityādyevameva pūrvavaddivaṃ tarpayataste tata āvartete /
GV05chupsb_u:4432: iha tu taṃ kāryārambhamagni hotrāpūrvavipariṇāmalakṣaṇaṃ pañcadhā pravibhajyāgnitvenopāsanamuttaramārgapratipattisādhanaṃ vidhitsannāha-asau vāva loko gautamāgnirityādi /
GV05chupsb_u:4433: iha sāyaṃprātaragnihotrāhutī hute paya ādisādhane śraddhāpuraḥsare āhavanīyāgnisamiddhūmārciraṅgāravisphuliṅgabhāvite
GV05chupsb_u:4438: asau vāva loko 'gnirhe gautama yathāgnihotrādhikaraṇamāhavanīya iha /
GV05chupsb_u:4439: tasyāgnerghulokākhyasyā'ditya eva samittena hīddho 'sau loko dīpyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4449: tasminn etasminn agnau devāḥ śraddhāṃ juhvati /
GV05chupsb_u:4450: tasyā āhuteḥ somo rājā saṃbhavati // ChUp_5,4.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:4451: ChUpBh_5,4.2 tasminnetasminyathoktalakṣaṇe 'gnau devā yajamānaprāṇā agnyādirūpā adhidaivatam /
GV05chupsb_u:4452: śraddhāmagnihotrāhutipariṇāmāvasthārūpāḥ sūkṣmā āpaḥ śraddhābhāvitāḥ śraddhā ucyante /
GV05chupsb_u:4454: “śraddhā vā āpaḥ śraddhāmevā'rabhya praṇīya pracarati“iti ca vijñāyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4456: tasyā āhuteḥ somo rājāpāṃ śraddhāśabdavācyānāṃ dyulokāgnau hutānāṃ pariṇāmaḥ somo rājā sambhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4457: yathargvedādipuṣparasā ṛgādimadhukaropanītāsta āditye yaśa ādikāryaṃ rohitādirūpalakṣaṇamārabhanta
GV05chupsb_u:4458: ityuktaṃ tathemā agnihotrāhutisamavāyinyaḥ sūkṣmāḥ śraddhāśabdavācyā āpo dyulokamanupraviśya
GV05chupsb_u:4460: yajamānāśca tatkartāra āhutimayā āhutibhāvanābhāvitā āhutirūpeṇa karmaṇā'kṛṣṭāḥ śraddhāpsamavāyuno dyulokamanupraviśya bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4462: atra tvāhutipariṇāma eva pañcāgnisambandhakrameṇa prādhānyena vivakṣita upāsanārthaṃ na yajamānānāṃ gatiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4463: tāṃ tvaviduṣāṃ dhūmādikrameṇottaratra vakṣyati viduṣāṃ cottarāṃ vidyākṛtām //2//
GV05chupsb_u:4472: ChUpBh_5,5.1 dvitīyahomaparyāyārthamāha-parjanyo vāva parjanya eva gautamāgniḥ parjanyo nāma vṛṣṭyupakaraṇābhimānī devatāviśeṣaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4485: tasminn etasminn agnau devāḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati /
GV05chupsb_u:4487: ChUpBh_5,5.2 tasminnetasminnagnau devāḥ pūrvavatsomaṃ rājānaṃ juhvati /
GV05chupsb_u:4489: śraddhākhyā āpaḥ somākāraṇapariṇatā dvitīye paryāye parjanyāgniṃ prāpya vṛṣṭitvena pariṇamante //2//
GV05chupsb_u:4500: saṃvatsareṇa hi kālena samiddhā pṛthivī vrīhyādiniṣpattaye bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4510: tasminn etasminn agnau devā varṣaṃ juhvati /
GV05chupsb_u:4524: vācā hi mukhena samidhyate puruṣo na mūkaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4531: tasminn etasminn agnau devā annaṃ juhvati /
GV05chupsb_u:4553: tasminn etasminn agnau devā reto juhvati /
GV05chupsb_u:4565: tatra pañcamyāmāhutau hutāyāṃ retorūpā āpo garbhībhūtāḥ //2//
GV05chupsb_u:4568: iti tu pañcamyām āhutāv āpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantīti /
GV05chupsb_u:4569: sa ulbāvṛto garbho daśa vā nava vā māsān antaḥ śayitvā yāvad vātha jāyate // ChUp_5,9.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:4570: ChUpBh_5,9.1 iti tvevaṃ tu pañcamyāmāhutāvāpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavantīti vyākhyāta ekaḥ praśnaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4571: yattu dyulokādimāṃ pratyāvṛttayorāhutyo pṛthivīṃ puruṣaṃ sriyaṃ krameṇā'viśya lokaṃ pratyutthāyī bhavatīti vājasaneyaka uktaṃ tatprāsaṅgikamihocyate
GV05chupsb_u:4572: iha ca prathame praśna uktaṃ vettha yadito 'dhi prajāḥ prayantīti /
GV05chupsb_u:4574: sa garbho 'pāṃ pañcamaḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣa āhutikarmasamavāyinīnāṃ śraddhāśabdavācyānāmulbāvṛta
GV05chupsb_u:4575: ulbena jarāyuṇā'vṛto veṣṭito daśa vā nava vā māsānantarmātuḥ kukṣau śayitvā yāvadvā
GV05chupsb_u:4578: kaṣṭaṃ hi mātuḥ kukṣau mūtrapurīṣavātapittaśleṣmādipūrṇe tadanuliptasya garbhasyolbāśucipaṭāvṛtasya
GV05chupsb_u:4580: tato yonidvāreṇa pīḍyamānasya kaṣṭatarā niḥsṛtirjanmeti vairāgyaṃ grāhayati /
GV05chupsb_u:4581: muhūrtamapyasahyaṃ daśa vā nava vā māsānatidīrghakālamantaḥ śayitveti ca //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:4584: taṃ pretaṃ diṣṭam ito 'gnaya eva haranti yata eveto yataḥ saṃbhūto bhavati // ChUp_5,9.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:4585: ChUpBh_5,9.2 sa evaṃ jāto yāvadāyuṣaṃ punaḥ punarghaṭīyantravadgamanāgamanāya karma kurvankulālacakravadvā tiryagbhramaṇāya yāvatkarmaṇopāttamāyustāvajjīvati
GV05chupsb_u:4586: tamenaṃ kṣīṇāyuṣaṃ pretaṃ mṛtaṃ diṣṭaṃ karmaṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ paralokaṃ prati yadi cejjīvanvaidike
GV05chupsb_u:4590: yataśca pañcabhyo 'gnibhyaḥ saṃbhūta utpanno bhavati tasmā evāgnaye haranti svāmeva yonimagnimāpādayantītyarthaḥ //2//
GV05chupsb_u:4594: ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhā tapa ity upāsate /
GV05chupsb_u:4598: āpūryamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaḍ udaṅṅ eti māsāṃs tān // ChUp_5,10.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:4606: ChUpBh_5,10.1,2 vettha yadito 'dhi prajāḥ prayantītyayaṃ praśnaḥ pratyupasthito 'pākartavyatayā /
GV05chupsb_u:4607: tattatra lokaṃ pratyutthitānāmadhikṛtānāṃ gṛhamedhināṃ ya itthamevaṃ yathoktaṃ pañcāgnidarśanaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4608: dyulokādyagnibhyo vayaṃ krameṇa jātā agnisvarūpāḥ pañcāgnyātmāna ityevaṃ vidurjānīyuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4609: kathamavagamyata itthaṃ viduriti gṛhasthā evocyante nānya iti?
GV05chupsb_u:4610: gṛhasthānāṃ ye tvanitthaṃvidaḥ kevaleṣṭāpūrtadattaparāste dhūmādinā candraṃ gacchantīti vakṣyati /
GV05chupsb_u:4611: ye cāraṇyopalakṣitā vaikhānasāḥ parivrājakāśca śraddhātapa ityupāsate teṣāṃ cetthaṃvidbhiḥ
GV05chupsb_u:4612: sahārcirādinā gamanaṃ vakṣyati pāriśeṣyādagnihotrāhutisambandhācca gṛhasthā eva gṛhyanta itthaṃ viduriti /
GV05chupsb_u:4613: nanu brahmacāriṇo 'pyagṛhītā grāmaśrutyāraṇyaśrutyā vidyante kathaṃ pāriśeṣyasiddhiḥ?
GV05chupsb_u:4616: nanūrdhvaretastvaṃ ceduttaramārgapratipattikāraṇaṃ purāṇasmṛtiprāmāṇyādiṣyata itthaṃvittvamanarthakaṃ prāptam / na /
GV05chupsb_u:4618: ye gṛhasthā anitthaṃvidasteṣāṃ svabhāvato dakṣiṇo dhūmādiḥ panthāḥ prasiddhasteṣāṃ yaṃ itthaṃ viduḥ saguṇaṃ vānyadbrahma viduḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4619: “atha yadu caivāsmiñśavyaṃ kurvanti yadi nārciṣameva“iti liṅgāduttareṇa te gacchanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4620: nanūrdhvaretasāṃ gṛhasthānāṃ ca samāna āśramitva ūrdhvaretasāmevottareṇa pathā gamanaṃ na gṛhasthānāmiti na yuktamagnihotrādivaidikakarmabāhulye ca sati /
GV05chupsb_u:4628: hiṃsānṛtamāyābrahmacaryādiparihārācca śuddhātmāno hītare śatrumitrarāgadveṣādiparihārācca virajasasteṣāṃ yukta uttaraḥ panthāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4630: ye prajāṃ neṣire dhīrāste 'mṛtatvaṃ hi bhejire” /
GV05chupsb_u:4632: itthaṃvidāṃ gṛhasthānāmaraṇyavāsināṃ ca samānamārgatve 'mṛtatvaphale ca satyaraṇyavāsināṃ vidyānarthakyaṃ prāptam /
GV05chupsb_u:4635: “sa enamavidito na bhunakti“iti ca viruddham / na /
GV05chupsb_u:4637: tatraivoktaṃ paurāṇikaiḥ-ābhūtasaṃptavaṃ sthānamamṛtatvaṃ hi bhāṣyate iti /
GV05chupsb_u:4638: yaccā'tyantikamamṛtatvaṃ tadapekṣayā“na tatra dakṣiṇā yanti” “sa enamavidito na bhunaktī“-tyādyāḥ śrutaya ityato na virodhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4639: “na ca punarāvartanta“iti“maṃ mānavamāvartaṃ nā'vartanta“ityādiśrutivirodha iti cet / na /
GV05chupsb_u:4640: imaṃ mānavamiti viśeṣaṇātteṣāmiha na punarāvṛttirastīti ca /
GV05chupsb_u:4641: yadi hyekāntenaiva nā'varterannimaṃ mānavamiheti ca viśeṣaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4645: na ca sadekamevādvitīyamityevaṃpratyayavatāṃ mūrdhanyayā nāḍyārcirādimārgeṇa gamanam /
GV05chupsb_u:4650: nanu tasmājjīvāduccikramiṣoḥ prāṇā notkrāmanti sahaiva gacchantītyayamarthaḥ kalpyata iti cet / na /
GV05chupsb_u:4652: sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmantīti ca prāṇairgamanasya prāptatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4654: yadāpi mokṣasya saṃsāragativailakṣaṇyātprāṇānāṃ jīvena sahāgamāśṅkya tasmānnotkrāmantītyucyate tadāpyatraiva samavanīyanta iti viśeṣaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:4655: na ca prāṇairviyuktasya gatirupapadyate jīvatvaṃ vā /
GV05chupsb_u:4656: sarvagatatvātsadātmano niravayavatvātprāṇasambandhamātrameva hyagnivisphuliṅgavajjīvatvabhedakāraṇamityatastadviyoge jīvatvaṃ gatirvā na śakyā parikalpayituṃ śrutayaścetpramāṇam /
GV05chupsb_u:4657: na sato 'ṇuravayavaḥ sphuṭito jīvākhyaḥ sadrūpaṃ chidrīkurvangacchatīti śakyaṃ kalpayitum /
GV05chupsb_u:4658: tasmāt“tayordhvamāyannamṛtatvameti“iti saguṇabrahmopākasya prāṇaiḥ saha nāḍyā gamanaṃ sāpekṣameva cāmṛtatvaṃ na sākṣānmokṣa iti gamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4660: ataḥ pañcāgnivido gṛhasthā ye ceme 'raṇye vānaprasthāḥ parivrājakāśca saha naiṣṭhikabrahmacāribhiḥ śraddhā tapa ityevamādyupāsate śraddadhānāstapasvinaścetyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:4663: śrutyantarādye ca satyaṃ brahma hiraṇyagarbhākhyamupāsate te sarve 'rciṣamarcirabhimāninīṃ devatāmabhisambhavanti pratipadyante /
GV05chupsb_u:4665: eṣa devayānaḥ panthā vyākhyātaḥ satyalokāvasāno nāṇḍādbahiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4668: atha ya ime grāma iṣṭāpūrte dattam ity upāsate /
GV05chupsb_u:4672: aparapakṣād yān ṣaḍ dakṣiṇaiti māsāṃs tān /
GV05chupsb_u:4674: ChUpBh_5,10.3 athetyarthāntaraprastāvanārtho ya ime gṛhasthā grāme /
GV05chupsb_u:4676: yathā vānaprasthaparivrājakānāmaraṇyaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ gṛhasthebhyo vyāvṛttyarthaṃ tadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:4677: iṣṭāpūrte iṣṭamagnihotrādi vaidikaṃ karma pūrtaṃ vāpīkūpataḍāgārāmādikaraṇam /
GV05chupsb_u:4682: tayātivāhitā dhūmādrātriṃ rātridevatāṃ rātredevatāṃ rātreraparapakṣadevatāmeva kṛṣṇapakṣābhimāninīmaparapakṣādyānṣaṇmāsāndakṣiṇā dakṣiṇāṃ daśameti savitā /

GV05chupsb_u:4697: ko 'sau yastaiḥ prāpyate candramā ya eṣa dṛśyate 'ntarikṣe somo rājā brāhmaṇānāṃ,
GV05chupsb_u:4698: tadannaṃ devānāṃ taṃ candramasamannaṃ devā indrādayo bhakṣayanti /

GV05chupsb_u:4704: kiṃ tarhyupakaraṇamātraṃ devānāṃ bhavanti te strīpaśubhṛtyādivat /
GV05chupsb_u:4705: dṛṣṭaścānnaśabda upakaraṇeṣu“striyo 'nnaṃ paśavo 'nnaṃ viśāṃ viśo 'nnaṃ rājñām” ityādi /
GV05chupsb_u:4706: na ca teṣāṃ stryādīnāṃ puruṣopabhogyatve 'pyupabhogo nāsti /
GV05chupsb_u:4707: tasmātkarmiṇo devānāmupabhogyā api santaḥ sukhino devaiḥ krīḍanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4708: śarīraṃ ca teṣāṃ sukhopabhogayogyaṃ candramaṇḍala āpyamārabhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4709: taduktaṃ purastācchraddhāśabdā āpo dyulokāgnau hutāḥ somo rājā sambhavatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:4710: tā āpaḥ karmasamavāyinya itaraiśca bhūtairanugatā dyulokaṃ prāpya candratvamāpannāḥ śarīrādyārambhikā iṣṭādyupāsakānāṃ bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4711: antyāyāṃ ca śarīrāhutāvagnau hutāyāmagninā dahyamāne śarīre tadutthā āpo dhūmena
GV05chupsb_u:4712: sahordhvaṃ yajamānamāveṣṭya candramaṇḍalaṃ prāpya kuśamṛttikāsthānīyā bāhyaśarīrārambhikā bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4715: tasmin yavātsaṃpātam uṣitvāthaitam evādhvānaṃ punar nivartante /
GV05chupsb_u:4720: ChUpBh_5,10.5 yāvattadupabhoganimittasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayaḥ sampatanti yeneti sampātaḥ karmaṇaḥ kṣayo yāvatsampātaṃ yāvatkarmaṇaḥ kṣaya ityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:4722: punarnivartanta iti prayogātpūrvamapyasakṛccandramaṇḍalaṃ gatā nivṛttāścā'sanniti gamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4728: tatra kiṃ yena karmaṇā candramaṇḍalamārūḍhastasya sarvasya kṣaye tasmādavarohaṇaṃ kiṃ vā sāvaśeṣa iti /
GV05chupsb_u:4730: yadi sarvasyaiva kṣayaḥ karmaṇaścandramaṇḍalasthasyaiva mokṣaḥ prāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:4739: ata eva ca tatraiva mokṣaḥ syāditi doṣābhāvaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4746: yattu kaiściducyate sarvakarmaśriyopamardena prāyaṇe karmaṇāṃ janmārambhakatvam /
GV05chupsb_u:4747: tatra kānicitkarmāṇyanārambhakatvenaiva tiṣṭhanti kānicijjanmā'rabhanta iti nopapadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4751: na hi sarvasya sarvātmakatve deśakālanimittāvaruddhatvātsarvātmanopamardaḥ kasyacitkvacidabhivyaktirvā sarvātmanopapadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4756: yadi hi sarvāḥ pūrvajanmānubhavavāsanā upamṛdyeranmarkaṭajanmanimittena karmaṇā markaṭajanmanyārabdhe
GV05chupsb_u:4757: markaṭasya jātamātrasya mātuḥ śākhāyāḥ śākhāntaragamane māturudarasaṃlagnatvādikauśalaṃ na prāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:4762: yata evaṃ tasmāccheṣeṇopabhuktātkarmaṇaḥ saṃsāra upapadyata iti na kaścidvirodhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4765: nanu māsebhyaḥ pitṛlokaṃ pitṛlokādākāśamākāśāccandramasamiti gamanakrama ukto na tathā nivṛttiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4769: ākāśaprāptestulyatvātpṛthivīprāpteśca na cātra yathetameveti niyamo 'nevaṃvidhamapi nivartante punarnivartante iti tu niyamaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4772: yāsteṣāṃ candramaṇḍale śarīrārambhikā āpa āsaṃstāsteṣāṃ tatropabhoganimittānāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣaye vilīyante /
GV05chupsb_u:4774: tā vilīnā antarikṣasthā ākāśabhūtā iva sūkṣmā bhavanti tā antarikṣādvāyurbhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4775: vāyupratiṣṭhā vāyubhūtā itaścāmutaścohyamānāstābhiḥ saha kṣīṇakarmā vāyubhūto bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4781: ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayas tilamāsā iti jāyante 'to vai khalu durniṣprapataram /

GV05chupsb_u:4785: ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā ityevaṃprakārā jāyante /

GV05chupsb_u:4792: tatraiva ca saha makareṇa samudre vilīnāḥ samudrāmbhobhirjaladharairākṛṣṭāḥ punarvarṣadhārābhirmarudeśe śilātaṭe vāgamye patitāstiṣṭhanti kadācidvyālama-gādipītā bhakṣitāścānyaiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4795: bhakṣyeṣvapi sthāvareṣu jātānāṃ retaḥsigdehasambandho durlabha eva bahutvātsthāvarāṇāmityato durniṣkramaṇatvam /

GV05chupsb_u:4803: yo yo hyannamattyanuśayibhiḥ saṃśliṣṭaṃ retaḥ siñcatyṛtukāle yoṣiti tadbhūya eva tadākṛtireva bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4804: tadavayavākṛtibhūyastvaṃ bhūya ityucyate retorūpeṇa yoṣito garbhaśaye 'ntaḥ praviṣṭo 'nuśayī /
GV05chupsb_u:4809: puruṣātpuruṣo jāyate gorgavākṛtireva na jātyantarākṛtistasmādyuktaṃ tadbhūya eva bhavatīti /

GV05chupsb_u:4812: karmaṇā hi tairvrīhiyavādideha upātta iti tadupabhoganimittakṣaye vrīhyādistambadehavināśe
GV05chupsb_u:4813: yathākarmārjitaṃ dehāntaraṃ navaṃ navaṃ jalūkāvatsaṃkramante savijñānā eva“savijñāno
GV05chupsb_u:4815: yadyapyusaṃhṛtakaraṇāḥ santo dehāntaraṃ gacchanti tathāpi svapnavaddehāntaraprāptinimittakarmodbhāvitavāsanājñānena savijñānā eva dehāntaraṃ gacchanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4817: tathārcirādinā dhūmādinā ca gamanaṃ svapta ivodbhūtavijñānena /
GV05chupsb_u:4819: na tathānuśayināṃ vrīhyādibhāvena jātānāṃ savijñānameva retaḥ-sigyoṣiddehasambandha upapadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4820: na hi vrīhyādilavanakaṇḍanapeṣaṇādau ca savijñānānāṃ sthitirasti /
GV05chupsb_u:4822: tathā sati ghoro narakānubhava iṣṭāpūrtādikāriṇāṃ candramaṇḍalādārabhya prāpto yāvadbrāhmaṇādijanma /
GV05chupsb_u:4826: dehāddehāntaraṃ pratipitsoḥ karmaṇo labdhavṛttitvākarmaṇodbhāvitena vijñānena savijñānatvaṃ yuktam /

GV05chupsb_u:4832: svadehenaiva deśāddeśāntaraṃ nīyamānānāṃ vijñānaśūnyatā dṛṣṭā tathā candramaṇḍalānmānuṣādidehāntaraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4834: ataste 'parityaktadehabījabhūtābhiradbhirmūrchitā ivā'kāśādikrameṇemāmavaruhya karmanimittajātisthāvaradehaiḥ saṃśliṣyante pratibaddhakaraṇatayānudbhūtavijñānā eva /

GV05chupsb_u:4844: tad ya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇā abhyāśo ha yat te ramaṇīyāṃ yonim āpadyeran brāhmaṇayoniṃ vā kṣatriyayoniṃ vā vaiśyayoniṃ vā /
GV05chupsb_u:4845: atha ya iha kapūyacaraṇā abhyāśo ha yat te kapūyāṃ yonim āpadyerañ śvayonim vā sūkarayoniṃ vā caṇḍālayoniṃ vā // ChUp_5,10.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:4846: ChUpBh_5,10.7 tattatra teṣvanuśayināṃ ya iha loke ramaṇīyaṃ śobhanaṃ caraṇaṃ śīlaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:4847: yeṣāṃ te ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ ramaṇīyacaraṇenopalakṣitaḥ śobhano 'nuśayaḥ puṇyaṃ karma
GV05chupsb_u:4850: tenānuśayena puṇyena karmaṇā candramaṇḍale bhuktaśeṣeṇābhyāśo ha kṣiprameva /

GV05chupsb_u:4852: atha punarye tadviparītāḥ kapūyacaraṇopalakṣitakarmāṇo 'śubhānuśayā abhyāśo ha yatte

GV05chupsb_u:4855: ye tu ramaṇīyacaraṇā dvijātayaste svakarmasthāścediṣṭādikāriṇaste dhūmādigatyā gacchantyāgacchanti ca punaḥ punarghaṭīyantravat /
GV05chupsb_u:4858: athaitayoḥ pathor na katareṇacana tānīmāni kṣudrāṇy asakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti jāyasva mriyasveti /
GV05chupsb_u:4863: ChUpBh_5,10.8 yadā tu na vidyāsevino nāpīṣṭādikarma sevante tadāthaitayoḥ pathoryathoktayorarcirdhūmādilakṣaṇayorna
GV05chupsb_u:4864: katareṇānyatareṇacanāpi yanti tānīmāni bhūtāni kṣūdrāṇi daṃśamasakakīṭādīnyasakṛdāvartīni bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:4869: na tu kriyāsu bhogeṣu vā kālo 'stītyarthaḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:4871: yenaivaṃ dakṣiṇamārgagā api punarāgacchantyanadhikṛtānāṃ jñānakarmaṇoragamanameva dakṣiṇena patheti /
GV05chupsb_u:4874: prathamo dakṣiṇottaramārgābhyāmapākṛto dakṣiṇottarayoḥ pathorvyāvartanāpi mṛtānāmagnau prakṣepaḥ samānastato vyāvartanānye 'rcirādinā yantyanye dhūmādinā /
GV05chupsb_u:4878: amuṣya lokasyāpūraṇaṃ svaśabdenaivoktam-tenāsau loko na saṃpūryata iti /

GV05chupsb_u:4887: ete patanti catvāraḥ pañcamaś cācaraṃs tair iti // ChUp_5,10.9 //
GV05chupsb_u:4891: brahmahā brāhmaṇasya hantā cetyete patanti catvāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4894: atha ha ya etān evaṃ pañcāgnīn veda na saha tair apy ācaran pāpmanā lipyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4895: śuddhaḥ pūtaḥ puṇyaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda // ChUp_5,10.10 //
GV05chupsb_u:4896: ChUpBh_5,10.10 atha ha punaryo yathoktānpañcāgnīnveda sa tairapyācaranmahāpātakibhiḥ saha na pāpmanā lipyate śuddha eva /
GV05chupsb_u:4897: tena pañcāgnidarśanena pāvito yasmātpūtaḥ puṇyo lokaḥ prājāpatyādiryasya so 'yaṃ puṇyaloko bhavati ya evaṃ veda yathoktaṃ samastaṃ pañcabhiḥ praśnaiḥ pṛṣṭamarthajātaṃ veda /
GV05chupsb_u:4901: prācīnaśāla aupamanyavaḥ satyayajñaḥ pauluṣir indradyumno bhāllaveyo janaḥ śārkarākṣyo buḍila āśvatarāśvis te haite mahāśālā mahāśrotriyāḥ sametya mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:4907: ākhyāyikā tu sukhāvabodhārthā vidyāsampradānanyāyāpradarśanārthā ca-prācīnaśāla iti nāmata upamanyorapatyamaupamanyavaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4912: pañcāpi te haite mahāśālā mahāgṛhasthā vistīrṇābhiḥ śālābhiryuktāḥ sampannā ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4914: ta evaṃbhūtāḥ santaḥ sametya saṃbhūya kvacinmīmāṃsā vicāraṇāṃ cakruḥ kṛtavanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4918: abhedenā'tmaiva brahma brahmaivā'tmetyevaṃ sarvātmā vaiśvānaro brahma sa ātmetyetatsiddhaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:4922: uddālako vai bhagavanto 'yam āruṇiḥ saṃpratīmam ātmānaṃ vaiśvānaram adhyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:4925: ChUpBh_5,11.2 te ha mīmāṃsanto 'pi niścayamalabhamānāḥ sampādayāñcakruḥ sampāditavantaḥ ātmana upadeṣṭāram /
GV05chupsb_u:4926: uddālako vai prasiddho nāmato bhagavantaḥ pūjāvanto 'yamāruṇiraruṇasyāpatyaṃ samprati samyagimamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaramasmadabhipretamadhyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:4933: ChUpBh_5,11.3 sa ha tāndṛṣṭvaiva teṣāmāgamanaprayojanaṃ buddhvā sampādayāñcakāra /
GV05chupsb_u:4935: prakṣyanti māṃ vaiśvānaramime mahāśālā mahāśrotriyāstebhyo 'haṃ na sarvamiva pṛṣṭaṃ pratipatsye vaktuṃ notsahe /

GV05chupsb_u:4945: tebhyo ha prāptebhyaḥ pṛthag arhāṇi kārayāṃ cakāra /
GV05chupsb_u:4947: na me steno janapade na kadaryo na madyapaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4948: nānāhitāgnir nāvidvān na svairī svairiṇī kutaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4950: yāvad ekaikasmā ṛtvije dhanaṃ dāsyāmi tāvad bhagavadbhyo dāsyāmi /
GV05chupsb_u:4953: yena haivārthena puruṣaś caret taṃ haiva vadet /
GV05chupsb_u:4960: 7 tebhyo ha rājā prāptebhyaḥ pṛthakpṛthagarhāṇyarhaṇāni purohitairbhṛtyaiśca kārayāñcakāra kāritavān /
GV05chupsb_u:4961: sa hānyedyū rājā prātaḥ sañjihāna uvāca vinayenopagamyaitaddhanaṃ matta upādaddhvamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:4962: taiḥ pratyākhyāto mayi doṣaṃ paśyanti nūnaṃ yato na pratigṛhṇanti matto dhanamiti manvāna ātmanaḥ sadvṛttatāṃ pratipipādayiṣannāha /
GV05chupsb_u:4963: na me mama janapade stenaḥ parasvahartā vidyate /
GV05chupsb_u:4969: ata eva svairiṇī kuto duṣṭacāriṇī na sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4970: taiśca na vayaṃ dhanenārdhina ityukta āha-alpaṃ matvaite dhanaṃ na gṛhṇantīti /
GV05chupsb_u:4972: tadarthaṃ kḷptaṃ dhanaṃ mayā yāvadekaikasmai yathoktamṛtvije dhanaṃ dāsyāmi tāvatpratyekaṃ bhagavadbhyo 'pi dāsyāmi /
GV05chupsb_u:4973: vasantu bhagavantaḥ paśyantu ca mama yāgamityuktāste hocuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4974: yena haivārthena prayojanena yaṃ prati caredgacchetpuruṣastaṃ haivārthaṃ vadet /
GV05chupsb_u:4979: prātarvo yuṣmabhyaṃ prativaktāsmi prativākyaṃ dātāsmītyuktāste ha rājño 'bhiprāyajñāḥ samitpāṇayaḥ samidbhārahastā aparedyuḥ pūrvāhne rājānaṃ praticakramire gatavantaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:4980: yata evaṃ mahāśālā mahāśrotriyā brāhmaṇāḥ santo mahāśālatvādyabhimānaṃ hitvā samidbhārahastā jātito hīnaṃ rājānaṃ vidyārthino vinayenopajagmuḥ
GV05chupsb_u:4987: aupamanyava kaṃ tvam ātmānam upāssa iti /
