GV05chupsb_u:5534: seyaṃ devatemās tisro devatā anenaiva jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākarot // ChUp_6,3.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:5535: ChUpBh_6,3.3 saivaṃ tisro devatā anupraviśya svātmāvasthe bījabhūte avyākṛte nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇītīkṣitvā tāsāṃ ca tisṛṇāṃ devatānāmekaikāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ karavāṇi /
GV05chupsb_u:5536: ekaikasyāsrivṛtkaraṇa ekaikasyāḥ prādhānyaṃ dvayordvayorguṇabhāvo 'nthathā hi rajjavā ivaikameva trivṛtkaraṇaṃ syāt na tu tisṛṇāṃ pṛthakpṛthaktrivṛtkaraṇamiti
GV05chupsb_u:5537: evaṃ hi tejobannānāṃ pṛthaṅnāmapratyayalābhaḥ syātteja idamimā āpo 'nnamidamiti ca /
GV05chupsb_u:5538: sati ca pṛthaṅnāmapratyayalābhe devatānāṃ samyagvyavahārasya prasiddhiḥ prayojanaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:5539: evamīkṣitvā seyaṃ devatemāstisro devatā anenaiva yathoktenaiva jīvena sūryabimbavadantaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5540: praviśya vairājaṃ piṇḍaṃ prathamaṃ devādīnāṃ ca piṇḍānanupraviśya yathāsaṅkalpameva
GV05chupsb_u:5544: yathā tu khalu somyemās tisro devatās trivṛt trivṛd ekaikā bhavati tan me vijānīhīti // ChUp_6,3.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5545: ChUpBh_6,3.4 tāsāṃ ca devatānāṃ guṇapradhānabhāvena trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāmakarotkṛtavatī devatā /
GV05chupsb_u:5546: tiṣṭhatu tāvaddevatādipiṇḍānāṃ nāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtānāṃ tejobannamayatvena tridhātvaṃ,
GV05chupsb_u:5547: yathā tu khalu bahurimāḥ piṇḍebhyastisro devatāsrivṛttrivṛdekaikā bhavati tanme mama nigadato vijānīhi viṣṭaspamavadhārayodāharaṇataḥ //4//
GV05chupsb_u:5550: yad agne rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasas tad rūpam /
GV05chupsb_u:5554: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇīty eva satyam // ChUp_6,4.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:5558: yatkṛṣṇaṃ tasyaivāgne rūpaṃ tadannasya pṛthivyā atrivṛtkṛtāyā iti viddhi /
GV05chupsb_u:5559: tatraivaṃ sata rūpatrayavyatirekeṇāgniriti yanmanyase tvaṃ tasyāgneragnitvamidānīmapāgādapagatam /
GV05chupsb_u:5562: prayojako bhavati prāgupadhānasphaṭikayorvivekavijñāne tu padmarāgaśabdabuddhī nivartete
GV05chupsb_u:5564: nanu kimatra buddhiśabdakalpanayā kriyate prāgrūpatrayavivekakaraṇādagnirevā'sīttadagneragnitvaṃ rohitādirūpavivekakaraṇādapāgāditi yuktaṃ yathā tantvapakarṣaṇe paṭābhāvaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5565: naivaṃ, buddhiśabdamātrameva hyagniryata āha vācā'rambhaṇamagnirnāma vikāro nāmadheya nāmamātramityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5567: kiṃ tarhi tatra satyaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇītyeva satyaṃ nāṇumātramapi rūpatrayavyatirekeṇa satyamastītyavadhāraṇārthaḥ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:5569: yad ādityasya rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasas tad rūpam /
GV05chupsb_u:5573: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇīty eva satyam // ChUp_6,4.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:5574: yac candramaso rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasas tad rūpam /
GV05chupsb_u:5578: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇīty eva satyam // ChUp_6,4.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:5579: yad vidyuto rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasas tad rūpam /
GV05chupsb_u:5583: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇīty eva satyam // ChUp_6,4.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5584: 4 tathā yadādityasya yaccandramaso yadvidyuta ityādi samānam /
GV05chupsb_u:5585: nanu yathā nu khalu somyemāstisro devatāsrivṛttrivṛdekaikā bhavati tanme vijānīhityuktvā
GV05chupsb_u:5595: yadi sarvaṃ jagattrivṛtkṛtamityagnyādivattrīṇi rūpāṇītyeva satyamagneragnitvavadapāgājjagato jagattvam /
GV05chupsb_u:5600: evaṃ gandharasaśabdasparśāścāvaśiṣṭā iti kathaṃ satā vijñātena sarvamanyadvijñātaṃ bhavettadvijñāne vā prakārāntaraṃ vācyam /
GV05chupsb_u:5605: rūpavatāṃ trayāṇāṃ tejobannānāṃ trivṛtkaraṇapradarśanena sarvaṃ tadantarbhūtaṃ sadvikāratvāt rūpatrayavat vijñātaṃ manyate śrutiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5606: na hi mūrtaṃ rūpavaddravyaṃ pratyākhyāya vāyvākāśayostadguṇayorgandharasayorvā grahaṇamasti /
GV05chupsb_u:5607: athavā rūpavatāmapi trivṛtkaraṇaṃ pradarśanārthameva manyate śrutiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5608: yathā tu trivṛtkṛte trīṇi rūpāṇītyeva satyaṃ tathā pañcīkaraṇe 'pi samāno nyāya ityataḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5609: sarvasya sadvikāratvātsatā vijñātena sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ syātsadekamevādvitīyaṃ satyamiti
GV05chupsb_u:5611: tadekasminsati vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavatīti sūktam //2-4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5613: etad dha sma vai tadvidvāṃsa āhuḥ pūrve mahāśālā mahāśrotriyāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5614: na no 'dya kaścanāśrutam amatam avijñātam udāhariṣyati /
GV05chupsb_u:5615: iti hy ebhyo vidāṃ cakruḥ // ChUp_6,4.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:5616: ChUpBh_6,4.5 etadvidvāṃso viditavantaḥ pūrve 'tikrāntā mahāśālā mahāśroṇiyā āhurha sma vai kila /
GV05chupsb_u:5617: kimuktavanta ityāhana no 'smākaṃ kule 'dyedānīṃ yathoktavijñānavatāṃ kaśna kaścidapyaśrutamamatamavijñātamudāhariṣyati
GV05chupsb_u:5619: te punaḥ kathaṃ sarvaṃ vijñātavanta ityāha-ebhyasribhyo rohitādirūpebhyasrivṛtkṛtebhyo
GV05chupsb_u:5624: yad u rohitam ivābhūd iti tejasas tad rūpam iti tad vidāṃ cakruḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5625: yad u śuklam ivābhūd ity apāṃ rūpam iti tad vidāṃ cakruḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5626: yad u kṛṣṇam ivābhūd ity annasya rūpam iti tad vidāṃ cakruḥ // ChUp_6,4.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:5627: yad v avijñātam ivābhūd ity etāsām eva devatānāṃ samāsa iti tad vidāṃ cakruḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5628: yathā nu khalu somyemās tisro devatāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya trivṛt trivṛd ekaikā bhavati tan me vijānīhīti // ChUp_6,4.7 //
GV05chupsb_u:5630: yadanyadrūpeṇa sandihyamāne kapotādirūpe rohitamiva yadgṛhyamāṇamabhūtteṣāṃ pūrveṣāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5631: brahmavidāṃ tattejaso rūpamiti vidāñcakruḥ tathā yacchuklamivābhūdgṛhyamāṇaṃ tadāpāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5632: rūpaṃ yatkṛṣṇamiva gṛhyamāṇaṃ tadannasyeti vidāñcakrurevamevātyantadurlakṣyaṃ yadu
GV05chupsb_u:5635: evaṃ tāvadbāhyaṃ vastvagnyādivavijñātaṃ tathedānīṃ yathā nu khalu he somyemā yathoktāstisro
GV05chupsb_u:5636: devatāḥ puraṣaṃ śiraḥpāmyādilakṣaṇaṃ kāryakāraṇasaṅghātaṃ prāpya puruṣeṇopayujyamānāsrivṛttrivṛdekaikā
GV05chupsb_u:5641: tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātus tat purīṣaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5644: ChUpBh_6,5.1 annamaśitaṃ bhuktaṃ tredhā vidhīyate jāṭharemāgninā pacyamānaṃ tridhā vibhajyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5645: kathaṃ, tasyānnasya tridhā vidhīyamānasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭhaḥ sthūlatamo dhātuḥ sthūlatamaṃ vastu vibhaktasya sthūloṃ'śastatpurīṣaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5646: yo madhyamoṃ'śo dhāturannasya tadrasādikrameṇa pariṇamya māṃsaṃ bhavati yo 'ṇiṣṭho
GV05chupsb_u:5647: 'ṇutamo dhātuḥ sa ūrdhvaṃ hṛdayaṃ prāpya sūkṣmāsu hitākhyāsu nāḍīpvanupravisya vāgādikaraṇasaṅghātasya
GV05chupsb_u:5648: sthitimutpādayanmano bhavati manorūpeṇa vipariṇamanmanasa upacayaṃ karoti /
GV05chupsb_u:5649: tataścānnopacitatvānmanaso bhautikatvameva na vaiśeṣikatantroktalakṣaṇaṃ nityaṃ niravayaṃ ceti gṛhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5650: yadapi mano 'sya daivaṃ cakṣuriti vakṣyati tadapi na nityatvāpekṣayā kiṃ tarhi sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭādisarvendriyaviṣayavyāpakatvāpekṣayā
GV05chupsb_u:5655: tāsāṃ yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātus tan mūtraṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5658: ChUpBh_6,5.2 tathā'paḥ pītāstredhā vidhīyante tāsāṃ yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātustanmūtraṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5661: vakṣyati hyāpomayaḥ prāṇo na pibato vicchetsyata iti //2//
GV05chupsb_u:5664: tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātus tad asthi bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5667: ChUpBh_6,5.3 tathā tejo 'śitaṃ tailaghṛtādi bhakṣitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātustadasthi bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5670: tailaghṛtādibhakṣaṇāddhi vāgviśadā bhāṣaṇe samarthā bhavatīti prasiddhaṃ loke //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:5675: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:5677: ChUpBh_6,5.4 yata evamannamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk /
GV05chupsb_u:5678: nanu kevalānnabhakṣiṇa ākhuprabhṛtayo vāgminaḥ prāṇavantaśca tathāṃmātrabhakṣyāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5679: sāmudrā mīnamakaraprabhṛtayo manasvino vāggminaśca tathā snehapānāmapi prāṇavattvaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5680: cānumeyaṃ yadi santi tatra kathamannamayaṃ hi somya mana ityādyucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5683: na hyatrivṛtkṛtamannamaśnāti kaścidāpo vātrivṛtkṛtāḥ pīyante tejo vātrivṛtkṛtamaśnāti kaścidityannādānāmākhuprabhṛtīnāṃ vāggmitvaṃ prāṇavattvaṃ cetyādyaviruddham /
GV05chupsb_u:5684: ityevaṃ pratyāyitaḥ śveketurāha-bhūya eva punareva mā māṃ bhagavānannamayaṃ hi somya mana ityādi vijñāpayatu dṛṣṭāntenāvagamayu nādyāpi mamāsminnarthe samyaṅniścayo jātaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5686: manaḥprāṇavāca upacinvanti svajātyanatikrameṇeti durvijñeyamityabhiprāyo 'to bhūya evetyādyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:5687: tamevamuktavantaṃ tathāstu somyeti hovāca pitā śṛṇvatra dṛṣṭāntaṃ yathaitadupapadyate yatpṛcchasi //4//
GV05chupsb_u:5690: dadhnaḥ somya mathyamānasya yo 'ṇimā sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati /
GV05chupsb_u:5692: ChUpBh_6,6.1 dadhnaḥ somya mathyamānasya yo 'ṇimāṇubhāvaḥ sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati sambhūyordhvaṃ navanūtabhāvena gacchati tatsarpirbhavati //1
GV05chupsb_u:5694: evam eva khalu somyānnasyāśyamānasya yo 'ṇimā sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati /
GV05chupsb_u:5696: ChUpBh_6,6.2 yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta evameva khalu somyānnasyaudanāderaśyamānasya bhujyamānasyodaryemāgninā
GV05chupsb_u:5697: vāyusahiteta khajeneva mathyamānasya yo 'ṇimā sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati tanmano bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:5700: apāṃ somya pīyamānānāṃ yo 'ṇimā sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati /
GV05chupsb_u:5702: ChUpBh_6,6.3 tathāpāṃ somya pīyamānānāṃ yo 'ṇimā sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati sa prāṇo bhavatīti //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:5704: tejasaḥ somyāśyamānasya yo 'ṇimā sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati /
GV05chupsb_u:5706: ChUpBh_6,6.4 evameva khalu somya tejaso 'śyamānasya yo 'ṇimā sa ūrdhvaḥ samudīṣati sā vāgbhavati //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5711: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:5713: ChUpBh_6,6.5 annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāgiti yuktameva mayoktamityamiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5715: manastvannamayamityatra naikāntena mama niścayo jāto 'to bhūya eva mā bhagavānmanaso 'nnamayatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntena vijñāpayatviti /
GV05chupsb_u:5722: āpomayaḥ prāṇo na pibato vicchetsyata iti // ChUp_6,7.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:5723: ChUpBh_6,7.1 annasya bhuktasya yo 'ṇiṣṭho dhātuḥ sa manasi śaktimadhāt sānnopacitā manasaḥ śaktiḥ ṣoḍaśadhā pravibhajya puruṣasya kalātvena nirdidikṣitā /
GV05chupsb_u:5724: tayā manasyannopacitayā śaktyā ṣoḍaśadhā pravibhaktayā saṃyuktastadvānkāryakaraṇasaṅghātalakṣaṇo
GV05chupsb_u:5725: jīvaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ puruṣaḥ ṣoḍaśakala ucyate yasyāṃ satyāṃ draṣṭā śrotā mantā boddhā
GV05chupsb_u:5726: kartā vijñātā sarvakriyāsamarthaḥ puruṣo bhavati hīyamānāyāṃ ca yasyāṃ sāmarthyahāniḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5729: mānasena hi balena sampannā balino dṛśyante loke,
GV05chupsb_u:5731: ato 'nnakṛtaṃ mānasaṃ vīryaṃ ṣoḍaśa kalā yasya puruṣasya so 'yaṃ ṣoḍaśakalaḥ puruṣaḥ etaccetpratyakṣīkartumicchasi pañcadaśasaṃkhyākānyahāni māśīraśanaṃ mā kārṣīḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5732: kāmamicchāto 'paḥ piba yasmānnapibato 'paste prāṇo vicchetsyate vicchedamāpatsyate yasmādāpomayo 'bvikāraḥ prāṇa ityavocāma /
GV05chupsb_u:5736: atha hainam upasasāda kiṃ bravīmi bho iti /
GV05chupsb_u:5738: sa hovāca na vai mā pratibhānti bho iti // ChUp_6,7.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:5739: ChUpBh_6,7.2 sa haivaṃ śrutvā manaso 'nnamayatvaṃ pratyakṣīkartuṃmicchanpañcadaśāhāni nā'śāśanaṃ na kṛtavān /
GV05chupsb_u:5740: atha ṣoḍaśe 'hani hainaṃ pitaramupasasādopagatavānupagamya covāca kiṃ bravīmi bho iti /
GV05chupsb_u:5741: itara āha ṛcaḥ somya yajūṃṣi sāmānyadhīṣveti /
GV05chupsb_u:5742: evamuktaḥ pitrā'ha-na vai mā māmṛgādīni mama manasi na dṛśyanta ityartho he bho bhagavanniti //2//
GV05chupsb_u:5744: taṃ hovāca yathā somya mahato 'bhyāhitasyaiko 'ṅgāraḥ khadyotamātraḥ pariśiṣṭaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:5746: evaṃ somya te ṣoḍaśānāṃ kalānām ekā kalā atiśiṣṭā syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:5750: ChUpBh_6,7.3 evamuktavantaṃ pitā'ha-śṛṇu tatra kāraṇaṃ yena te tānyṛgādīni na pratibhāntīti (taṃ hovāca)
GV05chupsb_u:5752: khadyotaparimāṇaḥ śāntasya pariśiṣṭo 'vaśiṣṭaḥ syādbhavettenoṅgāreṇa tato 'pi tatparimāṇādīṣadapi
GV05chupsb_u:5753: na bahu dahedevameva khalu somya te tavānnopacitānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ kalānāmekā kalāvayavo
GV05chupsb_u:5754: 'tiśiṣṭāvaśiṣṭā na bahu dahedevameva khalu somya te tavānnopacitānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ kalānāmekā
GV05chupsb_u:5755: kalāvayavo 'tiśiṣṭā syāttayā tvaṃ khadyotamātrāṅgāratulyayaitarhīdānīṃ vedānnānubhavasi na pratipadyase,
GV05chupsb_u:5756: śrutvā ca me mama vācamathāśeṣaṃ vijñāsyasyaśāna bhuṅkṣva tāvat //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:5760: taṃ ha yat kiṃ ca papraccha sarvaṃ ha pratipede // ChUp_6,7.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5761: ChUpBh_6,7.4 sa ha tathaivā'śa bhuktavānathānantaraṃ hainaṃ pitaraṃ śuśrūṣurupasasāda
GV05chupsb_u:5762: taṃ hopagataṃ putraṃ yatkiñcargādiṣu papraccha grantharūpamarthajātaṃ vā pitā sa
GV05chupsb_u:5763: śvetaketuḥ sarvaṃ ha tatpratipede ṛgādyarthato granthataśca //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5766: yathā somya mahato 'bhyāhitasyaikam aṅgāraṃ khadyotamātraṃ pariśiṣṭaṃ taṃ tṛnair upasamādhāya prājvalayet tena tato 'pi bahu dahet // ChUp_6,7.5
GV05chupsb_u:5767: ChUpBh_6,7.5 taṃ hovāca punaḥ pitā yathā somya mahato 'bhyāhitāsyetyādi samānamekamaṅgāraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5768: śāntasyāgneḥ khadyotamātraṃ pariśiṣṭaṃ taṃ tṛṇaiścūrṇaiścopasamādhāya prājvalayedvardhayet /
GV05chupsb_u:5771: evaṃ somya te ṣoḍaśānāṃ kalānām ekā kalātiśiṣṭābhūt /
GV05chupsb_u:5777: tad dhāsya vijajñāv iti vijajñāv iti // ChUp_6,7.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:5778: ChUpBh_6,7.6 evaṃ somya te ṣoḍaśānāmannakalānāṃ sāmarthyarūpāṇāmekā kalātiśiṣṭābhūdatiśiṣṭā'sītpañcadaśāhānyabhuktavata
GV05chupsb_u:5779: ekaikenāhnaikaikā kalā candramasa ivāparapakṣe kṣīṇā sātiśiṣṭā kalā tavānnena bhuktenopasamāhitā
GV05chupsb_u:5782: prājvālīditi kalā tavānnena bhuktenopasamāhitā vardhitopacitā prājvāli /
GV05chupsb_u:5784: prājvālīditi pāṭhāntaraṃ tadā tenopasamāhitā svayaṃ prajvalitavatīryarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5786: evaṃ vyāvṛttyanuvṛttibhyāmannāmayatvaṃ manasaḥ siddhamityupasaṃharatyannamayaṃ hi somya mana ityādi /
GV05chupsb_u:5787: yathaitanmanaso 'nnamayatvaṃ tava siddhaṃ tathā'pomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāgityetadapi siddhamevetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5788: tadetaddhāsya pituruktaṃ mana ādīnāmannādimayatvaṃ vijajñau vijñātavāñśvetaketuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5792: uddālako hāruṇiḥ śvetaketuṃ putram uvāca svapnāntaṃ me somya vijānīhīti /
GV05chupsb_u:5793: yatraitat puruṣaḥ svapiti nāma satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5797: ChUpBh_6,8.1 yasminmanasi jīvenā'tmanānupraviṣṭā parā devatā'darśa iva puruṣaḥ pratibimbena jalādiviṣviva ca sūryādayaḥ pratibimbaiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5799: yanmayo yatsthaśca jīvo mananadarśanaśravaṇādivyāvahārāya kalpate taduparame ca svaṃ devatārūpameva pratipadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5800: taduktaṃ śrutyantare“dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva sadhīḥ svapno bhūtvemaṃ lokamatikrāmati““sa vā āyamātmā brahma vijñānamayo manomaya“ityādi,
GV05chupsb_u:5803: tasyāsya manaḥsthasya mana ākhyāṃ gatasya manaupaśamadvāreṇendriyaviṣayebhyo nivṛttasya
GV05chupsb_u:5804: yasyāṃ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ svātmabhātāyāṃ yadavasthānaṃ tatputrāyā'cikhyāsuruddālako
GV05chupsb_u:5806: svapnāntaṃ svapnamadhyaṃ svapna iti darśanavṛtteḥ svapnasyā'khyā tasya madhyaṃ svapnāntaṃ suṣuptamityetat /
GV05chupsb_u:5810: tatra hyādarśāpanayane puruṣapratibimbi ādarśagato yathā svameva puruṣamapīto bhavatyevaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5811: mana ādyuparame caitanyapratibimbarūpeṇa jīvenā'tmanā manasi praviṣṭā nāmarūpavyākaraṇāya
GV05chupsb_u:5812: parā devatā sā svamevā'tmānaṃ pratipadyate jīvarūpatāṃ mana ākhyāṃ hitvā /
GV05chupsb_u:5814: yatra tu suptaḥ svapnānpaśyati tatsvāpnaṃ darśanaṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃyuktamiti puṇyāpuṇyayorhi sukhaduḥkhārambhakatvaṃ prasiddham /
GV05chupsb_u:5815: puṇyāpuṇyayoścāvidyākāmopaṣṭambhenaiva sukhaduḥkhataddarśanakāryārambhakatvamupapadyate nānyathetyavidyākāmakarmabhiḥ saṃsārahetubhiḥ saṃyukta eva svapna iti na svamapītā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5816: “ananvāgataṃ puṇyenānanvāgataṃ pāpena tīrṇo hi tadā sarvāñchokānhṛdayasya bhavati” “tadvā asyaitadaticchandā” “eṣa parama ānanda“ityādiśrutibhyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5817: suṣupta eva svaṃ devatārūpaṃ jīvatvavinirmuktaṃ darśayiṣyāmītyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:5818: svapnāntaṃ me mama nigadato he somya vijānīhi vispaṣṭamavadhārayetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5820: yatra yasminkāla etannāma bhavati puruṣasya svapsyataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5823: yadā svapitītyucyate puruṣastadā tasminkāle satā sacchabdavācyayā prakṛtayā devatayā saṃpanno bhavati saṃgata ekībhūto bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5824: manasi praviṣṭaṃ mana ādisaṃsargakṛtaṃ jīvarūpaṃ parityajya svaṃ sadrūpaṃ yatparamārthasatyamapīto 'pigato bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5829: tathā ca“gṛhītā vāggṛhītaṃ śrotraṃ gṛhītaṃ mana“ityevamādīni karaṇāni prāṇagrastāni /
GV05chupsb_u:5830: prāṇa eko 'śrānto dehe kulāye yo jāgarti tadā jīvaḥ śramāpanuttaye svaṃ devatārūpamātmānaṃ pratipadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5831: nānyatra svarūpāvasthānācchramāpanodaḥ syāditi yuktā prasiddhirlaukikānāṃ svaṃ hyapīto bhavatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:5832: dṛśyate hi loke jvarādirogagrastānāṃ tadvinirnoke svātmasthānāṃ viśramaṇaṃ tadvadihāpi syāditi yuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:5833: “tadyathā śyeno vā suparṇo vā viparipatya śrānta“ityādiśruteṣca //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:5835: sa yathā śakuniḥ sūtreṇa prabaddho diśaṃ diśaṃ patitvānyatrāyatanam alabdhvā bandhanam evopaśrayate /
GV05chupsb_u:5836: evam eva khalu somya tan mano diśaṃ diśaṃ patitvānyatrāyatanam alabdhvā prāṇam evopaśrayate /
GV05chupsb_u:5837: prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya mana iti // ChUp_6,8.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:5838: ChUpBh_6,8.2 tatrāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yathokter'the-sa yathā śakuniḥ pakṣī śakunighātakasya
GV05chupsb_u:5839: hastagatena sūtreṇa prabaddhaḥ pāśito diśaṃ diśaṃ bandhanamokṣārthī sanpratiśidiśaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5841: evameva yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ khalu he sobhya tanmanastatprakṛtaṃ poḍaśakalamannopacitaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5842: mano nirdhāritaṃ tatepraviṣṭastatsthastadupalakṣito jīvastanmana iti nirdiśyate mañcākrośanavat /
GV05chupsb_u:5843: sa mana ākhyopādhirjīvo 'vidyākāmakarmopadiṣṭāṃ diśaṃ diśaṃ sukhaduḥkhādilakṣaṇāṃ jāgratsvapnayoḥ patitvā gatvānubhūyetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5844: anyatra sadākhyātsvātmana āyatanaṃ viśramaṇasthānamalabdhvā prāṇameva prāṇena sarvakāryakaraṇāśrayeṇopalakṣitā prāṇa ityucyate sadākhyā parā devatā /
GV05chupsb_u:5847: prāṇo bandhanaṃ yasya manasastatprāṇabandhanaṃ hi yasmātsomya manaḥ prāṇopalakṣitadevatāśrayaṃ mana iti tadupalakṣito jīva iti //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:5850: yatraitat puruṣo 'śiśiṣati nāmāpa eva tad aśitaṃ nayante /
GV05chupsb_u:5851: tad yathā gonāyo 'śvanāyaḥ puruṣanāya ity evaṃ tad apa ācakṣate 'śanāyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:5854: ChUpBh_6,8.3 evaṃ svapitināmaprasiddhidvāreṇa yajjīvasya satyasvarūpaṃ jagato mūlaṃ tatputrasya darśayitvā'hānnādikāryakāraṇaparamparayāpi jagato mūlaṃ saddidarśayiṣuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5856: pātumicchā pipāsā te aśanāpipāse aśanāpipāsayoḥ satatvaṃ vijānīhītyetat /
GV05chupsb_u:5859: tadā tasya puruṣasya kinimittaṃ nāma bhavatītyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:5860: yattatpuruṣeṇāśitamannaṃ kaṭhinaṃ potā āpo nayante dravīkṛtya rasādibhāvena vipariṇamayante tadā bhuktamannaṃ jīryati /
GV05chupsb_u:5863: tat tatra apāmaśitanetṛtvādaśanāyā iti nāma prasiddhamityetasminnarthe /
GV05chupsb_u:5864: yathā gonāyo gāṃ nayatīti gonāya ityucyate gopālaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5867: evaṃ tattadāpa ācakṣate laukikā aśanāyeti visarjanīyalopena /
GV05chupsb_u:5868: tatraivaṃ satyadbhī rasādibhāvena nītenāśitenānnena niṣpāditamidaṃ śarīraṃ vaṭakaṇikāyāmiva
GV05chupsb_u:5869: śuṅgo 'ṅkura utpatita udgatastamimaṃ śuṅgaṃ kāryaṃ śarīrākhyaṃ vaṭādiśuṅgavadutpatitaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5872: śuṇvidaṃ śuṅgavatkāryatvāccharīraṃ nāmūlaṃ mūlarahitaṃ bhaviṣyatītyukta āha śvetaketuḥ //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:5875: evam eva khalu somyānnena śuṅgenāpo mūlam anviccha /
GV05chupsb_u:5876: adbhiḥ somya śuṅgena tejo mūlam anviccha /
GV05chupsb_u:5878: sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sadāyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhāḥ // ChUp_6,8.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5879: ChUpBh_6,8.4 yadyevaṃ samūlamidaṃ śarīraṃ vaṭādiśuṅgavattasyāsya kva mūlaṃ syādbhavedityevaṃ pṛṣṭa āha pitā /
GV05chupsb_u:5882: aśitaṃ hyannamadbhirdravīkṛtaṃ jāṭhareṇāgninā pacyamānaṃ rasabhāvena pariṇamate /
GV05chupsb_u:5883: rasocchoṇitaṃ śoṇitānmāṃsaṃ māṃsānmedo medaso 'sthīnyasthibhyo majjā majjāyāḥ śukram /
GV05chupsb_u:5884: tathā yoṣidbhuktaṃ cānnaṃ rasādikrameṇaivaṃ pariṇataṃ lohitaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5886: kuḍyamiva mṛtpiṇḍaiḥ pratyuhamupacīyamāno 'nnamūlo dehaśuṅgaḥ pariniṣpanna ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5887: yattu dehaśuṅgo 'nnamūla evameva khalu somyānnena śuhgena kāryabhūtenāpo mūlamannasya śuṅgasyānviccha pratipadyasva /
GV05chupsb_u:5888: apāmapi vināśotpattimattavācchuṅgatvameveti adbhiḥ sīmya śuṅgena kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ tejo mūlamanviccha /
GV05chupsb_u:5889: tejaso 'pi vināśotpattimattavācchuṅgatvamiti tejasā somya śuṅgena sanmūlamekamevādvitīyaṃ paramārthasatyam /
GV05chupsb_u:5890: yasminsarvamidaṃ vācā'rambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyamanṛtaṃ rajjvāmiva sarpādivikalpajātamadhyastamavidyayā
GV05chupsb_u:5891: tadasya jagato mūlamataḥ sanmūlāḥ satkāraṇā he somyemāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamalakṣaṇāḥ sarvāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5892: prajā na kevalaṃ sanmūlā evedānīmapi sthitikāle sadāyatanāḥ sadāśrayā eva /
GV05chupsb_u:5894: ato mṛdvatsanmūtvātprajānāṃ sadāyatanaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ sadāyatanāḥ prajāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5895: ante ca satpratiṣṭhāḥ sadeva pratiṣṭā layaḥ samāptipavasānaṃ pariśeṣo yāsāṃ tāḥ satpratiṣṭhāḥ //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:5897: atha yatraitat puruṣaḥ pipāsati nāma teja eva tat pītaṃ nayate /
GV05chupsb_u:5898: tad yathā gonāyo 'śvanāyaḥ puruṣanāya ity evaṃ tat teja ācaṣṭa udanyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:5899: tatraitad eva śuṅgam utpatitaṃ somya vijānīhi /
GV05chupsb_u:5901: ChUpBh_6,8.5 athedānīmapśuṅgadvāreṇa sato mūlasyānugamaḥ kārya ityāha /
GV05chupsb_u:5902: yatra yasminkāla etannāma pipāsati pātumicchatīti puruṣo bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5904: dravīkṛtasyāśitasyānnasya netrya āpo 'nnaśuṅgaṃ dehaṃ kledayantyaḥ śithilī kuryurabbāhulyādyadi tejasā na śoṣyante /
GV05chupsb_u:5905: nitarāṃ ca tejasā śoṣyamāṇā svapsu dehabhāvena pariṇamamānāsu pātumicchā puruṣasya jāyate tadā puruṣaḥ pipāsati nāma tadetadāha /
GV05chupsb_u:5906: teja eva tattadā pītamabādi śoṣayaddehagatalohitaprāṇabhāvena nayate pariṇamayati /
GV05chupsb_u:5907: tadyathā gonāya ityādi samānamevaṃ tatteja ācaṣṭe loka udanyetyudakaṃ nayatītyudanyam /
GV05chupsb_u:5912: adbhiḥ somya śuṅgena tejo mūlam anviccha /
GV05chupsb_u:5914: sanmūlāḥ somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sad āyatanāḥ satpratiṣṭhāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5915: yathā nu khalu somyemās tisro devatāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya trivṛt trivṛd ekaikā bhavati tad uktaṃ purastād eva bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:5916: asya somya puruṣasya prayato vāṅ manasi saṃpadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇas tejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām // ChUp_6,8.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:5921: evaṃ hi tejobannamayasya dehaśuṅgasya vācārambhaṇamātrasyānnādiparamparayā paramārthasatyaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5922: sanmūlamabhayasaṃtrāsaṃ nirāyāsaṃ sanmūlamanviccheti putraṃ gamayitvāśiśiṣati pipāsatīti
GV05chupsb_u:5926: yathā nu khalu yena prakāreṇemāstejobannākhyāstisro devatāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya trivṛttrivṛdekaikā bhavati taduktaṃ purastādeva bhavatyannamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyata ityādi /
GV05chupsb_u:5927: tatraivoktamannādīnāmasitānāṃ ye mavyamā dhātavaste sāptadhātukaṃ śarīramupacinvantītyuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:5928: “māṃsaṃ bhavati lohitaṃ bhavati majjā bhavatyasthi bhavati ye tvaṇiṣṭhā dhātavo manaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5929: prāṇaṃ vācaṃ dehasyāntaḥkaraṇasaṃghātamupacinvantī“ti coktaṃ“tanmano bhavati sa prāṇo
GV05chupsb_u:5931: so 'yaṃ prāṇakaraṇasaṃghāto dehe viśīrṇe dehāntaraṃ jīvādhiṣṭhito yena krameṇa pūrvadehātpracyuto
GV05chupsb_u:5932: gacchati tadāhāsya he somya puruṣasya prayato mriyamāṇasya vāṅmanasi saṃpadyate manasyupasaṃhriyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5936: vācyupasaṃhṛtāyāṃ manasi mano mananavyāpāreṇa kevalena vartate /
GV05chupsb_u:5937: mano 'pi yadopasaṃhriyate tadā manaḥ prāṇe saṃpannaṃ bhavati suṣuptakāla iva tadā pārśvasthā jñātayo na vijānātītyāhuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5938: prāṇaśca tadordhvocchvāsī svātmanyupasaṃhṛtabāhyakaraṇaḥ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ darśanāddhastapādādīnvikṣipanmarmasthānāni nikṛntannana ivotsṛjan krameṇopasaṃhṛtastejasi sampadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:5939: tadā'hurjñātayo na calatīti mṛto neti vā vicikitsanto dehamālabhamānā uṣṇaṃ copalabhamānā
GV05chupsb_u:5940: deha uṣṇo jīvatīti yadā tadapyauṣṇyaliṅgaṃ teja upasaṃhriyate tadā tattejaḥ parasyāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5942: tadevaṅkrameṇopasaṃhṛte svamūlaṃ prāpte ca manasi tatstho jīvo 'pi suṣuptakālavannimittopasaṃhārādupasaṃhriyamāṇaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:5943: sansatyābhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ cedupasaṃhriyate sadeva saṃpadyate na punardehāntarāya
GV05chupsb_u:5945: yathā loke sabhaye deśe vartamānaḥ kathañcidivābhayaṃ deśaṃ prāptastadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:5948: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam /
GV05chupsb_u:5952: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:5954: ChUpBh_6,8.7 yasmānmūlādutthāya dehamāviśati jīvaḥ sa yaḥ sadākhya eṣa ukto 'ṇimāṇubhāvo jagato mūlamaitadātmyametatsadātmā yasya sarvasya tadetadātma tasya bhāva aitadātmyam /
GV05chupsb_u:5958: yena cā'tmanā'tmavatsarvamidaṃ jagattadeva sadākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ satyaṃ paramārthasat /
GV05chupsb_u:5959: ataḥ sa evā'tmā jagataḥ pratyaksvarūpaṃ satattvaṃ yāthātmyam /
GV05chupsb_u:5961: atastatsattvamasīti he śvetaketo ityevaṃ pratyāyitaḥ putra āha-bhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatu
GV05chupsb_u:5962: yadbhavaduktaṃ tatsandigdhaṃ mamāhanyahani sarvāḥ prajāḥ suṣupte satsaṃpadyanta ityetadyena
GV05chupsb_u:5968: yathā somya madhu madhukṛto nistiṣṭhanti nānātyayānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ rasān samavahāram ekatāṃ rasaṃ gamayanti // ChUp_6,9.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:5969: ChUpBh_6,9.1 yatpṛcchasyahanyahani satsaṃpadya na viduḥ satsaṃpannāḥ sma iti tatkasmādityatra śṛṇu dṛṣṭāntam /
GV05chupsb_u:5970: yathā loke he somya madhukṛto madhu kurvantīti madhukṛto madhukaramakṣikā madhu nistiṣṭhanti madhu niṣpādayanti tatparāḥ santaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5971: katham?nānātyayānāṃ nānāgatīnāṃ nānādikkānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ rasānsamavahāraṃ samāhṛtyaikatāmekabhāvaṃ madhutvena rasāngamayanti madhutvamāpādayanti
GV05chupsb_u:5973: te yathā tatra na vivekaṃ labhante 'muṣyāhaṃ vṛkṣasya raso 'smy amuṣyāhaṃ vṛkṣasya raso 'smīti /
GV05chupsb_u:5974: evam eva khalu somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyāmaha iti // ChUp_6,9.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:5975: ChUpBh_6,9.2 te rasā yathā madhutvenaikatāṃ gatāstatra madhuni vivekaṃ na labhante /
GV05chupsb_u:5976: katham, amuṣyāhamāmrasya panasasya vā vṛkṣasya raso 'smīti /
GV05chupsb_u:5977: yathā hi loke bahūnāṃ cetanāvatāṃ sametānāṃ prāṇināṃ vivekalābho bhavatyamuṣyāhaṃ putro 'muṣyāhaṃ naptāsmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:5978: te ca labdhavivekāḥ santo na saṃkīryante na tathehānekaprakāravṛkṣarasānāmapi madhurāmlatiktakaṭukādīnāṃ madhutvenaikatāṃ gatānāṃ madhurādibhāvena viveko gṛhyata ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5979: yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭānta ityevameva khalu somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajā ahanyahani sati saṃpadya suṣuptakāle maraṇapralayayośca na vidurna vijānīyuḥ sati saṃpadyāmaha iti saṃpannā iti vā //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:5981: ta iha vyaghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako vā yad yad bhavanti tad ābhavanti // ChUp_6,9.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:5983: atasta iha loke yatkarmanimittāṃ yāṃ yāṃ jātiṃ pratipannā āsurvyāghrādīnāṃ vyāghro
GV05chupsb_u:5984: 'haṃ siṃho 'hamityevaṃ te tatkarmajñānavāsanāṅkitāḥ santaḥ satpraviṣṭā api tadbhāvenaiva
GV05chupsb_u:5985: punarābhavanti punaḥ sata āgatya vyāghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo
GV05chupsb_u:5986: vā daṃśo vā maśako vā yadyatpūrvamiha loke bhavanti vabhūvurityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5987: tadeva punarāgatya bhavanti yugasahasrakoṭyantaritāpi saṃsāriṇo jantoryā purā bhāvitā vāsanā sā na naśyatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:5990: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam /
GV05chupsb_u:5994: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:5997: ye tvito 'nye satsatyātmābhisaṃdhā yamaṇubhāvaṃ sadātmānaṃ praviśya nā'vartante sa ya eṣo 'ṇimetyādi vyākhyātam /
GV05chupsb_u:5998: yathā loke svakīye gṛhe supta utthāya grāmāntaraṃ gato jānāti svagṛhādāgato 'smītyevaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:5999: sata āgato 'smīti ca jantūnāṃ kasmādvijñānaṃ na bhavatīti bhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatvityuktastathā
GV05chupsb_u:6003: imāḥ somya nadyaḥ purastāt prācyaḥ syandante paścāt pratīcyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6006: tā yathā tatra na vidur iyam aham asmīyam aham asmīti // ChUp_6,10.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6007: ChUpBh_6,10.1 śṛṇu tatra dṛṣṭāntaṃ yathā somyemā nadyo gaṅgādyāḥ purastātpūrvāṃ diśaṃ prati prācyaḥ prāgañcanāḥ syandante sravanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6008: paścātpratīcīṃ diśaṃ prati sindhvādyāḥ pratīcīmañcanti gacchantīti pratīcyastāḥ samudrādambhonidherjaladharairākṣiptāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6009: punarvṛṣṭirūpeṇa patitā gaṅgādinadīrūpiṇyaḥ punaḥ samudramambhonidhimevāpiyanti sa
GV05chupsb_u:6010: samudra eva bhavati tā nadyo yathā tatra samudre samudrātmanaikatāṃ gatā na vidurna
GV05chupsb_u:6013: evam eva khalu somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sata āgamya na viduḥ sata āgacchāmaha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6014: ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako vā yad yad bhavanti tad ābhavanti // ChUp_6,10.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6015: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam /
GV05chupsb_u:6019: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6021: ChUpBh_6,10.2,3 evameva khalu somyemāḥ sarvāḥ prajā yasmātsati sampadya na vidustasmātsata āgamya na viduḥ sata āgacchāmaha āgatā iti vā /
GV05chupsb_u:6023: dṛṣṭaṃ loke jale vīcītaraṅgaphenabudādaya utthitāḥ punastadbhāvaṃ gatā vinaṣṭā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6024: jīvāstu tatkāraṇamaṇubhāvaṃ pratyahaṃ gacchanto 'pi suṣupte maraṇapralayayośca na vinaśyantītyetat bhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatu dṛṣṭāntena
GV05chupsb_u:6028: asya somya mahato vṛkṣasya yo mūle 'bhyāhanyāj jīvan sraved yo madhye 'bhyāhanyāj jīvan sraved yo 'gre 'bhyāhanyāj jīvan sravet /
GV05chupsb_u:6029: sa eṣa jīvenātmanānuprabhūtaḥ pepīyamāno modamānas tiṣṭhati // ChUp_6,11.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6030: ChUpBh_6,11.1 śṛṇu dṛṣṭāntamasya - he somya mahato 'nekaśākhādiyuktasya vṛkṣasyāsyetyagrataḥ sthitaṃ vṛkṣaṃ darśayannāha /
GV05chupsb_u:6031: yadi yaḥ kaścidasya mūle 'bhyāhanyātparaśvādinā sakṛdghātamātreṇa na śuṣyatīti jīvanneva bhavati tadā tasya rasaḥ sravet /
GV05chupsb_u:6036: asya yad ekāṃ śākhāṃ jīvo jahāty atha sā śuṣyati /
GV05chupsb_u:6040: ChUpBh_6,11.2 tasyāsya yadekāṃ śākhāṃ rogagrastāmāhatāṃ vā jīvo jahātyupasaṃharati śākhāyāṃ viprasṛtamātmāṃśam /
GV05chupsb_u:6042: vāṅmanaḥprāṇakaraṇagrāmānupraviṣṭo hi jīva iti tadupasaṃhāra upasaṃhriyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6043: jīvena ca prāṇayuktenāśitaṃ potaṃ ca rasatāṃ gataṃ jīvaccharīraṃ vṛkṣaṃ vardhayadrasarūpeṇa jīvasya sadbhāve liṅgaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6044: aśitapītābhyāṃ hi dehe jīvastiṣṭhati te cāśitapīte jīvakarmānusāriṇī iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6045: tasyaikāṅgavaikalyanimittaṃ karma yadopasthitaṃ bhavati tadā jīva ekāṃ śākhāṃ jahāti śākhāyā ātmānamupasaṃharati /
GV05chupsb_u:6047: jīvasthitinimitto raso jīvakarmākṣipto jīvopasaṃhāre na tiṣṭhati /
GV05chupsb_u:6049: tathā sarvaṃ vṛkṣameva yadāyaṃ jahāti tadā sarvo 'pi vṛkṣaḥ śuṣyati /
GV05chupsb_u:6050: vṛkṣasya rasasravaṇaśoṣaṇādiliṅgājjīvavattvaṃ dṛṣṭāntaśruteśca cetanāvantaḥ sthāvarā iti bauddhakāṇādamatamacetanāḥ sthāvarā ityetadasāramiti darśitaṃ bhavati //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6052: evam eva khalu somya viddhīti ha uvāca /
GV05chupsb_u:6053: jīvāpetaṃ vāva kiledaṃ mriyate na jīvo mriyata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6054: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam /
GV05chupsb_u:6058: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6060: ChUpBh_6,11.3 yathāsminvṛkṣadṛṣṭānte darśitaṃ jīvena yukto vṛkṣo 'śuṣko rasapānādiyukto jāvatītyucyate tadapetaśca mriyata ityucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6061: evameva khalu somya viddhīti hovāca-jīvāpetaṃ jīvaviyuktaṃ vāva kiledaṃ śarīraṃ mriyate
GV05chupsb_u:6062: na jīvo mriyata iti kāryaśeṣe ca suptotthitasya mamedaṃ kāryaśeṣamaparisamāptamiti
GV05chupsb_u:6066: agnihotrādīnāṃ ca vaidikānāṃ karmaṇāmarthavattvānna jīvo mriyata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6068: kathaṃ punaridamatyantasthīlaṃ pṛthivyādi nāmarūpavajjagadatyantasūkṣmātsadrūpānnāmarūparah itātsato jāyata ityetaddṛṣṭāntena bhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatviti
GV05chupsb_u:6084: sa idaṃ bhagava upahṛtaṃ phalamiti darśitavantaṃ pratyāha phalaṃ bhindhīti /
GV05chupsb_u:6086: tamāha pitā kimatra paśyasītyukta āhāṇvyo 'ṇutarā ivemā dhānā bījāni paśyāmi bhagava iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6087: āsāṃ dhānānāmekāṃ dhānāmaṅga he vatsa bhindhītyukta āha bhinnā bhagava iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6088: yadi bhinnā dhānā tasyāṃ bhinnāyāṃ kiṃ paśyasītyukta āha na kiñcana paśyāmi bhagava iti //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6090: taṃ hovāca yaṃ vai somyaitam aṇimānaṃ na nibhālayasa etasya vai somyaiṣo 'ṇimna evaṃ mahānyagrodhas tiṣṭhati /
GV05chupsb_u:6092: ChUpBh_6,12.2 taṃ putraṃ hovāca vaṭadhānāyāṃ bhinnāyāṃ yaṃ vaṭabījāṇimānaṃ he saumyaitaṃ na nibhālayase na paśyasi /
GV05chupsb_u:6093: tathāpyetasya vai kila somyaiṣa mahānnyagrodho bījasyāṇimnaḥ sūkṣmasyādṛśyamānasya
GV05chupsb_u:6095: 'dhyāhāryo 'taḥ śraddhatsva somya sata evāṇimnaḥ sthūlaṃ nāmarūpādimatkāryaṃ jagadutpannamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:6099: śraddhāyāṃ tu satyāṃ manasaḥ samādhānaṃ bubhutsiter'the bhavettataśca tadarthāvagatiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6102: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam /
GV05chupsb_u:6106: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6109: yadi tatsajjagato mūlaṃ kasmānnopalabhyata ityetaddṛṣṭāntena mā bhagavānbhūya eva vijñāpayatviti /
GV05chupsb_u:6113: lavaṇam etad udake 'vadhāyātha mā prātar upasīdathā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6116: yad doṣā lavaṇam udake 'vādhā aṅga tad āhareti /
GV05chupsb_u:6118: ChUpBh_6,13.1 vidyamānamapi vastu nopalabhyate prakārāntareṇa tūpalabhyata iti śṛṇvatra
GV05chupsb_u:6119: dṛṣṭāntam yadi cemamarthaṃ pratyakṣo sa ha pitroktamarthaṃ pratyakṣīkartumicchaṃstathā cakāra /
GV05chupsb_u:6120: taṃ hovāca paredyuḥ prātarūpasīdathā upagacchethā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6122: taṃ hovāca paredyuḥ prātaryallavaṃ doṣā rātrāvudake 'vādhā nikṣiptavānasyaṅga he vatsa tadāharetyuktastallavaṇamājihīrṣurha kilāvamṛśyodake na viveda na vijñātavānyathā tallavaṇaṃ,
GV05chupsb_u:6138: taṃ hovācātra vāva kila tat somya na nibhālayase 'traiva kileti // ChUp_6,13.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6139: ChUpBh_6,13.2 yathā vilīnaṃ lavaṇaṃ na vettha tathāpi taccakṣuṣā sparśanena ca piṇḍarūpaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6141: gṛhītvā'cāmetyuktvā putraṃ tathākṛtavantamuvāca kathamitītara āha lavaṇaṃ svādutaḥ iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6144: yadyevamabhiprāsya parityajyaitadudakamācamyātha mopasīdathā iti taddha tathā cakāra lavaṇaṃ parityajya pitṛsamīpamājagāmetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6145: idaṃ vacanaṃ bravaṃstallavamaṃ tasminnevodake yanmayā rātrau kṣiptaṃ śāśvannityaṃ saṃvartate vidyamānameva satsamyagvartate /
GV05chupsb_u:6147: yathedaṃ lavaṇaṃ darśanasparśanābhyāṃ pūrvaṃ gṛhītaṃ punarudake vilīnaṃ tābhyāmagṛhyamāṇamapi vidyata evopāyāntareṇa jihvayopalabhyamānatvāt
GV05chupsb_u:6152: evamevātraiva kila vidyamānaṃ sajjaganmūlamupāyāntareṇa lavaṇāṇimavadupalapsyasa iti vākyaśeṣaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6154: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam /
GV05chupsb_u:6158: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6163: ka upāya ityetadbhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatu dṛṣṭāntena tathā somyeti hovāca //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:6166: yathā somya puruṣaṃ gandhārebhyo 'bhinaddhākṣam ānīya taṃ tato 'tijane visṛjet /
GV05chupsb_u:6167: sa yathā tatra prāṅ vodaṅ vā adharāṅ vā pratyaṅ vā pradhmāyītābhinaddhākṣa ānīto 'bhinaddhākṣo visṛṣṭaḥ // ChUp_6,14.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6168: ChUpBh_6,14.1 yathā loke he somya puruṣaṃ yaṃ kañcidgandhārebhyo janapadebhyo 'bhinaddhākṣaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6176: tasya yathābhinahanaṃ pramucya prabrūyād etāṃ diśaṃ gandhārā etāṃ diśaṃ vrajeti /
GV05chupsb_u:6177: sa grāmād grāmaṃ pṛcchan paṇḍito medhāvī gandhārān evopasaṃpadyeta /
GV05chupsb_u:6179: tasya tāvad eva ciraṃ yāvan na vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsya iti // ChUp_6,14.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6180: ChUpBh_6,14.2 evaṃ vikrośatastasya yathābhinahanaṃ yathābandhanaṃ pramucya muktvā
GV05chupsb_u:6181: kāruṇikaḥ kaścidetāṃ diśamuttarato gandhārā etāṃ diśaṃ vrajeti prabrūyātsa evaṃ kāruṇikena
GV05chupsb_u:6184: yathāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto varṇitaḥ svaviṣayebhyo gandhārebhyaḥ puruṣastaskarairabhinaddhākṣo
GV05chupsb_u:6186: praveśito duḥkhārto vikrośanbandhanebhyo mumukṣustiṣṭhati sa kathañcideva kāruṇikena
GV05chupsb_u:6190: puṇyāpuṇyāditaskaraiḥ praveśito“'hamamuṣya putro mamaite bāndhavāḥ sukhyahaṃ duḥkhī
GV05chupsb_u:6191: mūḍhaḥ paṇḍito dhārmiko bandhumāñjāto mṛto jīrṇaḥ pāpī putro me mṛto dhanaṃ me naṣṭaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6192: hā hato 'smi kathaṃ jāviṣyāmi kā me gatiḥ kiṃ me trāṇam” ityevamanekaśatasahasrānarthajālavānvikrośankathañcideva
GV05chupsb_u:6195: saṃsāraviṣayebhyo nāsi tvaṃ saṃsāryamuṣya putratvādidharmavānkiṃ tarhi sadyattattvamasītyavidyāmohapaṭābhinahanānmokṣito
GV05chupsb_u:6196: gandhārapuruṣavacca svaṃ sadātmānamupasampadya sukhī nirvṛtaḥ syādityetamevārthamāhā'cāryavānpuruṣo
GV05chupsb_u:6197: vedeti tasyāsyaivamācāryavato muktāvidyābhinahanasya tāvadeva tāvāneva kālaściraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6199: kiyānkālaściramityucyate yāvanna vimokṣye na vimokṣyata ityetatpuruṣavyatyanena /
GV05chupsb_u:6201: yena karmaṇā śarīramārabdhaṃ tasyopabhogena yenāthaśabda ānantaryārthaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6202: nanu yathā sadvijñānāntarameva dehapātaḥ satsampattiśca na bhavati karmaśeṣavaśāttathāpravṛttaphalāni
GV05chupsb_u:6205: utpanne ca jñāne yāvajjīvaṃ vihitāni pratiṣiddhāni vā karmāṇi karotyeveti tatphalopabhogārthaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6206: cāvaśyaṃ śarīrāntaramārabdhavyaṃ tataśca karmāṇi tataḥ śarīrāntaramiti jñānārthakyaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6208: atha jñānavataḥ kṣīyante karmāṇi tadā jñānaprāptisamakālameva jñānasya satsampattihetutvānmokṣaḥ syāditi śarīrapātaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6213: viduṣa“stasya tāvadeva ciram” iti śruteḥ prāmāṇyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6218: yāni pravṛttaphalāni karmāṇi yairvidvaccharīramārabdhaṃ teṣāmupabhogenaiva kṣayaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6219: yathā'rahdhavegasya lakṣyamukteṣvādervegakṣayādeva sthitirna tu lakṣyavedhasamakālameva prayojanaṃ nāstīti tadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:6220: anyāni tvapravṛttaphalānīha prāgjñānotpatterūrdhvaṃ ca kṛtāni vā kriyamāṇāni vātītajanmāntarakṛtāni vāpravṛttaphalāni jñānena dahyante prāyaścitteneva
GV05chupsb_u:6222: ato brahmavido jīvanādiprayojanābhāve 'pi pravṛttaphalānāṃ karmaṇāmavaśyameva phalopabhogaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6223: syāditi mukteṣuvattasya tāvadeva ciramiti yuktamevoktamiti yathoktadoṣacodanānupapattiḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6227: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam /
GV05chupsb_u:6231: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6234: ācāryavānvidvānyena krameṇa satsampadyate taṃ kramaṃ dṛṣṭāntena bhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatviti /
GV05chupsb_u:6238: puruṣaṃ somyotopatāpinaṃ jñātayaḥ paryupāsate jānāsi māṃ jānāsi mām iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6239: tasya yāvan na vāṅ manasi saṃpadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇas tejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ tāvaj jānāti // ChUp_6,15.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6240: ChUpBh_6,15.1 puruṣaṃ he somyotopatāpinaṃ jvarādyupatāpavantaṃ jñātayo bāndhavāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6241: parivāryopāsate mumūrṣuṃ jānāsi māṃ tava pitaraṃ putraṃ bhrātaraṃ veti pṛcchantastasya
GV05chupsb_u:6242: mumūrṣoryāvanna vāṅmanasi sampadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇastejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyāmityetaduktartham //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6244: atha yadāsya vāṅ manasi saṃpadyate manaḥ prāṇe prāṇas tejasi tejaḥ parasyāṃ devatāyām atha na jānāti // ChUp_6,15.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6245: ChUpBh_6,15.2 saṃsāriṇo yo maraṇakramaḥ sa evāyaṃ viduṣo 'pi satsampattikrama ityetadāha parasyāṃ devatāyāṃ tejasi sampanne 'tha na jānāti /
GV05chupsb_u:6246: avidvāṃstu sata utthāya prāgbhāvitaṃ vyāghrādibhāvaṃ devamanuṣyādibhāvaṃ vā viśati /
GV05chupsb_u:6247: vidvāṃstu śāsrācāryopadeśajanitajñānadīpaprakāśitaṃ sadbrahmātmānaṃ praviśya nā'vartata ityeṣa satsampattikramaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6256: sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitad ātmyam idaṃ sarvam /
GV05chupsb_u:6260: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6263: yadi mariṣyato mumukṣataśca tulyā satsampattistatra vidvānsatsampanno nā'vartata
GV05chupsb_u:6264: āvartate tvavidvānityatra kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntena bhūya eva mā bhagavānvijñāpayatviti
GV05chupsb_u:6269: apahārṣīt steyam akārṣīt paraśum asmai tapateti /
GV05chupsb_u:6270: sa yadi tasya kartā bhavati tata evānṛtam ātmānaṃ kurute /
GV05chupsb_u:6274: ChUpBh_6,16.1 śṛṇu yathā somya puruṣaṃ cauryakarmaṇi sandihyamānaṃ nigrahāya parīkṣaṇāya votāpi hastagṛhītaṃ baddhahastamānayanti rājapuruṣāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6277: anyathā datte 'pi dhane bandhanaprasaṅgādityuktāḥ punarāhuḥ steyamakārṣīttauryeṇa dhanamapahārṣīditi /
GV05chupsb_u:6281: sa yadi tasya stainyasya kartā bavati bahiścāpahnate sa evaṃbhūtastata evānṛtamanyathābhūtaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6283: kṛtvā paraśuṃ taptaṃ mohātpratigṛhrāti sa dahyate 'tha hanyate rājapuruṣaiḥ svakṛtenānṛtābhisandhidoṣeṇa //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6287: sa satyābhisandhaḥ satyenātmānam antardhāya paraśuṃ taptaṃ pratigṛhṇāti /
GV05chupsb_u:6290: ChUpBh_6,16.2 atha yadi tasya karmaṇo 'kartā bhavati tata eva satyamātmānaṃ kurute
GV05chupsb_u:6291: sa satyena tayā stainyākartṛtayā'tmānamantardhāya paraśuṃ taptaṃ pratigṛhṇāti sa
GV05chupsb_u:6292: satyābhisandhaḥ sanna dahyate satyavyavadhānādatha mucyate ca mṛṣābhiyoktṛbhyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6293: taptaparaśuhastatalasaṃyogasya tulyatve 'pi steyakartrakartroranṛtābhisandho dahyate na tu satyābhisandhaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6300: tad dhāsya vijajñāv iti vijajñāv iti // ChUp_6,16.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:6302: na dahyetetyetadevaṃ sadbrahmasatyābhisandhītarayoḥ śarīrapātakāle ca tulyāyāṃ satsampattau
GV05chupsb_u:6304: avidvāṃstu vikārānṛtābhisandhaḥ punarvyāghrādibhāvaṃ devatādibhāvaṃ vā yathākarma yathāśrutaṃ pratipadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6305: yadātmābhisandhyanabhisandhikṛte mokṣabandhane yacca mūlaṃ jagato yadāyatanā yatpratiṣṭhāśca
GV05chupsb_u:6306: sarvāḥ prajā yadātmakaṃ ca sarvaṃ yaccājamamṛtamabhayaṃ śivamadvitīyaṃ tatsatyaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6307: sa ātmā tavātastattvamasi he śvetaketo ityuktārthamasakṛdvākyam /
GV05chupsb_u:6309: yo 'haṃ śvetaketuruddālakasya putra iti vedā'tmānamādeśaṃ śrutvā matvā vijñāya cāśrutamamatamavijñātaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6310: vijñātuṃ pitaraṃ papraccha kathaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sa ādeśo bavatīti sa eṣo 'dhikṛtaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6311: śrotā mantā vijñātā tejobannamayaṃ kāryakāraṇasaṅghātaṃ praviṣṭā paraiva devatā nāmasvarūpavyākaraṇāyā'darśa
GV05chupsb_u:6315: kiṃ punaratra ṣaṣṭhe vākyapramāṇena janitaṃ phalam?
GV05chupsb_u:6316: ātmani kartṛtvabhoktṛtvayoradhikṛtatvavijñānanivṛttistasya phalaṃ yaṃ vayamavocāma tvaṃśabdavācyamarthaṃ śrotuṃ mantuṃ cādhikṛtamavijñātavijñānaphalārtham
GV05chupsb_u:6318: eṣāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phalamihāmutra ca bhokṣye kṛteṣu vā karmasu kṛtakartavyaḥ syāmityevaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6322: na hyekasminnadvitīya ātmanyayamahamasmīti vijñāte mamedamanyadanena kartavyamidaṃ kṛtvāsya phalaṃ bhokṣya iti vā bhedavijñānamupapadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6324: nanu tattvamasītyatra tvaṃśabdavācyer'the sadbuddhirādhitsyate yathā'dityamana ādiṣu brahmādibuddhiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6325: yathā ca loke pratimādiṣu viṣṇvādibuddhistadvannatu sadeva tvamiti,
GV05chupsb_u:6326: yadi sadeva śvetaketuḥ syātkathamātmānaṃ na vijānīyādyena tasmai tattvamasītyupadiśyate / na /
GV05chupsb_u:6329: rūpādimattvāccā'dityādīnāmākāśamanasoścetiśabdavyavadhānādevābrahmatvamiha tu sata eveha praveśaṃ darśayitvā tattvamasīti niraṅkuśaṃ sadātmabhāvamupadiśati
GV05chupsb_u:6330: nanu parākramādiguṇaḥ siṃho 'si tvamitivattattvamasīti syāt / na /
GV05chupsb_u:6337: na hi rājā dāsastvamiti stutyaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6338: nāpi sataḥ sarvātmana ekadeśanirodho yuktastattvamasīti deśādhipateriva grāmādhyakṣastvamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:6340: nanu sadasmītibuddhimātramiha kartavyatayā codyate na tvajñātaṃ sadasīti jñāpyata iti cet /
GV05chupsb_u:6343: na, ācāryavānpuruṣo veda tasya tāvadeva ciramityupadeśāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6344: yadi hi sadasmīti buddhimātraṃ kartavyatayā vidhīyate na tu tvaṃśabdavācyasya sadrūpatvameva tadā nā'cāryavānvedeti jñānopāyopadeśo vācyaḥ syāt
GV05chupsb_u:6346: tasya tāvadeva ciramiti ca kṣepakaraṇaṃ na yuktaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6348: na ca tattvamasītyukte nāhaṃ saditipramāṇavākyajanitā buddhīrnivartayituṃ śakyā notpanneti vā śakyaṃ vaktum /
GV05chupsb_u:6351: yattūktaṃ sadātmā sannātmānaṃ kathaṃ na jānīyāditi /
GV05chupsb_u:6353: kāryakaraṇasaṅghātavyatirikto 'haṃ jīvaḥ kartā bhoktetyapi svabhāvataḥ prāṇināṃ vijñānādarśanātkisu tasya sadātmavijñānam /
GV05chupsb_u:6354: kathamevaṃ vyatiriktavijñāne sati teṣāṃ kartṛtvādivijñānaṃ sambhavati dṛśyate ca /
GV05chupsb_u:6361: adhīhi bhagava iti hopasasāda sanatkumāraṃ nāradaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6362: taṃ hovāca yad vettha tena mopasīda /
GV05chupsb_u:6366: na sator'vāgvikāralakṣaṇāni tattvāni nirdiṣṭānītyatastāni nāmādīni prāṇāntāni krameṇa
GV05chupsb_u:6367: nirdiśya taddvāreṇāpi bhūmākhyaṃ niratiśayaṃ tattvaṃ nirdekṣyāmīti śākhācandradarśanavaditīnaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6369: anirdiṣṭeṣu hi sator'vāktattveṣu sanmātre ca nirdiṣṭe 'nyadapyavijñātaṃ syādityāśaṅkā kasyacitsyātsā mā bhūditi vā tāni nirdidikṣati /
GV05chupsb_u:6370: athavā sopānārohaṇavatsthūlādārabhya sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣamataṃ ca buddhiviṣayaṃ jñāpayitvā tadatirikte svārājye 'bhiṣekṣyāmīti nāmādīni nirdidikṣati
GV05chupsb_u:6371: athavā nāmādyuttarottaraviśiṣṭāni tattvānyatitarāṃ ca teṣāmutkṛṣṭatamaṃ bhūmākhyaṃ tattvamiti tatstutyarthaṃ nāmādīnāṃ krameṇopanyāsaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6374: nārado devarṣiḥ kṛtakartavyaḥ sarvavidyo 'pi sannanātmajñatvācchuśocaiva kimu vaktavyamanyo 'lpavijjanturakṛtapuṇyātiśayo 'kṛtārtha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6376: yena sarvavijñānasādhanaśaktisampannasyāpi nāradasya devarṣeḥ śreyo na babhūva yenottamābhijanavidyāvṛttasādhanaśaktisampattinimittābhi
GV05chupsb_u:6382: taṃ nyāyata upasannaṃ hovāca yadātmaviṣaye kiñcidvettha tena tatprakhyāpanena māmupasīdedamahaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6383: jāna iti tato 'haṃ bhavato vijñānātte tubyamūrdhvaṃ vakṣyāmītyuktavati sa hovāca nāradaḥ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6385: ṛgvedaṃ bhagavo 'dhyemi yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam ātharvaṇaṃ caturtham itihāsapurāṇaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6386: pañcamaṃ vedānāṃ vedaṃ pitryaṃ rāśiṃ daivaṃ nidhiṃ vākovākyam ekāyanaṃ devavidyāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6387: brahmavidyāṃ bhūtavidyāṃ kṣatravidyāṃ nakṣatravidyāṃ sarpadevajanavidyām etad bhagavo
GV05chupsb_u:6389: ChUpBh_7,1.2 ṛgvedaṃ bhagavo 'dhyemi smarāmi yadvettheti vijñānasya pṛṣṭatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6390: tathā yajurvedaṃ sāmavedamātharvaṇaṃ caturthaṃ vedaṃ vedaśabdasya prakṛtatvāditihāsapurāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ vedaṃ vedānāṃ bhāratapañcamānāṃ vedaṃ vyākaraṇamityarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6407: śrutaṃ hy eva me bhagavaddṛśebhyas tarati śokam ātmavid iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6409: taṃ mā bhagavāñ chokasya pāraṃ tārayatv iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6410: taṃ hovāca yad vai kiṃcaitad adhyagīṣṭhā nāmaivaitat // ChUp_7,1.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:6411: ChUpBh_7,1.3 so 'haṃ bhagava etatsarvaṃ jānannapi mantravidevāsmi śabdārthamātravijñānavānevāsmītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6412: sarvo hi śabdo 'bhidhānamātramabhidhānaṃ ca sarvaṃ mantreṣvantarbhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6415: nanvātmāpi mantraiḥ prakāśyata eveti kathaṃ mantraviccennā'tmavit / na /
GV05chupsb_u:6423: dehavati pratyagātmani bhedaviṣaye prayujyamānaḥ śabdo dehādīnāmātmatve pratyākhyāyamāne yatpariśiṣṭaṃ sadavācyamapi pratyāyayati /
GV05chupsb_u:6425: rājanyeṣa rājā dṛśyata iti bhavati śabdaprayogastatra ko 'sau rājeti rājaviśeṣanirūpaṇāyāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6427: tasmātsohaṃ mantravitkarmavidevāsmi karmakāryaṃ ca sarvaṃ vikāra iti vikārajña evāsmi nā'tmavinnā'tmaprakṛtisvarūpajña ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6430: śrutamāgamajñānamastyeva hi yasmānme mama bhagavaddṛśebhyo yuṣmatsadṛśebhyastaratyatikrāmati śokaṃ manastāpamakṛtārthabuddhitāmātmavidityataḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6431: so 'hamanātmavittvāddhe bhagavaḥ śocāmyakṛtārthabuddhyā santapye sarvadā taṃ mā māṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6432: śokasya śokasāgarasya pāramantaṃ bhagavāṃstārayatvātmajñānoḍupena kṛtārthabuddhimāpādayatvabhayaṃ gamayatvityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6437: nāma vā ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmaveda ātharvaṇaś caturtha itihāsapurāṇaḥ pañcamo vedānāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6438: vedaḥ pitryo rāśir daivo nidhir vākovākyam ekāyanaṃ devavidyā brahmavidyā bhūtavidyā
GV05chupsb_u:6442: ChUpBh_7,1.4 nāma vā ṛgvedo yajurveda ityādi nāmaivaitat /
GV05chupsb_u:6447: yāvan nāmno gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo nāma brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6450: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,1.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:6451: ChUpBh_7,1.5 sa yastu nāma brahmetyupāste tasya yatphalaṃ bhavati tacchṛṇu yāvannāmno
GV05chupsb_u:6452: gataṃ nāmno gocaraṃ tatra tasminnāmaviṣaye 'sya yathākāmacāraḥ kāmacaraṇaṃ rājña
GV05chupsb_u:6456: sanatkumāra āha nāmno vāva bhūyo 'styevetyukta āha yadyasti tanme bhagavānbravītviti //5//
GV05chupsb_u:6460: vāg vā ṛgvedaṃ vijñāpayati yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam ātharvaṇaṃ caturtham itihāsapurāṇaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6461: pañcamaṃ vedānāṃ vedaṃ pitryaṃ rāśiṃ daivaṃ nidhiṃ vākovākyam ekāyanaṃ devavidyāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6462: brahmavidyāṃ bhūtavidyāṃ kṣatravidyāṃ nakṣatravidyāṃ sarpadevajanavidyāṃ divaṃ ca
GV05chupsb_u:6463: pṛthivīṃ ca vāyuṃ cākāśaṃ cāpaś ca tejaś ca devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca paśūṃś ca vayāṃsi
GV05chupsb_u:6464: ca tṛṇavanaspatīñ śvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakaṃ dharmaṃ cādharmaṃ /
GV05chupsb_u:6465: ca satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca sādhu cāsādhu ca hṛdayajñaṃ cāhṛdayajñaṃ ca /
GV05chupsb_u:6466: yad vai vāṅ nābhaviṣyan na dharmo nādharmo vyajñāpayiṣyan na satyaṃ nānṛtaṃ na sādhu nāsādhu na hṛdayajño nāhṛdayajñaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6467: vāg evaitad sarvaṃ vijñāpayati vācam upāssveti // ChUp_7,2.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6471: kāryaddhi kāraṇaṃ bhūyo dṛṣṭaṃ loke yathā putrātpitā tadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:6472: kathaṃ ca vāṅnāmno bhūyasītyāhavāgvā ṛgvedaṃ vijñāpayatyayamṛgveda iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6476: yadyadi vāṅnābhaviṣyaddharmādi na vyajñāpayiṣyadvāgabhāve 'dhyayanābhāve tadarthaśravaṇābhāvastacchravaṇābhāve dharmādi na vyajñāpayiṣyanna vijñātamabhaviṣyadityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6477: tasmādvāgevaitacchabdoccāraṇena sarvaṃ vijñāpayatyato bhūyasī vāṅnāmnastasmādvācaṃ brahmetyupāḥsva //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6480: yāvad vāco gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo vācaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6483: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,2.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6488: yathā vai dve vāmalake dve vā kole dvau vākṣau muṣṭir anubhavaty evaṃ vācaṃ ca nāma ca mano 'nubhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6489: sa yadā manasā manasyati mantrān adhīyīyety athādhīte /
GV05chupsb_u:6492: imaṃ ca lokam amuṃ ceccheyety athecchate /
GV05chupsb_u:6500: yacca yasminnantarbhavati tattasya vyāpakatvāttato bhūyo bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6501: yathā vai loke dve vā'malake phale dve vā kole badaraphale dvau vākṣau vibhītakaphale muṣṭiranubhavati muṣṭiste phale vyāpnoti muṣṭau hi te antarbhavataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6503: sa yadā puruṣe yasminkāle manasāntaḥkaraṇena manasyati manasyanaṃ vivakṣābuddhiḥ kathaṃ?
GV05chupsb_u:6504: mantrānadhīyīyoccārayeyamityevaṃ vivakṣāṃ kṛtvāthādhīte tathā karmāṇi kurvīyeti cikīrṣābuddhiṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6505: kṛtvātha kurute putrāṃśca paśūṃśceccheyeti prāptīcchāṃ kṛtvā tatprāptyupāyānuṣṭhānenāthecchate
GV05chupsb_u:6507: tathemaṃ ca lokamamuṃ copāyeneccheyeti tatpraptyupāyānuṣṭhānenāthecchace prāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:6508: mano hyātmā'tmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca sati manasi nānyatheti mano hyātmetyucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6509: mano hi lokaḥ satyeva hi manasi loko bhavati tatprāptyupāyānuṣṭhānaṃ ceti mano hi loko yasmāttasmānmano hi brahma /
GV05chupsb_u:6513: yāvan manaso gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo mano brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6516: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,3.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6528: vibhāgena hi samarthite viṣaye cikīrṣābuddhirmanasyanānantaraṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6530: yadā vai saṃkalpayate kartavyādiviṣayānvibhajata idaṃ kartuṃ yuktamiti,
GV05chupsb_u:6533: tāṃ ca vācamu nāmni nāmoccāraṇanimittaṃ vivakṣāṃ kṛtverayati nāmni nāmasāmānye mantrāḥ śabdaviśeṣāḥ santa ekaṃ bhavantyantarbhavantītyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6537: yaddhi mantraprakāśanena labdhasattākaṃ satkarma brāhmaṇenedaṃ kartavyamasmai phalāyeti vidhīyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6538: yāpyutpattirbrāhmaṇeṣu karmaṇāṃ dṛśyate sāpi mantreṣu labdhasattākānāmeva karmaṇāṃ spaṣṭīkaraṇam /
GV05chupsb_u:6539: na hi mantrāprakāśitaṃ karma kiñcidbrāhmaṇa utpannaṃ dṛśyate /
GV05chupsb_u:6545: tāni ha vā etāni saṃkalpaikāyanāni saṃkalpātmakāni saṃkalpe pratiṣṭhitāni /
GV05chupsb_u:6558: ChUpBh_7,4.2 tāni ha vā etāni mana ādīni saṃkalpaikāyanāni saṃkalpa eko 'yanaṃ gamanaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6559: pralayo yeṣāṃ tāni saṃkalpaikāyanāni saṃkalpātmakānyutpattau saṃkalpe pratiṣṭhitāni
GV05chupsb_u:6560: sthitau samakḷpatāṃ saṃkalpaṃ kṛtavatyāviva hi dyauśca pṛthivī ca dyāvāpṛthivyau niścale lakṣyete /
GV05chupsb_u:6561: tathā samakalpetāṃ vāyuścā'kāśaṃ caitāvapi saṃkalpaṃ kṛtavantāviva tathā samakalpantāmāpaśca tejaśca svena rūpema niścalāni lakṣyante /
GV05chupsb_u:6562: yatasteṣāṃ dyāvāpṛthivyādīnāṃ saṃkḷptyai saṃkalpanimittaṃ varṣaṃ saṃkalpante /
GV05chupsb_u:6567: mantrāṇāṃ hi saṃkḷptyai karmāṇyagnihotrādīni saṃkalpante 'nuṣṭhīyamānāni mantraprakāśitāni samarthībhavanti phalāya /
GV05chupsb_u:6568: tato lokaḥ phalaṃ saṃkalpate karmakartṛsamavāyitayā samarthībhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6575: kḷptān vai sa lokān dhruvān dhruvaḥ pratiṣṭhitān pratiṣṭhito 'vyathamānān avyathamāno 'bhisidhyati /
GV05chupsb_u:6576: yāvat saṃkalpasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaḥ saṃkalpaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6579: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,4.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:6580: ChUpBh_7,4.3 sa yaḥ saṃkalpaṃ brahmeti brahmabuddhyopāstekḷptānvai dhātrāsyeme lokāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6583: paśuputrādibhiḥ pratitiṣṭhatīti darśanātsvayaṃ ca pratiṣṭhita ātmīyopakaraṇasaṃpanno 'vyathamānānamitrāditrāsarah itānavyathamānaśca svayamabhisidhyatyabhiprāpnotītyarthaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6584: yāvatsaṃkalpasya gataṃ saṃkalpagocarastatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ātmanaḥ saṃkalpasya na tu sarveṣāṃ saṃkalpasyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:6597: cittaṃ cetayitṛtvaṃ prāptakālānurūpabodhavattvamatītāna gataviṣayaprayojananirūpaṇasāmarthyaṃ ca tatsaṃkalpādapi bhūyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6599: yadā vai prāptamiti cetayate tadā dānāya vāpohāya vātha saṃkalpayate 'tha manasyatītyādi pūrvavat //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6601: tāni ha vā etāni cittaikāyanāni cittātmāni citte pratiṣṭhitāni /
GV05chupsb_u:6602: tasmād yady api bahuvid acitto bhavati nāyam astīty evainam āhuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6603: yad ayaṃ veda yad vā ayaṃ vidvān nettham acittaḥ syād iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6604: atha yady alpavic cittavān bhavati tasmā evota śuśrūṣante /
GV05chupsb_u:6609: ChUpBh_7,5.2 tāni saṃkalpādīni karmaphalāntāni cittaikāyanāni cittātmāni cittotpattīni citte pratiṣṭhitāni cittasthitānītyapi pūrvavat /
GV05chupsb_u:6612: bhavati prāptādicetayitṛtvasāmarthyavirahito bhavati taṃ nipuṇā laukikānāyamasti
GV05chupsb_u:6614: yaccāyaṃ kiñcicchāsrādi veda śrutavāṃstadapyasya vṛthaiveti kathayanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6617: athālpavidapi yadi cittavānbhavati tasmā etasmai taduktārthagrahaṇāyaivotāpi śuśrūṣante śrotumicchanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6621: cittān vai sa lokān dhruvān dhruvaḥ pratiṣṭhitān pratiṣṭhito 'vyathamānān avyathamāno 'bhisidhyati /
GV05chupsb_u:6622: yāvac cittasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaś cittaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6625: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,5.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:6626: ChUpBh_7,5.3 cittānupacitānhuddhimadguṇaiḥ sa cittopāsako dhruvānityādi coktārtham //3//
GV05chupsb_u:6636: tasmād ya iha manuṣyāṇāṃ mahattāṃ prāpnuvanti dhyānāpādāṃśā ivaiva te bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6637: atha ye 'lpāḥ kalahinaḥ piśunā upavādinas te /
GV05chupsb_u:6638: atha ye prabhavo dhyānāpādāṃśā ivaiva te bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6641: yāvad dhyānasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo dhyānaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6644: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,6.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6653: devāśca manuṣyāśca devamanuṣyā manuṣyā eva vā devasamā devamanuṣyāḥ śamādiguṇasaṃpannā manuṣyā devasvarūpaṃ na jahatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6654: yasmādevaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dhyānaṃ tasmādya iha loke manuṣyāṇāmeva dhanairvidyayā guṇairvā mahattāṃ mahattvaṃ prāpnuvanti dhanādimahattvahetuṃ labhanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6655: dhyānāpādāṃśā iva dhyānasyā'pādanamāpādo dhyānaphalalābha ityetattasyāṃśo 'vayavaḥ kalā kāciddhyānaphalalābhakalāvanta ivaivetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6656: te bhavanti niścalā iva lakṣyante na kṣudrā iva /
GV05chupsb_u:6657: atha ye punaralpāḥ kṣudrāḥ kiñcidapi dhanādimahattvaikadeśamaprāptāste pūrvoktaviparītāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6658: kalahinaḥ kalahaśīlāḥ piśunāḥ paradoṣodbhāsakā upavādinaḥ paradoṣaṃ sāmīpyayuktameva
GV05chupsb_u:6659: vadituṃ śīlaṃ yoṣāṃ ta upavādinaśca bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6660: atha ye mahattvaṃ prāptā dhanādinimittaṃ te 'nyānprati prabhavantīti prabhavo vidyācāryarājeśvarādayo dhyānāpādāṃśā ivetyādyuktārtham /
GV05chupsb_u:6661: ato dṛśyate dhyānasya mahattvaṃ phalato 'to bhūyaścittādatastadupāḥsvetyādyuktārtham //1-2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6665: vijñānena vā ṛgvedaṃ vijānāti yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam ātharvaṇaṃ caturtham itihāsapurāṇaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6666: pañcamaṃ vedānāṃ vedaṃ pitryaṃ rāśiṃ daivaṃ nidhiṃ vākovākyam ekāyanaṃ devavidyāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6667: brahmavidyāṃ bhūtavidyāṃ kṣatravidyāṃ nakṣatravidyāṃ sarpadevajanavidyāṃ divaṃ ca
GV05chupsb_u:6668: pṛthivīṃ ca vāyuṃ cākāśaṃ cāpaś ca tejaś ca devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca paśūṃś ca vayāṃsi
GV05chupsb_u:6670: dharmaṃ cādharmaṃ ca satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca sādhu cāsādhu ca hṛdayajñaṃ cāhṛdayajñaṃ cānnaṃ ca rasaṃ cemaṃ ca lokam amuṃ ca vijñānenaiva vijānāti
GV05chupsb_u:6674: kathaṃ ca tasya bhūyastvamityāha-vijñānena vā ṛgvedaṃ vijānātyayamṛgveda iti pramāṇatayā yasyārthajñānaṃ dhyānakāraṇam /
GV05chupsb_u:6678: smārte vā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭāviṣayaṃ ca sarvaṃ vijñānenaiva vijānātītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6683: yāvad vijñānasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo vijñānaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6686: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,7.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6687: ChUpBh_7,7.2 śṛṇūpāsanaphalaṃ vijñānavato vijñānaṃ yeṣu lokeṣu tānvijñānavato lokāñjñānavataścābhisidhyatyabhiprāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:6693: api ha śataṃ vijñānavatām eko balavān ākampayate /
GV05chupsb_u:6694: sa yadā balī bhavaty athotthātā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6697: upasīdan draṣṭā bhavati śrotā bhavati mantā bhavati boddhā bhavati kartā bhavati vijñātā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6698: balena vai pṛthivī tiṣṭhati balenāntarikṣaṃ balena dyaur balena parvatā balena devamanuṣyā balena paśavaś ca vayāṃsi ca tṛṇavanaspatayaḥ śvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakam /
GV05chupsb_u:6702: yāvad balasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo balaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6705: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,8.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6708: anaśanādṛgādīni na vai mā pratibhānti bho iti śruteḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6709: śarīre 'pi tadevotthānādisāmarthyaṃ yasmādvijñānavatāṃ śatamapyekaḥ prāṇī balavānā kampayate yathā hastī matto manuṣyāṇāṃ śataṃ samuditamapi
GV05chupsb_u:6710: yasmādevamannādyupayoganimittaṃ balaṃ tasmātsa puruṣo yadā balī balena tadvānbhavatyathotthātotthānasya
GV05chupsb_u:6711: kartottiṣṭhaṃśca gurūṇāmācāryasya ca paricaritā paricaraṇasya śuśrūṣāyāḥ kartā bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:6715: tata idamebhiruktamevamupapadyata ityupapattito mantā bhavati manvānaśca boddhā bhavatyevamevedamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:6716: tata evaṃ niścitya taduktārthasya kartānuṣṭhātā bhavati vijñātānuṣṭhānaphalasyānubhavitā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6717: kiñca balasya māhātmyaṃ balena vai pṛthivī tiṣṭhatītyādyujvartham //1-2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6721: tasmād yady api daśa rātrīr nāśnīyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6724: athānnasyāye draṣṭā bhavati śrotā bhavati mantā bhavati boddhā bhavati kartā bhavati vijñātā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6729: yasmādbalakāraṇamannaṃ tasmādyadyapi kaściddaśa rātrīrnāśnīyātso 'nnopayogānimittasya balasya hānyā mriyate na cenmriyate yadyu ha jīvet /
GV05chupsb_u:6731: athavā sa jīvannapyadraṣṭā bhavati gurorapi tata evāśrotetyādi pūrvaviparītaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6742: yāvad annasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'nnaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6745: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,9.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6746: ChUpBh_7,9.2 phalaṃ cānnavataḥ prabhūtānnānvai sa lokānpānavataḥ prabhūtodakāṃścānnapānayornityasaṃbandhāllokānabhisi dhyati /
GV05chupsb_u:6751: tasmād yadā suvṛṣṭir na bhavati vyādhīyante prāṇā annaṃ kanīyo bhaviṣyatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:6752: atha yadā suvṛṣṭir bhavaty ānandinaḥ prāṇā bhavanty annaṃ bahu bhaviṣyatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:6753: āpa evemā mūrtā yeyaṃ pṛthivī yad antarikṣaṃ yad dyaur yat parvatā yad devamanuṣyā yat paśavaś ca vayāṃsi ca tṛṇavanaspatayaḥ śvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakam
GV05chupsb_u:6757: yasmādevaṃ tasmādyadā yasminkāle suvṛṣṭiḥ sasyahitā śobhanā vṛṣṭirna bhavati tadā vyādhīyante prāṇā duḥkhino bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6759: atha punaryadā suvṛṣṭirbhavati tadā'nandinaḥ sukhino hṛṣṭāḥ prāṇāḥ prāṇino bhavantyantaṃ bahu prabhūtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:6760: apsaṃbhavatvānmūrtasyānnasyā'pa evemā mūrtāmṛrtabhedākārapariṇatā iti mūrtā yeyaṃ pṛthivī yadantarikṣamityādi /
GV05chupsb_u:6765: yāvad apāṃ gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'po brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6768: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,10.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6769: ChUpBh_7,10.2 phalaṃ-sa yo 'po brahmetyupāsta āpnoti sarvānkāmānkāmyānmūrtimato viṣayānityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6775: tad vā etad vāyum āgṛhyākāśam abhitapati tadāhur niśocati nitapati varṣiṣyati vā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6777: tad etad ūrdhvābhiś ca tiraścībhiś ca vidyudbhir āhrādāś caranti tasmād āhur vidyotate stanayati varṣiṣyati vā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6785: sāmānyena jagannitapati dehānato varṣiṣyati vā iti /
GV05chupsb_u:6786: prasiddhaṃ hi loke kāraṇamabhyudyataṃ dṛṣṭavataḥ kārya bhaviṣyatīti vijñānam /
GV05chupsb_u:6791: tasmāttaddarśanādāhurlaukikā vidyotate stanayati varṣiṣyati vā ityādyuktārtham /
GV05chupsb_u:6795: tejasvī vai sa tejasvato lokān bhāsvato 'pahatatamaskān abhisidhyati /
GV05chupsb_u:6796: yāvat tejaso gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yas tejo brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6799: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,11.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6800: ChUpBh_7,11.2 tasya tejasa upāsanaphalaṃ-tejasvī vai bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6806: ākāśe vai sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇy agniḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6816: vāyusahitasya tejasaḥ kāraṇatvādvyomno vāyumāgṛhyeti tejasā sahokto vāyuriti pṛthagiha noktastejasaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6818: yathā ghaṭādibhyo mṛttathā'kāśo vāyusahitasya tejasaḥ kāraṇamiti tato bhūyān /
GV05chupsb_u:6820: ākāśo vai sūryācandramasāvubhau tejorūpau vidyunnakṣatrāṇyagniśca tejorūpāṇyākāśe 'ntaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6822: kiñcā'kāśenā'hvayati cānyamanya āhūtaścetara ākāśena śṛṇotyanyoktaṃ ca śabdamanyaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6823: pratiśṛṇotyākāśe ramate krīḍatyanyonyaṃ sarvastathā na ramate cā'kāśe vadhvādiviyoga
GV05chupsb_u:6829: ākāśavato vai sa lokān prakāśavato 'saṃbādhān urugāyavato 'bhisidhyati /
GV05chupsb_u:6830: yāvad ākāśasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya ākāśaṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6833: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,12.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6834: ChUpBh_7,12.2 phalaṃ śṛṇvākāśavato vai vistārayuktānsa vidvāṃllokānprakāśavataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6841: tasmād yady api bahava āsīrann a smaranto naiva te kaṃcana śṛṇuyur na manvīran na vijānīran /
GV05chupsb_u:6842: yadā vāva te smareyur atha śṛṇuyur atha manvīrann atha vijānīran /
GV05chupsb_u:6843: smareṇa vai putrān vijānāti smareṇa paśūn /
GV05chupsb_u:6846: yāvat smarasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaḥ smaraṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6849: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,13.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6852: sa ākāśādbhūyāniti draṣṭavyaṃ liṅgavyatyayena smartuḥ smaraṇe hi satyākāśādi sarvamarthavatsmaraṇavato bhogyatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6856: dṛśyate hi loke smaraṇasya bhūyastvaṃ yasmāttasmādyadyapi samuditā bahava ekasminnāsīrannupaviśeyuste
GV05chupsb_u:6857: tatrā'sīnā anyonyabhāṣitamapi na smarantaścetsyurnaiva te kañcana śabdaṃ śṛṇuyustathā
GV05chupsb_u:6858: na manvīranmantavyaṃ cetsmareyustadā manvīransmṛtyabhāvānna manvīraṃstathā na vijānīran /
GV05chupsb_u:6859: yadā vāva te smareyurmantavyaṃ vijñātavyaṃ śrotavyaṃ cātha śṛṇuyuratha manvīrannatha vijānīran /
GV05chupsb_u:6860: tathā smareṇa vai mama putrā eta iti putrānvijānāti smareṇa paśūn /
GV05chupsb_u:6866: āśeddho vai smaro mantrān adhīte karmāṇi kurute putrāṃś ca paśūṃś cecchata imaṃ ca lokaṃ amuṃ cecchate /
GV05chupsb_u:6869: āśāprāptavastvākāṅkṣā'śā tṛṣṇā kāma iti yāmāhuḥ paryāyaiḥ sā ca smarādbhūyasī /
GV05chupsb_u:6873: āśāviṣayarūpaṃ smarannasau smaro bhavatyata āśeddha āśayābhivardhitaḥ smarabhūtaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:6874: smarannṛgādīnmantrānadhīte 'dhītya ca tadarthaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo vidhīṃśca śrutvā karmāṇi
GV05chupsb_u:6877: amuṃ ca lokamāśeddhaḥ smaraṃstatsādhanānuṣṭhānenecchate 'ta āśāraśānāvabaddhaṃ smarākāśādināmaparyantaṃ jagaccakrībhūtaṃ pratiprāṇi /
GV05chupsb_u:6878: atra āśa āyāḥ smarādapi bhūyastvamityata āśāmupāḥsva //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:6883: yāvad āśāyā gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya āśāṃ brahmety upāste /
GV05chupsb_u:6886: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti // ChUp_7,14.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:6887: ChUpBh_7,14.2 yastvāśāṃ brahmetyupāste śṛṇu tasya phalam /
GV05chupsb_u:6888: āśayā sadopāsitayāsyopāsakasya sarve kāmāḥ samṛdhyanti samṛddhiṃ gacchanti /
GV05chupsb_u:6889: amoghā hāsyā'śiṣaḥ prārthanāḥ sarvā bhavanti yatprārthitaṃ sarvaṃ tadavaśyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6894: yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evam asmin prāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam /
GV05chupsb_u:6906: yena ca sarvato vyāpināntarbahirgatena sūtre maṇigaṇā iva sūtreṇa grathitaṃ vidhṛtaṃ ca /
GV05chupsb_u:6907: sa eṣa prāṇo vā āśāyā bhūyān /
GV05chupsb_u:6909: yathā vai loke rathacakrasyārā rathanābhau samarpitāḥ saṃprotāḥ saṃpraveśitā ityetat /
GV05chupsb_u:6910: evamasmiṃlliṅgasaṃghātarūpe prāṇe prajñātmani dehike mukhye yasminparā devatā nāmarūpavyākaraṇāyā'darśādau pratibimbivajjīvenā'tmanānupratiṣṭā
GV05chupsb_u:6912: “kasminnannvahamutkrānta utkrānto baviṣyāmi kasminvā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti sa prāṇamasṛjata“iti śruteḥ yastu cchāyevānugata īśvaram /
GV05chupsb_u:6913: “tadyathā rathasyāreṣu nemirarpito nābhāvarā arpitā evamevaitā bhūtamātrāḥ prajñāmātrāsvarpitāḥ prajñāmātrāḥ prāṇe 'rpitāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6916: ataḥ sa eṣa prāṇo 'paratantraḥ prāṇena svaśaktyaiva yāti nānyakṛtaṃ gamanādikriyāsvasya sāmarthyamityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6917: sarvaṃ kriyākārakaphalabhedajātaṃ prāṇa eva na prāṇādbahirbhūtamastīti prakaraṇārthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6922: sa yadi pitaraṃ vā mātaraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā svasāraṃ vācāryaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā kiṃcid bhṛśam iva pratyāha /
GV05chupsb_u:6924: pitṛhā vai tvam asi mātṛhā vai tvam asi bhrātṛhā vai tvam asi svasṛhā vai tvam asy ācāryahā vai tvam asi brāhmaṇahā vai tvam asīti // ChUp_7,15.2
GV05chupsb_u:6926: ucyate - sati prāṇe pitrādiṣu pitrādiśabdaprayogāttadutkrāntau ca prayogābhāvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:6928: sa yaḥ kaścitpitrādīnāmanyatamaṃ yadi taṃ bhṛśamiva tadananurūpamiva kiñcidvacanaṃ tvaṅkārādiyuktaṃ pratyāha tadainaṃ pārśvasthā āhurvivekino dhiktvāstu dhigastu tvāmityevam /
GV05chupsb_u:6931: atha yady apy enān utkrāntaprāṇāñ chūlena samāsaṃ vyatiṣaṃdahet /
GV05chupsb_u:6932: naivainaṃ brūyuḥ pitṛhāsīti na mātṛhāsīti na bhrātṛhāsīti na svasṛhāsīti nācāryahāsīti na brāhmaṇahāsīti // ChUp_7,15.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:6933: ChUpBh_7,15.3 athainānevotkrāntaprāṇāṃstyaktadehānatha yadyapi śūlena samāsaṃ samasya
GV05chupsb_u:6939: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ativādī bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:6943: ChUpBh_7,15.4 tasmātprāṇo hyevaitāni pitrādīni sarvāṇi bhavati calāni sthirāṇi ca /
GV05chupsb_u:6944: sa vā eṣa prāṇavidevaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa paśyanphalato 'nubhavannevaṃ manvāna upapattibhiścintayannevaṃ vijānannupapattibhiḥ saṃyojyaivameveti niścayaṃ kurvannityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6945: mananavijñānābhyāṃ hi saṃbhūtaḥ śāsrārtho niścito dṛṣṭo bhavet /
GV05chupsb_u:6946: ata evaṃ paśyannativādī bhavati nāmādyāśāntamatītya vadanaśīlo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6947: taṃ cedbrūyustaṃ yadyevamativādinaṃ sarvadā sarvaiḥ śabdairnāmādyāśāntamatītya vartamānaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:6949: hi jagataḥ prāṇa ātmāhamiti bruvāṇaṃ yadi brūyurativādyasīti /
GV05chupsb_u:6955: eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati /
GV05chupsb_u:6959: ChUpBh_7,16.1 sa eṣa nāradaḥ sarvātiśayaṃ prāṇaṃ svamātmānaṃ sarvātmānaṃ śrutvā nātaḥ paramastītyupararāma /
GV05chupsb_u:6960: na pūrvavatkimasti bhagavaḥ prāṇādbhūya iti papraccha /
GV05chupsb_u:6961: yatastamevaṃ vikārānṛtabrahmavijñānena parituṣṭamakṛtārthaṃ paramārthasatyātivādinamātmānaṃ manyamānaṃ yogyaṃ śiṣyaṃ mithyāgrahaviśeṣādvipracyāvayannāha bhagavānsanatkumāraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6962: eṣa tu vā ativadati yamahaṃ vakṣyāmi na prāṇavidativādī paramārthataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6964: yastu bhūmākhyaṃ sarvātikrāntaṃ tattvaṃ paramārthasatyaṃ veda so 'tivādītyata āha-eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ sateyana paramārthasatyavijñānavattayātivadati
GV05chupsb_u:6965: so 'haṃ tvāṃ prapanno bhagavansatyenātivadāni tathāmāṃ niyunaktu bhagavānyathāhaṃ satyenātivadānītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6966: yadyevaṃ satyenātivaditumicchasi satyameva tu tāvadvijijñāsitavyamityukta āha nāradaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:6967: tathāstu tarhi satya bhagavo vijijñāse viśeṣeṇa jñātumiccheyaṃ tvatto 'hamiti //1//
GV05chupsb_u:6970: yadā vai vijānāty atha satyaṃ vadati /
GV05chupsb_u:6975: ChUpBh_7,17.1 yadā vai satyaṃ paramārthato vijānātīdaṃ paramārthaḥ satyamiti,
GV05chupsb_u:6976: tato 'nṛtaṃ vikārajātaṃ vācārambhaṇaṃ hitvā sarvavikārāvasthaṃ sadevaikaṃ satyamiti tadevātha vadati yadvadati /

GV05chupsb_u:7131: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ātmaratir ātmakrīḍa ātmamithuna ātmānandaḥ sa svarāḍ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7133: atha ye 'nyathāto vidur anyarājānas te kṣayyalokā bhavanti /

GV05chupsb_u:7136: ātmaiva sarvataḥ sarvamityevamekamajaṃ sarvato vyomavatpūrṇamanyaśūnyaṃ paśyansa vā eṣa vidvānmananavijñānābhyāmātmaratirātmanyeva ratī ramaṇaṃ yasya so 'yamātmaratiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7139: loke srībhiḥ sakhibhiśca krīḍatīti darśanāt na tathā viduṣaḥ kiṃ tarhyātmavijñānanimittamevobhayaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7140: mithunaṃ dvaṃndvajanitaṃ sukhaṃ tadapi dvandvanirapekṣaṃ yasya viduṣaḥ /

GV05chupsb_u:7142: sa evaṃlakṣaṇo vidvāñjīvanneva svārājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ patite 'pi dehe svarāḍeva bhavati /

GV05chupsb_u:7146: atha punarye 'nyathāta uktadarśanādanyathā vaiparītyena yathoktameva vā samyaṅna viduste 'nyarājāno bhavanti anyaḥ paro rājā svāmī yeṣāṃ te 'nyarājānaste /

GV05chupsb_u:7217: athānantaraṃ yadidaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ daharamalpaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ puṇḍarīkasadṛśaṃ veśmeva veśma dvārapālādimattvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7218: asminbrahmapure brahmaṇaḥ parasya puraṃ rājño 'nekaprakṛtimadyathāpuraṃ tathedamanekendriyamanobuddhibhiḥ svāmyarthakāribhiryuktamiti brahmapuram

GV05chupsb_u:7221: asminhi svavikāraśiṅge dehe nāmarūpavyākaraṇāya praviṣṭaṃ sadākhyaṃ braṅma jīvenā'tmanetyuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:7230: tadvāva tadeva ca viśeṣeṇa jijñāsitavyaṃ gurvāśrayaśravaṇādyupāyairanviṣya ca sākṣātkaraṇīyamityarthaḥ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7232: taṃ ced brūyur yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāśaḥ kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyaṃ yad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti /

GV05chupsb_u:7270: ChUpBh_8,1.4 taṃ cedevamuktavantaṃ brūyuḥ punarantevāsinaḥ asmiṃścedyathokte cedyadi brahmapuropalakṣitāntarākāśa ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7271: idaṃ sarvaṃ samāhitaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ /
