GV05chupsb_u:7283: yathā hy eveha prajā anvāviśanti yathānuśāsanam /
GV05chupsb_u:7284: yaṃ yam antam abhikāmā bhavanti yaṃ janapadaṃ yaṃ kṣetrabhāgaṃ taṃ tam evopajīvanti // ChUp_8,1.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:7287: asya dehasya jarayaitadyathoktamantarākāśākhyaṃ braṅma yasminsarva samāhitaṃ na jīryati dehavanna vikriyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7288: na cāsya vadhena śasrādighātenaitaddhanyate yathā'kāśaṃ kimu tato 'pi sūkṣmataramaśabdamasparśaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7289: brahma dehendriyādidoṣairna spṛśyata ityetasminnavasare vaktavyaṃ prāptaṃ tatprakṛtavyāsaṅgo
GV05chupsb_u:7292: etatsatyamavitathaṃ brahmapuraṃ brahmaiva puraṃ brahmapuraṃ śarīrākhyaṃ tu brahmapuraṃ brahmopalakṣaṇārthatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7295: tadvikāre 'nṛte 'pi dehaśuṅge brahmopalabhyata iti brahmapuramityuktaṃ vyāvahārikam /
GV05chupsb_u:7298: ato 'sminpuṇḍarīkopalakṣite brahmapure sarve kāmā ye bahirbhavadbhiḥ prārthyante te 'sminneva svātmani samāhitāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7305: taduktaṃ pūrvameva na vadhenāsya hanyata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7307: yadyapi dehasaṃbandhibhyāṃ jarāmṛtyubhyāṃ na saṃbadhyate 'nyathāpi saṃbandhastābhyāṃ syādityāśaṅkānivṛttyartham /
GV05chupsb_u:7312: nanvapahatapāpmatvena jarādayaḥ śokāntāḥ pratiṣiddhā eva bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:7315: jarādipratiṣedhena vā dharmādharmayoḥ kāryābhāve vidyamānayorapyasatsamatvamiti pṛthakpratiṣedho 'narthakaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7316: satyamevaṃ tathāpi dharmakāryā nandavyatirekeṇa svābhāvikānando yatheśvare vijñānamānandaṃ brahmeti śruteḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7321: satyā avitathāḥ kāmā yasya so 'yaṃ satyakāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7324: tathā kāmahetavaḥ saṃkalpā api satyā yasya sa satyasaṃkalpaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7327: yathoktalakṣaṇa evā'tmā vijñeyo gurubhyaḥ śāstrataścā'tmasaṃvedyatayā ca svārājyakāmaiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7331: yathānuśāsanaṃ yatheha prajā anyaṃ svāminaṃ manyamānāḥ svasya svāmino yathā yathānuśāsanaṃ tathā tathānvāviśanti /
GV05chupsb_u:7333: yaṃ yamantaṃ pratyantaṃ janapadaṃ kṣetrabhāgaṃ cābhikāmā arthinyo bhavantyātmabuddhyanurūpaṃ taṃ tameva ca pratyantādimupajīvantīti /
GV05chupsb_u:7336: tad yatheha karmajito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇyajito lokaḥ kṣīyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7337: tad ya ihātmānam ananuvidya vrajanty etāṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7338: atha ya ihātmānam anivudya vrajanty etaṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_8,1.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:7340: tattatra yatheha loke tāsāmeva svāmyanuśāsanānuvartinīnāṃ prajānāṃ sevādijito lokaḥ parādhīnopabhogaḥ kṣīyate 'ntavānbhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7341: athedānīṃ dārṣṭāntikamupasaṃharati-evamevāmutrāgnihotrādipuṇyaj ito lokaḥ parādhīnopabhogaḥ kṣīyata evetyukto doṣa eṣāmiti viṣayaṃ darśayati-tadya ityādinā /
GV05chupsb_u:7342: tattatrehāsmiṃlloke jñānakarmaṇoradhikṛtā yogyāḥ santa ātmānaṃ yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ śāstrācāryopadiṣṭamananuvidya
GV05chupsb_u:7343: yathopadeśamanu svasaṃvedyatāmakṛtvā vrajanti dehādasmāt prayanti ya etāṃśca yathoktān
GV05chupsb_u:7344: satyān satyasaṃkalpakāryāṃśca svātmasthān kāmānananuvidya vrajanti teṣāṃ sarveṣu
GV05chupsb_u:7347: atha ye 'nya iha loka ātmānaṃ śāsrācāryoradeśamanuvidya svātmasaṃvedyatāmāpādya vrajanti
GV05chupsb_u:7348: yathoktāṃśca satyānkāmāṃsteṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati rājña iva sārvabhaumasyeha loke //6 //
GV05chupsb_u:7354: ChUpBh_8,2.1 kathaṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavatīti,
GV05chupsb_u:7356: saṃstatsthāṃśca satyānkāmānsa tyaktadeho yadi pitṛlokakāmaḥ pitaro janayitārasta
GV05chupsb_u:7357: eva sukhahetutvena bhogyatvāllokā ucyante teṣu kāmo yasya taiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃbandhecchā
GV05chupsb_u:7358: yasya bhavati tasya saṃkalpamātrādeva pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhintyātmasaṃbandhitāmāpadyante /
GV05chupsb_u:7359: viśuddhasattvatayā satyasaṃkalpatvādīśvarasyeva tena pitṛlokena bhogena saṃpannaḥ saṃpattiriṣṭaprāptistayā samṛddho mahīyate pūjyate vardhate vā mahimānamanubhavati //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7387: na hi duḥkhahetubhūtāsu grāmasūkarādijanmanimittāsu mātṛṣu viśuddhasattvasya yogina icchā tatsaṃbandho vā yuktaḥ //2-9 //
GV05chupsb_u:7394: yaṃ ca kāmaṃ kāmayate yathoktavyatirekeṇāpi so 'syāntaḥ prāptumiṣṭaḥ kāmaśca saṃkalpādeva samuttiṣṭhatyasya /
GV05chupsb_u:7400: yo yo hy asyetaḥ praiti na tam iha darśanāya labhate // ChUp_8,3.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7402: khalu vartate yatsvātmasthāḥ śakyaprāpyā api ta ime satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānāsteṣāmātmasthānāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7403: svāśrayāṇāmeva satāmanṛtaṃ ba3hyaviṣayeṣu stryannabhojanācchādanādiṣu tṛṣṇā tannimittaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7407: ucyate-yo yo hi yasmādasya jantoḥ putro bhrātā veṣṭa ito 'smāllokātpraiti pragacchati
GV05chupsb_u:7408: mriyate tamiṣṭaṃ putraṃ bhrātaraṃ vā svahṛdayākāśe vidyamānamapīha punardarśanāyecchannapi na labhate //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7410: atha ye cāsyeha jīvā ye ca pretā yac cānyad icchan na labhate sarvaṃ tad atra gatvā vindate /
GV05chupsb_u:7411: atra hy asyaite satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7412: tad yathāpi hiraṇyanidhiṃ nihitam akṣetrajñā upary upari sañcaranto na vindeyuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7413: evam evemāḥ sarvāḥ prajā ahar ahar gacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanty anṛtena hi pratyūḍhāḥ // ChUp_8,3.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7414: ChUpBh_8,3.2 atha punarye cāsya viduṣo jantorjīvā jīvantīha putrā bhrātrādayo vā
GV05chupsb_u:7415: ye ca pretā mṛtā iṣṭāḥ saṃbandhino yaccānyadiha loke vastrānnapānādi ratnādi vā vastvicchanna
GV05chupsb_u:7416: labhate tatsarvamatra hṛdayākāśākhye brahmaṇi gatvā yathoktena vidhinā vindate labhate /
GV05chupsb_u:7417: atrāsminhārdākāśe hi yasmādasyaite yathoktāḥ satyāḥ kāmā vartante 'natāpidhānāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7418: kathamiva tadanyāyyamityucyate-tattatra yathā hiraṇyanidhiṃ hiraṇyameva punargrahaṇāya
GV05chupsb_u:7419: nidhātṛbhirnidhīyata iti nidhistaṃ hiraṇyanidhiṃ nihitaṃ bhūmeradhastānnikṣiptamakṣetrajñā
GV05chupsb_u:7420: nidhiśāsrairnidhikṣetramajānantaste nidheruparyupari saṃcaranto 'pi nidhiṃ na vindeyuḥ śakyavedanamapi /
GV05chupsb_u:7421: evamevemā avidyavatyaḥ sarvā imāḥ prajā yathoktaṃ hṛdayākāśākhyaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmaiva
GV05chupsb_u:7422: loko brahmalokastamaharahaḥ pratyahaṃ gacchantyo 'pi suṣuptakāle na vidandanti na
GV05chupsb_u:7424: anṛtena hi yathoktena hi yasmātpratyūḍhā hṛtāḥ svarūpādavidyādidoṣairbahipakṛṣṭā ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7425: ataḥ kaṣṭamidaṃ vartate jantūnāṃ yatsvāyattamapi brahma na labhyata ityabhiprāyaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7428: tasyaitad eva niruktaṃ hṛdy ayam iti tasmād dhṛd ayam /
GV05chupsb_u:7429: ahar ahar vā evaṃvit svargaṃ lokam eti // ChUp_8,3.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:7430: ChUpBh_8,3.3 sa vai ya ātmāpahatapāpmeti prakṛto vaiśabdena taṃ smārayatyeṣa vivakṣita ātmā hṛdi hṛdayapuṇḍarīka ākāśaśabdenābhihitaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7432: hṛdyayamātmā vartata iti yasmāt tasmāddhṛdayaṃ hṛdayanāmanirvacanaprasiddhyāpi svahṛdaya ātmetyavagantavyamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7433: aharaharvai pratyahamevaṃviddhṛdyayamātmeti jānansvargaṃ lokaṃ hārdaṃ brahmaiti pratipadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7434: nanvanevaṃvidapi suṣuptakāle hārdaṃ brahma pratipadyata eva suṣuptakāle satā somya tadā saṃpanna ityuktatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7436: yathā jānannajānaṃśca sarvo jantuḥ sadbrahmaiva tathāpi tattvamasīti pratibodhito vidvānsadeva nānyo 'smīti jānansadeva bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7437: evameva vidvānavidvāṃścasuṣupte yadyapi satsaṃpadyate tathāpyevaṃvideva svargaṃ lokametītyucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7440: atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpenābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:7442: tasya ha vā etasya brahmaṇo nāma satyam iti // ChUp_8,3.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:7443: ChUpBh_8,3.4 suṣuptakāle svenā'manā satā saṃpannaḥ sansamyakprasīdatīti jāgratsvapnayorviṣayendriyasaṃyogajātaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7444: kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti saṃprasādaśabdo yadyapi sarvajantūnāṃ sādhāraṇastathāpyevaṃvitsvargaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7445: lokametīti prakṛtatvādeṣa saṃprasāda iti saṃnihitavadyatnaviśeṣātso 'thedaṃ śarīraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7450: svarūpameva hi tanna bhavati pratipattavyaṃ cetsyāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7452: svena ātmīyena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate prāgetasyāḥ svarūpasaṃpatteravidyayā dehamevāparaṃ rūpamātmatvenopagata iti tadapekṣayedamucyate svena rūpeṇeti
GV05chupsb_u:7453: aśarīratā hyātmanaḥ svarūpaṃ yatsvaṃ paraṃ jyotiḥsvarūpamāpadye saṃprasāda eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:7455: kiñcaitadamṛtamavināśi bhūmā yo vai bhūmā tadamṛtamityuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:7457: tasya ha vā etasya brahmaṇo nāmābhidhānam /
GV05chupsb_u:7463: 8.3.5 tāni ha vā etāni trīṇyakṣarāṇi satīyamiti tadyatsattdamṛtamatha yatti tanmartyamatha
GV05chupsb_u:7464: yadyaṃ tenobhe yacchati yadanenobhe yacchati tasmādyamaharaharvā evaṃvitsvargaṃ lokameti //5 //
GV05chupsb_u:7465: ChUpBh_8,3.5 tāni ha vā etāni brahmaṇo nāmākṣarāṇi trīṇyetāni satīyāmati sakārastakāro yamiti ca /
GV05chupsb_u:7468: tattatra yatsatsakārastadamṛtaṃ sadbrahmāmṛtavācakatvādamṛta eva sakārastakāranto nirdiṣṭaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7470: atha yadyamakṣaraṃ tenākṣareṇāmṛtamartyākhye pūrve ubhe 'kṣare yacchati yamayati niyamayati vaśīkarotyātmana ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7478: atha ya ātmā sa setur dhṛtir eṣāṃ lokānām asaṃbhedāya /
GV05chupsb_u:7479: naitaṃ setum ahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyur na śoko na sukṛtam /
GV05chupsb_u:7483: uktalakṣaṇo yaḥ saṃprasādastasya svarūpaṃ vakṣyamāṇairuktaiśca guṇaiḥ punaḥ stūyate brahmacaryasādhanasaṃbandhārtham /
GV05chupsb_u:7484: ya eṣa yathoktalakṣaṇa ātmā sa seturiva setuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7486: anena hi sarvaṃ jagadvarṇāśramādikriyākārakaphalādibhedaniyamaiḥ karturanurūpaṃ vidadhatā vidhṛtam /
GV05chupsb_u:7489: kiṃviśṣṭaścāsau seturityāha-naitam setumātmānamahorātre sarvasya janimataḥ paricchedake satī naitaṃ tarataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7490: yathānye saṃsāriṇaḥ kālenāhorātrādilakṣaṇena paricchedyā na tathāyaṃ kālaparicchedya ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7492: ata evainaṃ na jarā tarati na prāpnoti /
GV05chupsb_u:7493: tathā na mṛtyurna śoko na sukṛtaṃ na dṛṣkṛtaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛte dharmādharmai /
GV05chupsb_u:7496: na śakyaṃ hi kāraṇātikramaṇaṃ kartuṃ kāryeṇa /
GV05chupsb_u:7501: yadyapi pūrvaṃ ya ātmāpahatapāpmetyādinā pāpmādipratiṣedha ukta eva tathāpīhāyaṃ viśeṣo na taratīti prāptiviṣayatvaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7503: ahorātrādyā uktā anuktāścānye sarve pāpmāna ucyante 'to 'smādātmanaḥ setornivartante 'prāpyaivetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7504: apahatapāpmā hyeṣa brahmaiva loko brahmaloka uktaḥ //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7506: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā andhaḥ sann anandho bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7509: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā api naktam ahar evābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7510: sakṛd vibhāto hy evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ // ChUp_8,4.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7511: ChUpBh_8,4.2 yasmācca pāpmakārya māndhyādi śarīravataḥ syānna tvaśarīrasya tasmādvā etamātmānaṃ setuṃ tīrvā prāpyānandho bhavati dehavattve pūrvamandho 'pi san /
GV05chupsb_u:7512: tatā viddhaḥ sandehavattve sa dehaviyoge setuṃ tīrtvā prāpyānandho bhavati dehavattve pūrvamandho 'pi san /
GV05chupsb_u:7513: tathā viddhaḥ sandehavattve sa dehaviyogo setuṃ prāpyāviddho bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7515: kiñca yasmādahorātre na staḥ setau tasmādvā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā prāpya naktamapi tamorūpaṃ rātrirapi sarvamaharevābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7516: vijñaptyātmajyotiḥ svarūpamaharivāhaḥ sadaikarūpaṃ viduṣaḥ saṃpadyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7517: sakṛdvibhātaḥ sadā vibhātaḥ sadaikarūpaḥ svena rūpeṇaiṣa brahmalokaḥ //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7519: tad ya evaitaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7520: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_8,4.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:7521: ChUpBh_8,4.3 tattatraivaṃ satyetaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmacaryeṇa srīviṣayatṛṣṇātyāgena
GV05chupsb_u:7528: atha yad yajña ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chupsb_u:7529: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva yo jñātā taṃ vindate /
GV05chupsb_u:7530: atha yad iṣṭam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chupsb_u:7532: ChUpBh_8,5.1 ya ātmā setutvādiguṇaiḥ stutastatprāptaye jñānasahakārisādhanāntaraṃ brahmacaryākhyaṃ vidātavyamityāha /
GV05chupsb_u:7533: yajñādibhiśca tatstauti kartavyārtham- atha yadyajña ityācakṣate loke paramapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ kathayanti śiṣṭāstadbrahmacaryameva /
GV05chupsb_u:7534: yajñasyāpi yatphalaṃ tadbrahmacaryavāllaṃbhate 'to yajño 'pi brahmacaryaṃ bhavati pratipattavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:7535: kathaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yajña ityāha-brahmacaryeṇaiva hi yasmādyo jñātāsa taṃ brahmalokaṃ yajñasyāpi pāramparyeṇa phalabhūtaṃ vindate labhate tato yajño 'pi brahmacaryameveti /
GV05chupsb_u:7539: brahmacaryeṇaiva sādhanena tamīśvaramiṣṭvā pūjayitvāthavaiṣaṇāmātmaviṣayāṃ kṛtvā tamātmānamanuvindate /
GV05chupsb_u:7542: atha yat sattrāyaṇam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chupsb_u:7543: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva sata ātmanas trāṇaṃ vindate /
GV05chupsb_u:7544: atha yan maunam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chupsb_u:7545: brahmacaryeṇa hy evātmānam anuvidya manute // ChUp_8,5.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7546: ChUpBh_8,5.2 atha yatsattrāyaṇamityācakṣate brahmacaryameva tattathā sataḥ parasmādātmana ātmanasrāṇaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ brahmacaryasādhanena vindate
GV05chupsb_u:7548: atha yanmaunamityācakṣate brahmacaryameva tadbrahmacaryeṇaiva sādhanena yuktaḥ sannātmānaṃ śāsrācāryābhyāmanuvidya paścānmanute dhyāyati /
GV05chupsb_u:7551: atha yad anāśakāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chupsb_u:7552: eṣa hy ātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate /
GV05chupsb_u:7553: atha yad araṇyāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat /
GV05chupsb_u:7554: tat araś ca ha vai ṇyaś cārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyām ito divi /
GV05chupsb_u:7557: tad aparājitā pūr brahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam // ChUp_8,5.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:7559: yamātmānaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate sa eṣa hyātmā brahmacaryasādhanavato na naśyati tasmādanāśakāyanamapi brahmacaryameva /
GV05chupsb_u:7563: puruṣārthasādhanaiḥ stutatvādbrahmacaryaṃ paramaṃ jñānasya sahakārikāraṇaṃ sādhanamityato
GV05chupsb_u:7565: tattatra hi brahmaloke 'raśca ha vai prasiddho ṇyaścārṇavau samudropame vā sarasī
GV05chupsb_u:7566: tṛtīyasyāṃ bhuvamantarikṣaṃ cāpekṣya tṛtīyā dyaustasyāṃ tṛtīyasyāmito 'smāllokādārabhya gaṇyamānāyāṃ divi /
GV05chupsb_u:7567: tattatraiva cairamirānnaṃ tanmaya airo maṇḍastena pūrṇamairaṃ madīyaṃ tadupayogināṃ madakaraṃ harṣotpādakaṃ saraḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7568: tatraiva cāśvattho vṛkṣaḥ somasavano nāmataḥ somo 'mṛtaṃ tanniḥsravo 'mṛtasrava iti vā /
GV05chupsb_u:7569: tatraiva ca brahmaloke brahmacaryasādhanarahitairbrahmacaryasādhanavadbhyo 'nyairna jīyata ityaparājitā nāma pūḥ purī brahmaṇo hiraṇyagarbhasya
GV05chupsb_u:7570: brahmaṇā ca prabhuṇā viśeṣeṇa mitaṃ nirmitaṃ tacca hiraṇmayaṃ sauvarṇaṃ prabhuvimitaṃ maṇḍapamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:7572: tad ya evaitāv araṃ ca ṇyaṃ cārṇavau brahmaloke brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7573: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati // ChUp_8,5.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:7574: ChUpBh_8,5.4 tattatra hi brahmaloka etāvarṇavau yāvaraṇyākhyāvuktau brahmacaryeṇa
GV05chupsb_u:7575: sādhanenānuvindanti ye teṣāmevaiṣa yo vyākhyāto brahmalokasteṣāṃ ca brahmacaryasādhavanatāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7578: nanvatra tvamindrastvaṃ yamastvaṃ varuṇa ityādibhiryathā kaścitstūyate mahārha evamiṣṭādibhiḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7579: śabdairna stryādiviṣayatṛṣṇānivṛttimātraṃ stutyarhaṃ kiṃ tarhi jñānasya mokṣasādhanatvāttadeveṣṭādibhiḥ stūyata iti kecit / na /
GV05chupsb_u:7583: nanu ca yajñādibhiḥ stutaṃ brahmacaryamiti yajñādīnāṃ puruṣārthasādhanatvaṃ gamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7585: na tviha brahmalokaṃ prati yajñādīnāṃ sādhanatvamabhipretya yajñādibhirbrahmacaryaṃ stūyate kiṃ tarhi teṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ puruṣārthasādhanatvamapekṣya
GV05chupsb_u:7586: yathendrādibhī rājā na tu yatrendrādīnāṃ vyāpārastatraiva rājña iti tadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:7587: ya imer'ṇavādayo brāhmalaukikāḥ saṃkalpajāśca pitrādayo bhogāste kiṃ pārthivā āpyāśca yatheha loke dṛśyante taddhadarṇavavṛkṣapūḥsvarṇamaṇḍapānyāhosvinmānasapratyayamātrāṇīti
GV05chupsb_u:7588: kiñcātaḥ, yadi pārthivā āpyāśca sthūlāḥ syurhṛdyākāśe samādhānānupapattiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7589: purāṇe ca“manomayāni brahmaloke śarīrādīnī“ti vākyaṃ virudhyeta /
GV05chupsb_u:7591: nanu“samudrāḥ saritaḥ sarāṃsi vāpyaḥ kūpā yajñā vedā mantrādayaśca mūrtimanto brahmāṇamupatiṣṭhanta“iti mānasatvai virudhyeta purāṇasmṛtiḥ / na /
GV05chupsb_u:7594: kalpanāyāṃ yathāprasiddhā eva mānasya ākāravatyaḥ puṃstryādyā mūrtayo yuktāḥ kalpayituṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7596: dṛṣṭā hi mānasya evā'kāravatyaḥ puṃstryādyā mūrtayaḥ svapne /
GV05chupsb_u:7598: ta ime satyāḥ kāmā iti śrutistathā sati virudhyeta / na /
GV05chupsb_u:7600: mānasā hi pratyayāḥ srīpuruṣādyākārāḥ svapne dṛśyante /
GV05chupsb_u:7601: nanu jāgradvāsanārūpāḥ svapnadṛśyā na tu tatra stryādayaḥ svapne vidyante /
GV05chupsb_u:7604: saṃkalpamūlā hi lokā iti coktam“samakḷpatāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī“ityatra /
GV05chupsb_u:7605: sarvaśrutiṣu ca pratyagātmana utpattiḥ pralayaśca tatraiva sthitiśca“yathā vā arā nābhau“ityādinocyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7606: tasmānmānasānāṃ bāhyānāṃ ca viṣayāṇāmitaretarakāryakāraṇamiṣyata eva bījāṅkuravat /
GV05chupsb_u:7607: yadyapi bāhyā eva mānasā mānasā eva ca bāhyā nānṛtatvaṃ teṣāṃ kadācidapi svātmani bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7608: nanu svapne dṛṣṭāḥ pratibuddhasyānṛtā bhavanti viṣayāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7611: tathā svapnabodhāpekṣaṃ ca jāgraddṛṣṭaviṣayānṛtatvaṃ na svataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7612: viśeṣākāramātraṃ tu sarveṣāṃ mithyāpratyayanimittamiti vācā'rambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyamanṛtaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇītyeva satyam /
GV05chupsb_u:7613: tānyapyākāraviśeṣato 'nṛtaṃ svataḥ sanmātrarūpatayā satyam prāksadātmapratibodhātsvaviṣaye 'pi sarvaṃ styameva svapnadṛśyā iveti na kaścidvirodhaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7614: tasmānmānasā eva brāhmalaukikā araṇyādayaḥ pitrādayaḥ kāmāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7616: satsatyātmapratibodhe 'pi rajjvāmiva kalpitāḥ sarpādayaḥ sadātmasvarūpatāmeva pratipadyanta iti sadātmanā satyā eva bhavanti //4//
GV05chupsb_u:7619: atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāḥ piṅgalasyāṇimnas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya nīlasya pītasya lohitasyeti /
GV05chupsb_u:7620: asau vādityaḥ piṅgala eṣa śukla eṣa nīla eṣa pīta eṣa lohitaḥ // ChUp_8,6.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7622: sannupāste tasyeyaṃ mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā gatirvaktavyeti nāḍīkhaṇḍa ārabhyate- atha
GV05chupsb_u:7623: yā etā vakṣyamāṇā hṛdayasya puṇḍarīkākārasya brahmopāsanasthānasya saṃbandhinyo nāḍyo
GV05chupsb_u:7625: varṇaviśeṣaviśiṣṭasyāṇimnaḥ sūkṣmarasasya rasena pūrṇāstadākārā eva tiṣṭhanti vartanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7626: tathā śuklasya nīlasya pītasya lohitasya ca rasasya pūrṇā iti sarvatrādhyāhāryam /
GV05chupsb_u:7627: saureṇa tejasā pittākhyena pākābhinirvṛttena kaphenālpena saṃparkātpiṅgalaṃ bhavati sauraṃ tejaḥ pittākhyām tadeva ca vātabhūyastvānnīlaṃ bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:7634: asau vā ādityaḥ piṅgalo varṇata eṣa ādityaḥ śuklo 'pyeṣa nīla eṣa pīta eṣa lohita āditya eva //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7636: tad yathā mahāpatha ātata ubhau grāmau gacchatīmaṃ cāmuṃ caivam evaitā ādityasya raśmaya ubhau lokau gacchantīmaṃ cāmuṃ ca /
GV05chupsb_u:7637: amuṣmād ādityāt pratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7638: ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminn āditye sṛptāḥ // ChUp_8,6.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7639: ChUpBh_8,6.2 tasyādhyātmaṃ nāḍībhiḥ kathaṃ saṃbandha ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-tattatra
GV05chupsb_u:7640: yathā loke mahānvistīrṇaḥ panthā mahāpatha ātato vyāpta ubhau gacchatīmaṃ ca saṃnihitamamuṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7641: ca viprakṛṣṭaṃ dūrasthamevaṃ yathā dṛṣṭānto mahāpatha ubhau grāmau praviṣṭa evamevaitā
GV05chupsb_u:7642: ādityasya raśmaya ubhau lokāvamuṃ cā'dityamaṇḍalamimaṃ ca puruṣaṃ gacchantyubhayatra praviṣṭāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7646: tā adhyātmamāsu piṅgalādivarṇāsu yathoktāsu nāḍīṣu sṛptā gatāḥ praviṣṭā ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7647: ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante pravṛttāḥ santānabhūtāḥ satyaste 'muṣmin /
GV05chupsb_u:7650: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānāti /
GV05chupsb_u:7653: tejasā hi tadā saṃpanno bhavati // ChUp_8,6.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:7654: ChUpBh_8,6.3 tattatraivaṃ sati yatra yasminkāla etatsvapanamayaṃ jīvaḥ supto bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7659: ata eva svapnaṃ viṣayākārābhāsaṃ mānasaṃ svapnapratyayaṃ na vijānāti nānubhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7660: yadaivaṃ supto bhavatyāsu sauratejaḥpūrṇāsu yathoktāsu nāḍīṣu tadā sṛptaḥ praviṣṭo nāḍībhirdvārabhūtābhirhṛdayākāśaṃ gato bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7661: na hyanyatra satsaṃpatteḥ svapnādarśanamastīti sāmarthyānnāḍīṣviti saptamī tṛtīyayā pariṇamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7662: taṃ satā saṃpannaṃ na kaścana na kaścidapi dharmādharmarūpaḥ pāpmā spṛśatīti svarūpāvasthitatvāttadā'tmanaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7663: dehendriyaviśiṣṭaṃ hi sukhaduḥkhakāryapradānena pāpmā spṛśatīti na tu satsaṃpannaṃ svarūpāvasthaṃ kaścidapi pāpmā spraṣṭumutsahate /
GV05chupsb_u:7665: anyo hyanyasya viṣayo bhavati na tvanyatvaṃ kenacitkutaścidapi satsaṃpannasya /
GV05chupsb_u:7666: svarūpapracyavanaṃ tvātmano jāgratsvapnāvasthāṃ prati gamanaṃ bāhyaviṣayapratibodho
GV05chupsb_u:7668: yadaivaṃ suptaḥ saureṇa tejasā hi nāḍyantargatena sarvataḥ saṃpanno vyāpto bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7670: tasmādayaṃ karaṇānāṃ nirodhātsvātmanyevāvasthitaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātīti yuktam //3 //
GV05chupsb_u:7673: tam abhita āsīnā āhur jānāsi māṃ jānāsi mām iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7674: sa yāvad asmāc charīrād anutkrānto bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7676: ChUpBh_8,6.4 tatraivaṃ satyatha yatra yasminkāle 'balimānamabalabhāvaṃ dehasya rogādinimittaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7677: jarādinimittaṃ vā kṛśībhāvametannayanaṃ nītaḥ prāpito devadatto bhavati mumūrṣaryadā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7678: tamabhitaḥ sarvato veṣṭayitvā'sīnā jñātaya āhurjānāsi māṃ tava putraṃ jānāsi māṃ pitaraṃ cetyādi /
GV05chupsb_u:7683: sa om iti vā hod vā mīyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7684: sa yāvat kṣipyen manas tāvad ādityaṃ gacchati /
GV05chupsb_u:7685: etad vai khalu lokadvāraṃ viduṣāṃ prapadanaṃ nirodho 'viduṣām // ChUp_8,6.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:7687: atha tadaitaireva yathoktābhī raśmibhirūrdhvamākramate yathākarmārjitaṃ lokaṃ pratyavidvān /
GV05chupsb_u:7688: itarastu vidvānyathoktasādhanasaṃpannaḥ sa omityoṅkāreṇā'tmānaṃ dhyāyanyathāpūrvaṃ vā haiva,
GV05chupsb_u:7691: sa vidvānutkramiṣyanyāvatkṣipyenmano yāvatā kālena manasaḥ kṣepaḥ syāttāvatā kālenā'dityaṃ gacchati prapnoti kṣipraṃ gacchatītyartho na tu tāvataiva kāleneti vivakṣitam /
GV05chupsb_u:7692: kimarthamādityaṃ gacchatītyucyate-etadvai khalu prasiddhaṃ brahmalokasya dvāraṃ ya ādityastena dvārabhūtena brahmaloka gacchati vidvān /
GV05chupsb_u:7693: ato viduṣāṃ prapadanaṃ prapadyate brahmalokamanena dvāreṇeti prapadanam /
GV05chupsb_u:7695: saureṇa tejasā deha eva niruddhāḥ santo mūrdhanyayā nāḍyā notkramanta evetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7699: śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāsāṃ mūrdhānam abhiniḥsṛtaikā /
GV05chupsb_u:7700: tayordhvam āyann amṛtatvam eti viṣvaṅṅ anyā utkramaṇe bhavanty utkramaṇe bhavanti // ChUp_8,6.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:7701: ChUpBh_8,6.6 tadetasminyathokter'tha eṣa śloko mantro bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7702: śataṃ caikā caikottaraśataṃ nāḍyo hṛdayasya māṃsapiṇḍabhūtasya saṃbandhinyaḥ pradhānato bhavanti /
GV05chupsb_u:7706: na tvamṛtatvāya kiṃ tarhyatkamaṇa evotkrāntyarthameva bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7710: ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7711: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti ha prajāpatir uvāca // ChUp_8,7.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7712: ChUpBh_8,7.1 “atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya paraṃ jyotirupasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovācaitadamṛtamabhayametadbrahma“ityuktam
GV05chupsb_u:7714: kathaṃ vā tasyādhigamo yathā so 'smāccharīrātsavijijñāsitavya iti caiṣa niyamavidhireva nāpūrvavidhiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7717: dṛṣṭārthatvaṃ ca darśayiṣyati nāhamātra bhogyaṃ paśyāmītyanenāsakṛt /
GV05chupsb_u:7719: phalamiti niyamārthataivāsya vidheryuktā na tvāgnihotrādīnāmibāpūrvavidhitvamiha saṃbhavati //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7722: te hocur hanta tam ātmaānam anvecchāmo yam ātmānam anviṣya sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7724: tau hāsaṃvidānāv eva samitpāṇī prajāpatisakāśam ājagmatuḥ // ChUp_8,7.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7726: taddha kila prajāpatervacanamubhaye devāsurā devāścāsurāśca devāsurā anu paramparāgataṃ svakarṇagocarāpannamanububudhire 'nubuddhavantaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7727: te caitatprajāpativaco buddhvā kimakurvannityucyate-te hocuruktavanto 'nyonyaṃ devāḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7729: 'nveṣaṇaṃ kurmo yamātmānamanviṣya sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāśca kāmānityuktvendro
GV05chupsb_u:7730: haiva rājaiva svayaṃ devānāmitarāndevāṃśca bhogaparicchadaṃ ca sarvaṃ sthāpayitvā
GV05chupsb_u:7734: yato devāsurarājau mahārhabhogārhai santau tathā gurumabhyupagatavantau /
GV05chupsb_u:7735: tau ha kilāsaṃvidānāvevānyonyaṃ saṃvidamakurvāṇau vidyāphalaṃ pratyanyonyamīrṣyāṃ darśayantau samitpāṇī samidbhārahastau prajāpatisakāśamājagmaturāgatavantau
GV05chupsb_u:7737: tau ha dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryam ūṣatuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7740: tau hocatur ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7741: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti bhagavato vaco vedayante /
GV05chupsb_u:7743: ChUpBh_8,7.3 tau ha gatvā dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi śuśrūṣāparau bhūtvā brahmacaryamūṣaturuṣitavantau /
GV05chupsb_u:7744: abhiprāyajñaḥ prajāpatistāvuvāca kimicchantau kiṃ prayojanamabhipretyecchantāvavāstamuṣitavantau yuvāmitītyuktau tau hocatuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7745: ya ātmetyādi bhagavato vaco vedayante śiṣṭā atastamātmānaṃ jñātumicchantāvavāstamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:7746: yadyapi prākprajāpateḥ samīpāgamanādanyonyamīrṣyāyuktāvabūtāṃ tathāpi vidyāprāptiprayojanagauravāttyaktarāgadveṣamoherṣyādi doṣāveva bhūtvoṣaturbrahmacaryaṃ prajāpatau /
GV05chupsb_u:7749: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛṣyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:7751: atha yo 'yaṃ bhagavo 'psu parikhyāyate yaś cāyam ādarśe katama eṣa iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7752: eṣa u evaiṣu sarveṣvannteṣu parikhyāyata iti hovāca // ChUp_8,7.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:7753: ChUpBh_8,7.4 tāvevaṃ tapasvinau śuddhakalmaṣau yogyāvupalabhya prajāpatiruvācaha-ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo nivṛttacakṣurbhirmṛditakaṣāyairdṛśyate
GV05chupsb_u:7754: eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇo yamavocaṃ purāhaṃ yadvijñānātsarvalokakāmāvāptiretadamṛtaṃ bhamākhyamata evābhayamata eva brahma vṛddhatamamiti /
GV05chupsb_u:7755: athaitatprajāpatinoktamakṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata iti vacaḥ śrutvā chāyārūpaṃ puruṣaṃ jagṛhatuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7757: atha yo 'yaṃ he bhagavo 'psu parikhyāyate parisamantājjñāyate yaścāyamādarśa ātmanaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7758: pratibimbākāraḥ parikhyāyate khaḍgādau ca katama eṣa eṣāṃ bhagavadbhiruktaḥ kiṃvaika eva sarveṣviti /
GV05chupsb_u:7759: evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ prajāpatiruvāca-eṣa u eva yaścakṣuṣi draṣṭā mayokta iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7760: etanmanasi kṛtvaiṣu sarveṣvanteṣu madhyeṣu parikhyāyata iti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:7761: nanu kathaṃ yuktaṃ śiṣyorviparītagrahaṇamanujñātuṃ prajāpatervigatadoṣasyā'cāryasya sataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7765: tau yadi prajāpatinā mūḍhau yuvāṃ viparītagrāhiṇāvityuktau syātāṃ tatastastayościtte
GV05chupsb_u:7769: nanu na yuktameṣa u evetyanṛtaṃ vaktum /
GV05chupsb_u:7772: ātmanokto 'kṣipuruṣo manasi saṃnihitataraḥ śiṣyagṛhītācchāyātmanaḥ sarveṣāṃ cābhyantaraḥ“sarvāntaraḥ“iti śruteḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7777: udaśarāva ātmānam avekṣya yad ātmano na vijānīthas tan me prabrūtam iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7779: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7780: tau hocatuḥ sarvam evedam āvāṃ bhagava ātmānaṃ paśyāva ā lomabhyaḥ ā nakhebhyaḥ pratirūpam iti // ChUp_8,8.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7782: paśyantau na vijānīthastanme mama prabrūtamācakṣīyāthāmityuktau tau ha tathaivodaśarāve
GV05chupsb_u:7784: tathā kṛtavantau tau ha prajāpatiruvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7785: nanu tanme prabrūtamityuktābhyāmudaśarāve 'vekṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā prajāpataye na niveditamidamāvābhyāṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7786: na viditamityanivedite cājñānahetau ha prajāpatiruvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti tatra ko 'bhiprāya iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7788: yena vakṣyati tau ha śāntahṛdayau pravavrajaturiti /
GV05chupsb_u:7791: viparītagrāhiṇau ca śiṣyāvanupekṣaṇīyāviti svayameṣa papraccha kiṃ paśyatha iti,
GV05chupsb_u:7793: tau hocatuḥ-sarvamevedamāvāṃ bhagava ātmānaṃ paśyāva ā lomabhya ā nakhebhyaḥ pratirūpamiti,
GV05chupsb_u:7794: yathaivā'vāṃ he bhagavo lomanakhādimantau sva evamevedaṃ lomanakhādisahitamāvayoḥ pratirūpamudaśarāve paśyāva iti //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7796: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣethām iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7797: tau ha sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣāṃ cakrāte /
GV05chupsb_u:7798: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti // ChUp_8,8.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7799: ChUpBh_8,8.2 tau ha punaḥ prajāpatiruvāca cchāyātmaniścayāpanayāya,
GV05chupsb_u:7800: sādhvalaṅkṛtau yathā svagṛhe suvasanau mahārhavastraparidhānau pariṣkṛtau chinnalomanakhau ca bhūtvodaśarāve tayośchāyātmagraho 'panītaḥ syāt
GV05chupsb_u:7801: sādhvalaṅkārasuvasanādīnāmāgantukānāṃ chāyākaratvamudaśarāve yathā śarīrasaṃbaddhānāmevaṃ śarīrasyāpi cchāyākaratvaṃ pūrvaṃ babhūveti gamyate
GV05chupsb_u:7802: śarīraikadeśānāṃ ca lomanakhādīnāṃ nityatvenābhipretānāmakhaṇḍitānāṃ chāyākaratvaṃ pūrvamāsīt /
GV05chupsb_u:7803: chinneṣu ca teṣu naiva lomanakhādicchāyā dṛśyate 'to lomanakhādivaccharīrasyāpyāgamāpāyitvaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7804: siddhamityudaśarāvādau dṛśyamānasya tannimittasya ca dehasyānātmatvaṃ siddham udaśārāvādau
GV05chupsb_u:7806: na kevalametāvadetena yāvatkiñcidātmīyatvābhimataṃ sukhaduḥkharāgadveṣamohādi ca kādācitkatvānnakhalomādivadanātmeti pratyetavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:7808: kṛtavatorapi cchāyātmaviparītagraho nāpajagāma yasmāttasmātsvadoṣeṇaiva kenacitpratibaddhavivekavijñānāvindravirocanāvabhūtāmit i gamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:7809: tau pūrvavadeva dṛḍhaniścayau papraccha kiṃ paśyatha iti //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7811: tau hocatur yathaivedam āvāṃ bhagavaḥ sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau sva evam evemau bhagavaḥ sādhvallaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtāv iti
GV05chupsb_u:7815: ChUpBh_8,8.3 tau tathaiva pratipanno yathaivedamiti pūrvavadyathā sādhvalaṅkārādiviśiṣṭāvāvāṃ sva evamevemau chāyātmānāviti sutarāṃ viparītaniścayau babhūvatuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7816: yasyā'tmano lakṣaṇaṃ ya ātmāpahatapāpmetyuktavā punastadviśeṣamanviṣyamāṇayorya eṣo
GV05chupsb_u:7819: ataḥ svadoṣeṇa kenacitpratibaddhavivekavijñānasāmarthyāviti matvā yathābhipretamevā'tmānaṃ manasi nidhāyaiṣa ātmeti hovācaitadamṛtamabhayametadbrahmeti prajāpatiḥ pūrvavat /
GV05chupsb_u:7822: madvacanaṃ sarvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ smaratoḥ pratibandhakṣayācca svayamevā'tmaviṣaye viveko
GV05chupsb_u:7823: bhaviṣyatīti manvānaḥ punarbrahmacaryādeśe ca tayościttadukhotpattiṃ parijihīrṣankṛtārthabuddhitayā
GV05chupsb_u:7825: tau hendravirocanau śāntahṛdayau tuṣṭahṛdayau kṛtārthabuddhī ityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7830: anupalabhyātmānam ananuvidya vrajato yatara etadupaniṣado bhaviṣyanti devā vā asurā vā te parābhaviṣyantīti /
GV05chupsb_u:7831: sa ha śāntahṛdaya eva virocano 'surāñ jagāma /
GV05chupsb_u:7832: tebhyo haitām upaniṣadaṃ provāca ātmaiveha mahayya ātmā paricaryaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7833: ātmānam eveha mahayann ātmānaṃ paricarann ubhau lokāv āpnotīmaṃ cāmuṃ ceti // ChUp_8,8.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:7835: syādityāśaṅkyāpratyakṣaṃ pratyakṣavacanena ca cittaduḥkhaṃ parijihīrṣustau dūraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7838: anupalabhya yathoktalakṣaṇamātmānamananuvidya svātmapratyakṣaṃ cākṛtvā viparītaniścayau ca bhūtvendravirocanāvetau vrajato gaccheyātām /
GV05chupsb_u:7839: ato yatare devā vāsurā vā kiṃ viśeṣitenaitadupaniṣada ābhyāṃ yā gṛhītā'tmavidyā seyamupaniṣadyeṣāṃ devānāmasurāṇāṃ vā ta etadupaniṣada evaṃvijñānā etanniścayā bhaviṣyantītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7840: te kiṃ, parābhaviṣyanti śreyomārgātparābhūtā bahirbhūtā vinaṣṭā bhaviṣyantītyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7841: svagṛhaṃ gacchatoḥ surāsurarājayoryo 'surarājaḥ sa ha śāntahṛdaya eva sanvirocano 'surāñjagāma /
GV05chupsb_u:7844: tasmādātmaiva deha iha loka mahayyaḥ pūjanīyastathā paricaryaḥ paricaraṇīyastathā'tmānameveha loke dehaṃ mahayanparicaraṃścobhau lokāvavāpnotīmaṃ cāmuṃ ca /
GV05chupsb_u:7847: tasmād apyaddyehādadānam aśraddadhānam ayajamānam āhur āsuro bateti /
GV05chupsb_u:7850: etena hy ammuṃ lokaṃ jeṣyanto manyante // ChUp_8,8.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:7853: yata evaṃsvabhāvo bateti khidyamānā āhuḥ śiṣṭāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7855: tayopaniṣadā saṃskṛtāḥ santaḥ pretasya śarīraṃ kuṇapaṃ bhikṣayā gandhamālyānnādilakṣaṇayā
GV05chupsb_u:7857: kuṇapasaṃskāreṇāmuṃ pretya pratipattavyaṃ lokaṃ jeṣyanto manyante //5 //
GV05chupsb_u:7860: atha hendro 'prāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa /
GV05chupsb_u:7861: yathaiva khalv ayam asmiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:7862: pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho bhavati srāme srāmaḥ parivṛkṇe parivṛkṇaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7863: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati /
GV05chupsb_u:7865: ChUpBh_8,9.1 atha ha kilendro 'prāpyaiva devāndaivyākrauryādisaṃpadā yuktatvādgurorvacanaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:7866: punaḥ punaḥ smaranneva gacchannetadvakṣyamāṇaṃ bhayaṃ svātmagrahaṇanimittaṃ dadarśa dṛṣṭavān /
GV05chupsb_u:7867: udaśarāvadṛṣṭāntena prajāpatinā yadartho nyāya uktastadekadeśo maghavataḥ pratyabhādbuddhau /
GV05chupsb_u:7870: yathaiva khalvayamasmiñcharīre sādhvalaṅkṛte chāyātmāpi sādhvalaṅkṛto bhavati suvasane
GV05chupsb_u:7871: ca suvasanaḥ pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛto yathā nakhalomādidehāvayavāpagame chāyātmāpi pariṣkṛto
GV05chupsb_u:7873: evamevāyaṃ chāyātmāpyasmiñcharīre nakhalomādibhirdehāvayavatvasya tulyatvādandhe cakṣuṣo 'pagame 'ndho bavati srāme srāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7875: cakṣurnāsikā vā yasya sadā sravati sa srāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7877: srāme parivṛkṇe vā dehe chāyātmāpi tathā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7882: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ sārdhaṃ virocanena kim icchan punar āgama iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7883: sa hovāca yathā eva khalvayyaṃ bhagavo 'smiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto
GV05chupsb_u:7884: bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho bhavati
GV05chupsb_u:7886: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati /
GV05chupsb_u:7888: ChUpBh_8,9.2 ato nāhamatrāsmiṃśchāyātmadarśane dehātmadarśane vā bhogyaṃ phalaṃ paśyāmītyevaṃ doṣaṃ dehacchāyātmadarśane 'dhyavasya sa samitpāṇirbrahmacaryaṃ vastuṃ punareyāya /
GV05chupsb_u:7889: taṃ ha prajāpatiruvāca-maghavanyacchāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ pragatavānasi virocanena sārdhaṃ kimicchanpunarāgama iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7890: vijānannapi punaḥ papracchendrābhiprayābhivyaktaye yadvettha tena mopasīdeti yadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:7893: nanu tulye 'kṣipuruṣaśravame dehacchāyāmindro 'grahīdātmeti dehameva va virocanastatkiṃnimittam /
GV05chupsb_u:7895: yathendrasyodaśarāvādiprajāpativacanaṃ smarato devānaprāptasyaivā'cāryoktabuddhyā chāyātmagrahaṇaṃ tatra doṣadarśanaṃ cābhūt /
GV05chupsb_u:7896: na tathā virocanasya kiṃ tarhi deha evā'tmadarśanaṃ nāpi tatra doṣadarśanaṃ babhūva /
GV05chupsb_u:7898: indro 'lpadoṣatvāddṛśyata itiśrutyarthameva śraddadhānatayā jagrāhetaraśchāyānimittaṃ dehaṃ hitvā śrutyarthaṃ lakṣaṇayā jagrāha prajāpatinokto 'yamiti doṣabhūyastvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7899: yathā kila nīlānīlayorādarśe dṛśyamānayorvāsasoryannīlaṃ tanmahārhamiti cchāyānimittaṃ vāsa evocyate na cchāyā tadvaditi virocanābhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7900: svacittaguṇadoṣavaśādeva hi śabdārthāvadhāraṇaṃ tulye 'pi śravaṇe khyāpitaṃ dāmyata datta dayadhvamiti dakāramātraśravaṇācchutyantare /
GV05chupsb_u:7908: ChUpBh_8,9.3 evamevaiṣa maghavansamyaktvayāvagataṃ na cchāyātmetyuvāca prajāpatiryo mayokta ātmā prakṛta etamevā'tmānaṃ tu te bhūyaḥ pūrvaṃ vyākhyātamapyanuvyākhyāsyāmi /
GV05chupsb_u:7914: ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaś caraty eṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:7917: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa /
GV05chupsb_u:7918: tad yady apīdaṃ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7920: ChUpBh_8,10.1 ya ātmāpahatapāpmādilakṣaṇo ya eṣo 'kṣiṇītyādinā vyākhyāta eṣa saḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7927: tadidaṃ śarīraṃ yadyapyandhaṃ dhavati svapnātmā yo 'nandhaḥ sa bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7928: yadi srāmamidaṃ śarīramasrāmaśca sa bhavati naivaiṣa svapnātmāsya dehasya doṣeṇa duṣyati //1 //
GV05chupsb_u:7935: api roditīva nāham atra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti // ChUp_8,10.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:7938: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan punar āgama iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7940: tad yady apīdaṃ bhagavaḥ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7954: ChUpBh_8,10.2-3-4 nāpyasya vadhena sa hanyate chāyātmavanna cāsya srāmyeṇa srāmaḥ svapnātmā bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7956: na tāvadayaṃ chāyātmavaddehadoṣayuktaḥ kintu dhnanti tvevainam /
GV05chupsb_u:7961: nanu cchāyāpuruṣe prajāpatinokte 'sya śarīrasya nāśamanveṣa naśyatīti doṣamabhyadhāttathehāpi syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:7964: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata iti manyate tadā kathaṃ prajāpatiṃ pramāṇīkṛtya punaḥ śravaṇāya samitpāṇirgacchet /
GV05chupsb_u:7967: tathā ca vyākhyātaṃ draṣṭākṣiṇi dṛśyata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7968: tathā vicchādayantīva vidrāvayantīva tathā ca putrādimaraṇanimittamapriyavetteva bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:7977: svapnātmajñāne 'pīṣṭaṃ phalaṃ nopalabha ityabhiprāyaḥ. evamevaiṣa tavābhiprāyeṇeti vākyaseṣaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7980: tasmātpūrvavadasyādyāpi pratibandhakāraṇamastīti manvānastatkṣapaṇāya vasāparāṇi dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryamityādideśa prajāpatiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:7984: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmeti hovāca /
GV05chupsb_u:7987: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa /
GV05chupsb_u:7988: nāha khalv ayam evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:7993: taṃ ha prajāpatir uvāca - maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan punar āgama iti /
GV05chupsb_u:7994: sa hovāca nāha khalv ayaṃ bhagava evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:7998: ChUpBh_8,11.1-2 pūrvavadetaṃ tveva ta ityādyuktvā tadyatraitatsupta ityadi vyākhyātaṃ vākyam /
GV05chupsb_u:7999: akṣiṇi yo draṣṭā svapne ca mahīyamānaścarati sa eṣa suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmeti hovācaitadamṛtamabhayametadbrahmeti svābhipretameva /
GV05chupsb_u:8002: nāha naiva suṣuptastho 'pyātmā khalvayaṃ saṃprati samyagidānīṃ cā'tmānaṃ jānāti naivaṃ jānāti /
GV05chupsb_u:8009: jñāne hi sati jñātuḥ sadbhāvo 'vagamyate nāsati jñāne /
GV05chupsb_u:8010: na ca suṣuptasya jñānaṃ dṛśyate 'to vinaṣṭa ivetyabhiprāyaḥ na tu vināśamevā'tmano manyate 'mṛtābhayavacanasya prāmāṇyamicchan //1-2 //
GV05chupsb_u:8019: ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavān prajāpatau brahmacaryam uvāsa /
GV05chupsb_u:8021: ChUpBh_8,11.3 pūrvavadevamevetyuktvā yo mayoktasribhiḥ paryāyaistamevaitaṃ no evānyatraitasmādātmano 'nyaṃ kañcana kiṃ tarhyetameva vyākhyāsyāmi
GV05chupsb_u:8022: svalpastu doṣastavāvaśiṣṭastatkṣapaṇāya vasāparāṇyanyāni pañca varṣāṇītyuktaḥ sa tathā cakāra /
GV05chupsb_u:8025: yadāhurloke śiṣṭā ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavānprajāpatau brahmacaryamuvāseti tadetaddvātriṃśatamityādinā darśitamityākhyāyikāto 'pasṛtya śrutyocyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8026: evaṃ kilaitadindratvādapi gurutaramindreṇāpi mahatā yatnenaikottaravarṣaśatakṛtāyāsena prāptamātmajñānamato nātaḥ paraṃ puruṣārthāntaramastītyātmajñānaṃ stauti //3//
GV05chupsb_u:8029: maghavan martyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram āttaṃ mṛtyunā /
GV05chupsb_u:8032: na vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayor apahatir asti /
GV05chupsb_u:8033: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ // ChUp_8,12.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:8035: yanmanyase 'kṣyādhārādilakṣaṇaḥ saṃprasādalakṣaṇa ātmā mayokto vināśamevāpīto bhavatīti /
GV05chupsb_u:8039: kadācideva mriyata iti martyamityukte na tathā saṃtrāso bhavati yathā grastameva sadā vyāptameva mṛtyunetyukta iti vairāgyārthaṃ viśeṣa ityucyata āttaṃ mṛtyuneti /
GV05chupsb_u:8040: kathaṃ nāma dehābhimānato viraktaḥ sannivartata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:8043: amṛtasyetyanenaivāśarīratve siddhe punaraśarīrasyeti vacanaṃ vāyvādivatsāvayavatvamūrtimattve mā bhūtāmityātmanaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8047: aśarīrasvabhāvasyā'tmanastadevāhaṃ śarīraṃ śarīrameva cāhamityavivekādātmabhāvaḥ saśarīratvaṃ ata eva saśarīraḥ sannātto grastaḥ priyāpriyābhyām
GV05chupsb_u:8049: tasya ca na vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayorbāhyaviṣayasaṃyogaviyoganimittayorbāhyaviṣayasaṃyogaviyogau mameti manyamānasyāpahatirvināśa ucchedaḥ santatirūpayornāstīti /
GV05chupsb_u:8050: taṃ punardehābhimānādaśarīrasvarūpavijñānena vinartitāvivekajñānaśarīraṃ santaṃ priyāpriye na spṛśataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8051: spṛśiḥ pratyekaṃ saṃbadhyata iti priyaṃ na spṛśatyapriyaṃ na spṛśatīti vākyadvayaṃ bhavati /
GV05chupsb_u:8054: aśarīratā tu svarūpamiti tatra dharmādharmayorasaṃbhavāttatkāryabhāvo dūrata evetyato na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8055: nanu yadi priyamapyaśarīraṃ na spṛśatīti yanmaghavatoktaṃ suṣuptastho vināśamevāpīto bhavatīti tadevehāpyāpannam /
GV05chupsb_u:8056: naiṣa doṣaḥ dharmādharmakāryayoḥ śarīrasaṃbandhinoḥ priyāpriyayoḥ pratiṣedhasya vivakṣitatvāt aśarīraṃ na priyāpriye spṛśata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:8057: āgamāpāyinorhi sparśaśabdo dṛṣṭo yathā śītasparśa uṣṇasparśa iti na tvagneruṣṇaprakāśayoḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8061: nanu bhūmnaḥ priyasyaikatve 'saṃvedyatvātsvarūpeṇa vā nityasaṃvedyatvānnirviśeṣateti nendrasya tadiṣṭam /
GV05chupsb_u:8062: “nāha khalvayaṃ saṃpratyātmānaṃ jānātyayamahamasmīti no evomāni bhūtāni vināśamevāpīto bhavati nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmi“ityuktatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:8063: taddhondrasyeṣṭaṃ yadbhatāni cā'tmānaṃ ca jānāti na cāpriyaṃ kiñcidvetti sa sarvāṃśca
GV05chupsb_u:8064: lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmānyena jñānena satyametadiṣṭamindrasyemāni bhūtāni matto
GV05chupsb_u:8068: vyomavadaśarīrātmatayā sarvabhūtalokakāmātmatvopagamena yā prāptistaddhitamindrāya vaktavyamiti prajāpatinābhipretam /
GV05chupsb_u:8070: tatraivaṃ sati kaṃ kena vijānīyādātmaikatva imāni bhūtānyayamahamasmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:8071: nanvasminpakṣe“strībhirvā yānairvā” “sa yadi pitṛlokakāmaḥ” “sa ekadhā bhavati“ityādyaiśvaryaśrutayo 'nupapannāḥ / na /
GV05chupsb_u:8079: para eva sarvasattvopādhidvāreṇa bhokteti sarvāvidyākṛtasaṃvyavahārāṇāṃ para evā'tmā'spadaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:8081: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyati iti cchāyāpuruṣa eva prajāpatinoktaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8085: ādāvevocyamāne kila durvijñeyatvātparasyā'tmano 'tyantabāhyaviṣayāsaktacetaso 'tyantasūkṣmavastuśravaṇe vyāmoho mā bhūditi /
GV05chupsb_u:8086: yathā kila dvitīyāyāṃ sūkṣmaṃ candraṃ didarśayiṣurvṛkṣaṃ kañcitpratyakṣamādau darśayati paśyāmumeṣa candra iti,
GV05chupsb_u:8087: tato 'nyaṃ tato 'pyanyaṃ girimūrdhānaṃ ca candrasamīpasthaṃ eṣa candra iti tato 'sau candraṃ paśyati,
GV05chupsb_u:8088: evametadya eṣo 'kṣiṇītyādyuktaṃ prajāpatinā tribhiḥ paryāyairna para iti /
GV05chupsb_u:8090: yasminnuttamapuruṣe stryādibhirjakṣatkrīḍanramamāṇo bhavati sa uttmaḥ puruṣaḥ para ukta iti cā'huḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8094: akṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata ityupanyasya śiṣyābhyāṃ chāyātmani gṛhīte tayostadviparītagrahaṇaṃ
GV05chupsb_u:8095: matvā tadapanayāyodaśarāvopanyāsaḥ kiṃ paśyatha iti ca praśnaḥ sādhvalaṅkāropadeśaścānarthakaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8096: syāt yadi cchāyātmaiva prajāpatinākṣiṇi dṛśyata ityupadiṣṭaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8097: kiñca yadi svayamupadiṣṭa iti grahaṇasyāpyapanayakāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:8098: svapnasuṣuptātmagrahaṇayorapi tadapanayakāraṇaṃ ca svayaṃ brūyāt na coktaṃ[tenaṭatena manyāmahe nākṣiṇi cchāyātmā prajāpatinopadiṣṭaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8099: kiṃ cānyadakṣiṇi draṣṭā ceddṛśyata ityupadiṣṭaḥ syāttata idaṃ yuktam /
GV05chupsb_u:8100: etaṃ tveva ta ityuktvā svapne 'pi draṣṭurevopadeśaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8104: atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayañjyotiriti nyāyataḥ śrutyantare siddhatvāt /
GV05chupsb_u:8105: yadyapi svapne sadhīrbhavati tathāpi na dhīḥ svapnabhogopalabdhiṃ prati karaṇatvaṃ bhajate /
GV05chupsb_u:8106: kiṃ tarhi paṭacitravajjāgradvāsanāśrayā dṛśyaiva dhīrbhavatīti na draṣṭuḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvabādhaḥ syāt /
GV05chupsb_u:8109: prāptau satyāṃ pratiṣedho yuktaḥ syānnāha khalvayamityādi /
GV05chupsb_u:8111: tasyaivāśarīrasya sato vidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saśarīratve prāptayoḥ pratiṣedho yukto 'śarīraṃ
GV05chupsb_u:8112: vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśata iti /
GV05chupsb_u:8114: yaccoktaṃ saṃprasādaḥ śarīrātsamutthāya yasminstryādibhī ramamāṇo bhavati so 'nyaḥ saṃprasādādadhikaraṇanirdiṣṭa uttamaḥ puruṣa iti /
GV05chupsb_u:8116: caturthe 'pi paryāya eta tveva ta iti vacanāt /
GV05chupsb_u:8117: yadi tato 'nyo 'bhipretaḥ syātpūrvavadetaṃ tveva ta iti na brūyānmṛṣā prajāpatiḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8118: kiñcānyattejobannādīnāṃ sraṣṭuḥ sataḥ svavikāradehaśuṅge praveśaṃ darśayitvā praviṣṭāya puvastattvamasītyupadeśo mṛṣā prasajyeta /
GV05chupsb_u:8119: tasmiṃstvaṃ stryādibhī rantā bhaviṣyasīti yukta upadeśo 'bhaviṣyadyadi saṃprasādādanya uttamaḥ puruṣo bhavet /
GV05chupsb_u:8120: tathā bhūmnyahamevetyādiśyā'tmaivedaṃ sarvamiti nopasamahariṣyadyadi bhūmā jīvādanyo 'bhaviṣyat /
GV05chupsb_u:8122: sarvaśrutiṣu ca parasminnātmaśabdaprayogo nābhaviṣyatpratyagātmā cetsarvajantūnāṃ para ātmā na bhavettasmādeka evā'tmā prakaraṇī siddhaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8125: na hi rajjuśuktikāgaganādiṣu sarparajatamalādīni mithyājñānādhyastāni teṣāṃ bhavantīti /
GV05chupsb_u:8129: yadi vā prajāpaticchadbharūpāyāḥ śrutervacanaṃ satyameva bhavet /
GV05chupsb_u:8133: jarādirahito jīrṇo 'haṃ jāto 'hamāyuṣmāngauraḥ kṛṣṇo mṛta ityādipratyakṣānubhavavattadupapatteḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8134: sarvamapyetatsatyamiti cedastyevaitadevaṃ duravagamaṃ yena devarājo 'pyudaśarāvādidarśitāvināśayuktirapi mumohaivātra vināśamevāpīto bhavatīti
GV05chupsb_u:8135: tathā virocano mahāprājñaḥ prājāpatyo 'pi dehamātrātmadarśano babhūva /
GV05chupsb_u:8137: tathā sāṃkhyā draṣṭāraṃ dehādivyatiriktamavagamyāpi tyaktāgamapramāṇatvānmṛtyuviṣaya evānyatvadarśane tasthuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8138: tathānye kāṇādādidarśanāḥ kaṣāyaraktamiva kṣārādibhirvasraṃ navabhirātmaguṇairyuktamātmadravyaṃ viśodhayituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8139: tathānye karmiṇo bāhyaviṣayāpahṛtacetaso vedapramāṇā api paramārthasatyamātmaikatvaṃ vināśamivendravanmanyamānā ghaṭīyantravadārohāvarohaprakārairaniśaṃ bambhramati /
GV05chupsb_u:8140: kimanye kṣudrajantavo vivekahīnāḥ svabhāvata eva bahirviṣayāpahṛtacetasaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8142: vedanīyaṃ pūjyatamaiḥ prājāpatyaṃ cemaṃ saṃpradāyamanusaradbhirupanibaddhaṃ prakaraṇacatuṣṭayena /
GV05chupsb_u:8147: tad yathaitāny amuṣmād ākāśāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyante // ChUp_8,12.2 //
GV05chupsb_u:8149: saṃprāptasya śarīrātsamutthāya svena rūpeṇa yathābhiniṣpattistathā vaktavyeti dṛṣṭānta
GV05chupsb_u:8154: etāni yathoktānyākāśasamānarūpatāmāpannāni svena vāyvādirūpeṇāgṛhyamāṇānyākāśākhyatāṃ gatāni yathā saṃprasādo 'vidyāvasthāyāṃ śarīrātmabhāvamevāpannaḥ,
GV05chupsb_u:8157: śiśirāpāye sāvitra paraṃ jyotiḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ graiṣmakamupasaṃpadya sāvitramabhitāpaṃ prāpyetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8158: ādityābhitāpena pṛthagbhāvamāpāditāḥ santaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa purovātādivāyurūpeṇa
GV05chupsb_u:8159: stimitabhāvaṃ hitvābhramapi bhūmiparvatahastyādirūpeṇa vidyudapi svena jyotirlatādicapalarūpeṇa
GV05chupsb_u:8160: stanayitnurapi svena garjitāśanirūpeṇetyevaṃ prāvṛḍāgame svena svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyante //2 //
GV05chupsb_u:8162: evam evaiṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8164: sa tatra paryeti jakṣat krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhir vā yānair vā jñātibhir vā nopajanaṃ smarann idaṃ śarīram /
GV05chupsb_u:8165: sa yathā prayogya ācaraṇe yukta evam evāyam asmiñ charīre prāṇo yuktaḥ // ChUp_8,12.3 //
GV05chupsb_u:8167: śarīrasāmyamāpanno 'hamamuṣya putro jāto jīrṇo mariṣya ityevaṃprakāraṃ prajāpatineva
GV05chupsb_u:8168: maghavānyathoktena krameṇa nāsi tvaṃ dehendriyādidharmā tattvamasīti pratibodhitaḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8169: sansa eṣa saṃprasādo jīvo 'smāccharīrādākāśādiva vāyvādayaḥ samutthāya dehādivailakṣaṇyamātmano
GV05chupsb_u:8171: svena rūpeṇa sadātmanaivābhiniṣpadyata iti vyākhyātaṃ purastāt /
GV05chupsb_u:8172: sa yena svena rūpeṇa saṃprasādo 'bhiniṣpadyate prākpratibodhāttadbhrāntinimittātsarpo bhavati yatā rajjuḥ paścātkṛtaprakāśā rajjvātmanā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8173: evaṃ ca sa uttamapuruṣa uttamaścāsau puruṣaścetyuttamapuruṣaḥ sa evottamapuruṣo 'kṣisvapnapuruṣau vyaktāvavyaktaśca suṣuptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasanno 'śarīraśca svena rūpeṇeti /
GV05chupsb_u:8174: eṣāmeṣa svena rūpeṇāvasthitaḥ kṣarākṣarau vyākṛtāvyākṛtāvapekṣyottamapuruṣaḥ kṛtanirvacano hyayaṃ gītāsu /
GV05chupsb_u:8175: sa saṃprasādaḥ svena rūpeṇa tatra svātmani svasthatayā sarvātmabhūtaḥ paryeti kvacidindrādyātmanā
GV05chupsb_u:8177: krīḍanstryādibhī ramamāṇaśca manasaiva nopajanaṃ srīpuṃsayoranyonyopagamena jāyata
GV05chupsb_u:8178: ityupajanamātmabhāvena vā'tmasāmīpyena jāyata ityupajanamidaṃ śarīraṃ tanna smaran /
GV05chupsb_u:8183: yena mithyājñānādinā janitaṃ tacca mithyājñānādi vidyayoccheditamatastannānubhūtameveti na tadasmaraṇe sarvajñatvahāniḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8184: na hyu nmattena grahagṛhītena vā yadanubhūtaṃ tadunmādādyapadame 'pi smartavyaṃ syāttathehāpi saṃsāribhiravidyādoṣavadbhiryadanubhūyate tatsarvātmānamaśarīraṃ na spṛśati /
GV05chupsb_u:8186: ye tūcchinnadoṣairmṛditakaṣāyairmānasāḥ satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānā anubhūyante vidyābhivyaṅgyatvātta
GV05chupsb_u:8187: eva muktena sarvātmabhūtena saṃbadhyanta ityātmajñānastutaye nirdiśyante 'taḥ sādhvetadviśinaṣṭi-ya
GV05chupsb_u:8189: yatra kvacana bhavanto 'pi brahmaṇyeva hi te loke bhavantīti sarvātmatvādbrahmaṇa ucyante /
GV05chupsb_u:8190: nanu kathamekaḥ'sannānyatpaśyati nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā'kāmāṃśca brāhmalaukikān'paśyan ramata'iti ca viruddham /
GV05chupsb_u:8191: yathaiko yasminneva kṣaṇe paśyati sa tasminneva kṣaṇe na paśyati ceti /
GV05chupsb_u:8196: yadyapi suṣupte taduktaṃ muktasyāpi sarvaikatvātsamāno dvitīyābhāvaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8198: aśarīrasvarūpo 'pahatapāpmādilakṣaṇaḥ sankathameṣa puruṣo 'kṣiṇi dṛśyata ityuktaḥ prajāpatinā /
GV05chupsb_u:8200: tatra ko heturakṣiṇi darśana ityāha-sa dṛṣṭānto yathā prayogyaḥ prayogyaparo vā saśabdaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8202: yathā loka ācaratyanenetyācaraṇo ratho 'no vā tasminnācaraṇe yuktastadākarṣaṇāya,
GV05chupsb_u:8203: evamasmiñcharīre rathasthānīye prāṇaḥ pañcavṛttirindriyamanobuddhisaṃyuktaḥ prajñātmā vijñānakriyāśaktidvayasaṃmūrchitātmā yuktaḥ svakarmaphalopabhoganimittaṃ niyuktaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8204: kasminnvahamutkrānta utkrānto bhavisaṣyāmi kasminvā pratiṣṭhite pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti /
GV05chupsb_u:8208: atha yatraitad ākāśam anuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya cakṣuḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8209: atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam /
GV05chupsb_u:8210: atha yo vededam abhivyāharāṇīti sa ātmā abhivyāhārāya vāk /
GV05chupsb_u:8211: atha yo vededaṃ śṛṇvānīti sa ātmā śravaṇāya śrotram // ChUp_8,12.4 //
GV05chupsb_u:8213: tatra sa prakṛto 'śarīra ātmā cākṣuṣaścakṣuṣi bhava iti cākṣuṣastasya darśanāya rūpopalabdhaye
GV05chupsb_u:8214: cakṣuḥ karaṇaṃ yasya taddehādibhiḥ saṃhatatvātparasya draṣṭurarthe so 'tra cakṣuṣi
GV05chupsb_u:8220: athāpi yo 'smindehe veda kathamidaṃ sugandhi durgandhi vā jighrāṇītyasya gandhaṃ vijānīyāmiti sa ātmā tasya gandhāya gandhavijñānāya ghrāṇam
GV05chupsb_u:8221: atha yo vededaṃ vacanamabhivyāharāṇīti vadiṣyāmīti sa ātmābhivyavaharaṇakriyāsiddhaye karaṇaṃ vāgindriyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8222: atha yo vededaṃ śṛṇavānīti sa ātmā śravaṇāya śrotram //4 //
GV05chupsb_u:8224: atha yo vededaṃ manvānīti sa ātmā /
GV05chupsb_u:8226: sa vā eṣa etena daivena cakṣuṣā manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate ya ete brahmaloke // ChUp_8,12.5 //
GV05chupsb_u:8227: ChUpBh_8,12.5 atha yo vedadaṃ manvānīti mananavyāpāramindriyāsaṃspṛṣṭaṃ kevalaṃ manvānīti veda sa ātmā mananāya manaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8228: yo veda sa ātmetyevaṃ sarvatra prayogādvedanamasya svarūpamityavagamyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8229: yathā yaḥ purastātprakāśayati sa ādityo yo dakṣiṇato yaḥ paścādya uttarato ya ūrdhvaṃ prakāśayati sa āditya ityukte prakāśasvarūpaḥ sa iti gamyate
GV05chupsb_u:8232: ātmanaḥ sattāmātra eva jñānakartṛtvaṃ na tu vyāpṛtatayā /
GV05chupsb_u:8233: yathā savituḥ sattāmātra eva prakāśanakartṛtvaṃ na tu vyāpṛtatayeti tadvat /
GV05chupsb_u:8236: manastu trikālaviṣayopalabdhikaraṇaṃ mṛditadoṣaṃ ca sūkṣmavyavahitādisarvopalabdhikaraṇaṃ ceti daivaṃ cakṣurucyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8240: kānkāmāniti viśinaṣṭi-ya ete brahmaṇi loke hiraṇyanidhivadbāhyaviṣayāsaṅgānṛtenāpihitāḥ saṃkalpamātralabhyāstānityarthaḥ //5 //
GV05chupsb_u:8242: taṃ vā etaṃ devā ātmānam upāsate /
GV05chupsb_u:8243: tasmāt teṣāṃ sarve ca lokā āttāḥ sarve ca kāmāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8244: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānāti /
GV05chupsb_u:8245: iti ha prajāpatir uvāca prajāpatir uvāca // ChUp_8,12.6 //
GV05chupsb_u:8246: ChUpBh_8,12.6 yasmādeṣa indrāya prajāpatinokta ātmā tasmāttataḥ śrutvā tamātmānamadyatve 'pi devā upāsate /
GV05chupsb_u:8247: tadupāsanācca teṣāṃ sarve ca lokā āttāḥ prāptāḥ sarve ca kāmāḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8248: yadarthaṃ hīndra ekaśataṃ varṣāṇi prajāpatau brahmacaryamuvāsa tatphalaṃ prāptaṃ devairityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8249: tadyuktaṃ devānāṃ mahābhāgyatvānna tvidānīṃ manuṣyāṇāmalpajīvitatvānmandataraprajñatvācca saṃbhavatīti prāpta idamucyate-sa sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmānidānīntano 'pi /
GV05chupsb_u:8251: indrādivadyastamātmānamanuvidya vijānātīti ha sāmānyena kila prajāpatiruvāca /
GV05chupsb_u:8258: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rāhor mukhāt pramucya dhūtvā śarīram akṛtaṃ kṛtātmā brahmalokam abhisaṃbhavāmīty abhisaṃbhavāmīti //
GV05chupsb_u:8259: ChUpBh_8,13.1 śyāmācchabalaṃ prapadya ityādimantrāmnāya pāvano japārthaśca dhyānārtho vā /
GV05chupsb_u:8260: śyāmo gambhīro varṇaḥ śyāma iva śyāmo hārdaṃ brahmātyantaduravagāhyatvāttaddhārda
GV05chupsb_u:8261: brahma jñātvā dhyānena tasmācchyāmācchabalaṃ śabala iva śabalo 'raṇyādyanekakāmamiśratvādbrahmalokasya
GV05chupsb_u:8262: śābalya taṃ brahmalokaṃ śabalaṃ prapadye manasā śarīrapātādvordhvaṃ gaccheyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8263: yasmādahaṃ śabalādbrahmalokānnāmarūpavyākaraṇāya śyāmaṃ prapadye hārdabhāvaṃ prapanno 'smītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8265: kathaṃ śabalaṃ brahmalokaṃ prapadya ityucyate-aśva iva svāni lomāni vidhūya kampanena
GV05chupsb_u:8266: śramaṃ pāṃsvādi ca romato 'panīya yathā nirmalo bhavatyevaṃ hārdabrahmajñānena vidhūya
GV05chupsb_u:8267: pāpaṃ dharmādharmākyaṃ candra iva ca rāhugrastastasmādrahormukhātmapramucya bhāsvaro
GV05chupsb_u:8268: bhavati yathaivaṃ dhūtvā prahāra śarīraṃ sarvānarthāśrayamihaiva dhyānena kṛtātmā
GV05chupsb_u:8274: te yadantarā tad brahma tad amṛtaṃ sa ātmā /
GV05chupsb_u:8275: prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadye yaśo 'haṃ bhavāmi brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśo rājñām yaśo viśām /
GV05chupsb_u:8278: śyetam adatkam adatkaṃ śyetaṃ lindu mābhigāṃ lindu mābhigām // ChUp_8,14.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:8279: ChUpBh_8,14.1 ākāśo vā ityādi brahmaṇo lakṣaṇanirdeśārthamādhyānāya /
GV05chupsb_u:8280: ākāśo vai nāma śrutiṣu prasiddha ātmā /
GV05chupsb_u:8282: sa cā'kāśo nāmarūpayoḥ svātmasthayorjagadbījabhūtayoḥ salilasyeva phenasthānīyayornirvahitā nirvoḍhā vyākartā /
GV05chupsb_u:8283: te nāmarūpe yadantarā yasya brahmaṇo 'ntarā madhye vartete,
GV05chupsb_u:8284: tayorvā nāmarūpayorantarā madhye yannāmarūpābhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ yadityetattadbrahma nāmarūpavilakṣaṇaṃ nāmarūpābhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ tathāpi tayornirvoḍhutvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8285: idameva maitreyībrāhmaṇenoktaṃ cinmātrānugamātmasarvatra citsvarūpataiveti gamyata ekavākyatā /
GV05chupsb_u:8287: ātmā hi nāma sarvajantūnāṃ pratyakcetanaḥ svasaṃvedyaḥ prasiddhastenaiva svarūpeṇonnīyāśarīro vyomavatsarvagata ātmā brahmetyavagantavyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8290: prajāpatiścaturmukhastasya sabhāṃ veśma prabhuvimitaṃ veśma prapadye gaccheyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8291: kiñca yaśo 'haṃ yaśo nāmā'tmāhaṃ bhavāmi brāhmaṇānām /
GV05chupsb_u:8292: brāhmaṇā eva hi viśeṣatastamupāsate tatasteṣāṃ yaśo bhavāmi /
GV05chupsb_u:8298: tathādatkaṃ dantarahitamapyadatkaṃ bhakṣayitṛ srīvyañjanaṃ tatsevināṃ tejobalavīryavijñānadharmāṇāmapahantṛ vināśayitrityetat /
GV05chupsb_u:8299: yadevaṃlakṣaṇaṃ śyetaṃ lindu picchilaṃ tanmābhigāṃ mābhigaccheyam /
GV05chupsb_u:8303: tad dhaitad brahmā prajāpataya uvāca prajāpatir manave manuḥ prajābhyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8304: ācāryakulād vedam adhītya yathāvidhānaṃ guroḥ karmātiśeṣeṇābhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe śucau
GV05chupsb_u:8305: deśe svādhyāyam adhīyāno dharmikān vidadhad ātmani sarvendriyāṇi saṃpratiṣṭhāpyāhiṃsan
GV05chupsb_u:8307: sa khalv evaṃ vartayan yāvad āyuṣaṃ brahmalokam abhisaṃpadyate /
GV05chupsb_u:8308: na ca punar āvartate na ca punar āvartate // ChUp_8,15.1 //
GV05chupsb_u:8310: granthenāṣṭādhyāyīlakṣaṇena saha brahmā hiraṇyagarbhaḥ parameśvaro vā taddvāreṇa
GV05chupsb_u:8314: yatheha ṣaṣṭhādyadhyāyatraye prakāśitātmavidyā saphalāvagamyate tathā karmaṇāṃ na
GV05chupsb_u:8315: kaścanārtha iti prāpte tadānarthakyaprāptiparijihīrṣayedaṃ karmaṇo vidvadbhiranuṣṭhīyamānasya
GV05chupsb_u:8318: sarvasyāpi vidheḥ smṛtyuktasyopakaparvāṇakaṃ prati kartavyatve guruśuśrūṣāyāḥ prādhānyapradarśanārthamāha-guroḥ
GV05chupsb_u:8319: karma yatkartavyaṃ tatkṛtvā karmaśūnyo yo 'tiśiṣṭaḥ kālastena kālena vedamadhītyetyarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8320: evaṃ hi niyamavatādhīto vedaḥ karmajñānaphalaprāptaye bhavati nānyathetyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8321: abhisamāvṛtya dharmajijñāsāṃ samāpayitvā gurukulannivṛtya nyāyato dārānāhṛtya kuṭumbe sthitvā gārhatthve vihite karmaṇi tiṣṭhannityarthaḥ /
GV05chupsb_u:8323: vivikte 'medhyādirahite deśe yatāvadāsīnaḥ svādhyāyamadhīyāno naityakamadhikaṃ ca
GV05chupsb_u:8330: anye varṇayanti kuṭumba evaitatsarvaṃ kurvansa khalvadhikṛto yāvadāyuṣaṃ yāvajjīvamevaṃyathoktena prakāreṇaiva vartayanbrahmalokamabhisaṃpadyatedehānte
GV05chupsb_u:8333: arcirādinā mārgeṇa kāryabrahmalokabhisaṃpadya yāvadbrahmalokasthitistāvattatraiva tiṣṭhati prāktato nā'vartata ityarthaḥ /
